translation.en: Learners need to experience, to know or be able to:

translation.cy: • ehangu eu dealltwriaeth o’r system rifau, drwy ddysgu drwy broﬁad, i gynnwys rhifau mawr, sero,rhifau negatif a ffracsiynau
translation.en: • extend their understanding of the number system, through experiential learning, to include large numbers, zero, negative numbers and fractions

translation.cy: • drwy amrywiaeth eang o broﬁadau, ddod yn fwyfwy rhugl yn eu defnydd o rifau er mwyn disgriﬁo,dehongli a chyﬂeu maint, graddfa a chymariaethau o fewn mathemateg, a thu hwnt
translation.en: • become increasingly ﬂuent in their use of number, through a broad range of experiences, in order to describe, interpret and communicate size, scale and comparisons, both within and beyond mathematics

translation.cy: • dod yn fwyfwy rhugl yn eu cyfriﬁadau, gyda chyfriﬁanellau a hebddynt, ac yn magu dealltwriaeth
translation.en: • become increasingly ﬂuent in their calculations, both with and without the use of calculators, and

translation.cy: Mae gwneud y cysylltiadau rhwng rhifyddeg ac algebra yn meithrin sgiliau ar gyfer rhesymu haniaethol o oedran cynnar.
translation.en: Making connections between arithmetic and algebra develops skills for abstract reasoning from an early age.

translation.cy: Mae rhifedd yn golygu cymhwyso a chysylltu’r hyfedreddau hyn mewn amrywiaeth o gyd-destunau go iawn, ym mhob rhan o’r cwricwlwm a’r tu hwnt iddo.
translation.en: Numeracy involves applying and connecting these proﬁciencies in a range of real-life contexts,across and beyond the curriculum.

translation.cy: Deilliannau cyﬂawniad
translation.en: Achievement outcomes

translation.cy: Gallaf ddefnyddio’r arwydd hafal i ddangos bod gan ddwy ochr brawddeg rhif yr un gwerthâ’i gilydd, a gallaf ddefnyddio arwyddion anhafaleddau wrth gymharu meintiau.
translation.en: I can use the equals sign to indicate that both sides of a number sentence have the same value and I can use inequality signs when comparing quantities.

translation.cy: Gallaf adnabod hafaleddau, anhafaleddau a chywerthedd mynegiadau, a hefyd achosion lle y gellir defnyddio cymuded, dosbarthed a chysylltedd i ddatgan mynegiad syml mewn ffordd wahanol.
translation.en: I can recognise equalities, inequalities and equivalence of expressions, and also when commutativity, distributivity and associativity can be used to state a simple expression in a different way.

translation.cy: Cam cynnydd 4
translation.en: Progression step 4

translation.cy: Gallaf wirio fy atebion drwy ddefnyddio dulliau amnewid.
translation.en: I can check my answers using substitution.

translation.cy: Rwyf wedi defnyddio hafaliadau ac anhafaleddau unradd i gynrychioli a modelu sefyllfaoedd go iawn ac i ddatrys problemau.
translation.en: I have used equations and inequalities in the ﬁrst degree to represent and model real-life situations and solve problems.

translation.cy: Gallaf ddehongli fy atebion a gwirio eu bod yn gwneud synnwyr yn eu cyd-destun.
translation.en: I can interpret my answers and check that they make sense in context.

translation.cy: Deilliannau cyﬂawniad
translation.en: Achievement outcomes

translation.cy: Gallaf drin mynegiadau algebraidd yn rhwydd drwy ehangu cromfachau dwbl, ffactorio mynegiadau cwadratig a newid testun fformiwla pan fydd y testun yn ymddangos mewn mwy nag un term.
translation.en: I can ﬂuently manipulate algebraic expressions by expanding double brackets, factorising quadratic expressions and changing the subject of a formula where the subject appears in more than one term.

translation.cy: Gallaf ddeall y cysyniad o unfathiant a gallaf drosi datganiadau sy’n disgriﬁo perthnasau mathemategol yn fodelau algebraidd, gan ddefnyddio mynegiadau a hafaliadau.
translation.en: I can understand the concept of an identity and can translate statements describing mathematical relationships into algebraic models, using expressions and equations.

translation.cy: • Dilynir trefn gweithrediadau a deddfau rhifyddeg mewn algebra.
translation.en: • The order of operations and laws of arithmetic are followed in algebra.

translation.cy: • Gellir defnyddio ffwythiannau a mapio mewn algebra i ddisgriﬁo trawsffurﬁadau.
translation.en: • Functions and mappings in algebra can be used to describe transformations.

translation.cy: • adnabod cymuded adio a lluosi, gan ddefnyddio gwrthrychau, diagramau a rhifau
translation.en: • recognise commutativity of addition and multiplication, using objects, diagrams and numbers

translation.cy: • drwy amrywiaeth eang o broﬁadau, werthfawrogi pŵer mathemateg i fynegi perthnasau mewn ffordd gryno ac mewn ffurﬁau a gaiff eu deall yn gyffredinol
translation.en: • through a broad range of experiences, appreciate the power of mathematics to express relationships concisely and in forms that are universally understood

translation.cy: • archwilio’r cysylltiadau rhwng hafaliadau a mynegiadau sydd â chynrychioliadau geometrig,rhifyddol a grafﬁgol, ac yn deall eu cywerthedd
translation.en: • explore connections between equations and expressions with geometric, numerical and graphical representations, and understand their equivalence

translation.cy: Egwyddorion cynnydd
translation.en: Principles of progression

translation.cy: Wrth i ddysgwyr broﬁ, deall a chymhwyso cysyniadau a pherthnasau sy’n gynyddol fwy cymhleth, dylai eu rhuglder wrth goﬁo ffeithiau, perthnasau a thechnegau wella.
translation.en: As learners experience, understand and apply increasingly complex concepts and relationships, ﬂuency in remembering facts, relationships and techniques should grow.

translation.cy: Rwyf wedi archwilio symudiadau a chyfeiriadau, drwy ddull fﬁsegol a chan ddefnyddio technoleg ddigidol, a gallaf ddefnyddio iaith fathemategol i ddisgriﬁo saﬂe.
translation.en: I have explored movements and directions, both physically and by using digital technology, and I can use mathematical language to describe position.

translation.cy: Cam cynnydd 2
translation.en: Progression step 2

translation.cy: Gallaf gyfrifo perimedr, arwynebedd neu arwynebedd arwyneb a chyfaint siapiau dau ddimensiwn a thri dimensiwn cyfansawdd, a gallaf ail-drefnu fformiwlâu er mwyn dod o hyd i hydoedd coll.
translation.en: I can calculate the perimeter, area or surface area and volume of compound two-dimensional and three-dimensional shapes, and I can rearrange formulae to ﬁnd missing lengths.

translation.cy: • Mae mesur yn agwedd ar feddwl geometregol sydd â chysylltiad agos â rhifau a gall cryn dipyn o’r broses o ddatblygu dealltwriaeth o rifau ddod drwy fesur cynyddol sofﬁstigedig.
translation.en: • Measure is an aspect of geometrical thinking which is highly connected to number and much of the development of understanding of number can emerge through increasingly sophisticated measuring.

translation.cy: • Graddfa.
translation.en: • Scale.

translation.cy: • Defnyddio offer priodol i fesur yn gywir.
translation.en: • Use of appropriate equipment to measure accurately.

translation.en: I have represented information by creating a variety of appropriate charts of increasing complexity, including tally charts, frequency tables, bar graphs, line graphs, with and without the use of digital technologies.

translation.en: I have used a sequential data-handling cycle to ask and answer appropriate questions.

translation.cy: Rwyf wedi arbroﬁ â gwahanol ddulliau o gyﬂwyno data, gan gynnwys dulliau amlder cronnus, blwch a blewyn, a histogramau, er mwyn dehongli mesurau canolduedd a mesurau o wasgariad.
translation.en: I have experimented with different approaches to presenting data, including cumulative frequency, box and whisker, and histograms, to interpret measures of central tendency and measures of spread.

translation.cy: Gallaf ddefnyddio dadleuon tebygoliaethol sy’n seiliedig ar ddamcaniaethau, gwybodaeth,gwaith ymchwil ac arbroﬁon er mwyn ategu fy nghasgliad.
translation.en: I can use probabilistic arguments, drawing on theory, information, research and experimentation to support my conclusion.

Bydd yn ei dro, yn meithrin agweddau cadarnhaol tuag at ddysgu a defnyddio ieithoedd.
translation.en: By providing meaningful contexts, this area of learning and experience will stimulate learners both to acquire and to apply language skills, knowledge and understanding which in turn will develop in them positive attitudes towards learning and using languages.

translation.cy: Cyﬂwyniad Cwricwlwm Drafft i Gymru 2022:
translation.en: Introduction Draft Curriculum for Wales 2022:

translation.cy: Ieithoedd, Llythrennedd a Chyfathrebu 07
translation.en: Languages, Literacy and Communication 06

translation.cy: Mae dysgu a defnyddio ieithoedd yn ein cysylltu â phobl, lleoedd a chymunedau.Mae’r Maes Dysgu a Phroﬁad Ieithoedd, Llythrennedd a Chyfathrebu wedi’i gynllunio i sicrhau bod dysgwyr, fel dinasyddion Cymru ddwyieithog a byd amlieithog, yn galludefnyddio’r Gymraeg, Saesneg ac ieithoedd rhyngwladol.
translation.en: Learning and using languages connects us with people, places and communities. The Languages, Literacy and Communication Area of Learning and Experience is designed to equip learners, as citizens of a bilingual Wales and a multilingual world, with the ability to use Welsh, English and international languages.

translation.cy: Cynllunnir y proﬁadau cyfoethog ac amrywiol hyn er mwyn datblygu gallu dysgwyr i ddod yn greadigol ac yn fentrus wrth ddefnyddio Cymraeg, Saesneg ac ieithoedd rhyngwladol.
translation.en: The rich and varied nature of these experiences will be designed to improve learners’ ability to become creative and enterprising in their use of Welsh, English and international languages.

translation.cy: Mewn cyd-destun dwyieithog ac amlieithog, mae hyn hefyd yn gofyn am allu dewis iaith briodol.
translation.en: In a bilingual and multilingual context, this also calls for the ability to choose an appropriate language.

translation.cy: Mae’n ein hysbrydoli ac yn ein cymell, gan ein helpu hefyd i ddysgu mwy am iaith.
translation.en: It inspires and motivates us while also helping us to learn more about language.

translation.cy: • Mae dysgwyr sy’n siarad ac yn ysgrifennu’n effeithiol yn barod i chwarae rhan lawn mewn bywyd a gwaith.
translation.en: • Learners who speak and write effectively are prepared to play a full part in life and work.

translation.cy: Yn ogystal ag ysgolion cyfrwng Cymraeg,mae’n bosibl hefyd mai’r cynnydd yn y Gymraeg a ddangosir yn y deilliannau cyﬂawniad Cymraeg/Saesneg fydd yr un mwyaf addas i rai dysgwyr mewn ysgolion cyfrwng Saesneg sydd, er enghraifft, wedi mynychu cylch meithrin neu sy’n trosglwyddo o ysgol cyfrwng Cymraeg i ysgol cyfrwng Saesneg.
translation.en: As well as Welsh-medium schools, the progression in Welsh shown in the Welsh/English achievement outcomes may also be the most suitable for some learners in English-medium schools who, for example, have attended cylch meithrin or have transferred from a Welsh-medium school to an English-medium school.

translation.cy: O fewn y llwybrau cynnydd hyn, bydd teithiau dysgwyr yn amrywio ac ni fydd y broses yn un llinol.
translation.en: Within these progression routes, learners’ pathways will vary and the process will not be linear.

translation.en: I can show empathy and recognise that others may have different views from mine.

translation.cy: Gallaf fabwysiadu, creu a pherfformio rolau yn seiliedig ar yr hyn rwy’n ei wybod am gymeriadau a’m proﬁadau o lenyddiaeth.
translation.en: I can adopt, create and perform roles based on my knowledge of characters and experiences of literature.

translation.cy: Gallaf archwilio a dadansoddi materion drwy blot, cymeriad, thema, hunaniaeth a chyd-destun y llenyddiaeth rwy’n ei chlywed, ei gweld neu ei darllen.
translation.en: I can explore and analyse issues through the plot, character, theme, identity and context of the literature I hear, view or read.

translation.cy: Gallaf ddadansoddi, cymharu a gwerthuso syniadau o amrywiaeth o destunau llenyddol cymhleth, gan gynnwys ar draws gwahanol ieithoedd.
translation.en: I can analyse, compare and evaluate ideas from a range of complex literary texts, including across different languages.

translation.cy: Gallaf lunio fy ngwaith ysgrifennu fy hun at ddibenion creadigol, gan ymwneud ag amrywiaeth eang o lenyddiaeth er mwyn archwilio a datblygu fy ngwaith ysgrifennu fy hun.
translation.en: I can craft my own writing for creative purposes, engaging with a wide range of literature in order to explore and develop my own writing.

translation.cy: Gallaf wrando ar gerddi, sgetsys, caneuon a straeon yn Gymraeg a’u perfformio â mynegiant sy’n dangos fy mod wedi’u deall.
translation.en: I can listen to and perform poems, sketches, songs and stories in the Welsh language with expression which shows my understanding.

translation.en: I can identify similarities and differences between types of texts in Welsh by commenting on the main features of genres, using relevant terminology.

translation.cy: Rwyf wedi proﬁ llenyddiaeth o ddiwylliannau eraill a llenyddiaeth wedi’i hysgrifennu mewn gwahanol ieithoedd.
translation.en: I have experienced literature from other cultures and literature written in different languages.

translation.en: I can respond creatively and critically, in my language of choice, to the main features of what I have heard, read or seen in the international language.

translation.cy: Mae cydberthnasau iach yn hanfodol ar gyfer ein hymdeimlad o berthyn ac ar gyfer ein lles.
translation.en: Healthy relationships are fundamental to our sense of belonging and well-being.

translation.cy: Maent yn nodi:
translation.en: It sets out:

translation.cy: Bydd dysgwyr yn meithrin gwybodaeth a dealltwriaeth am y ffordd y mae amrywiaeth o ffactorau yn effeithio ar eu hiechyd a’u lles.
translation.en: Learners will gain knowledge and understanding about how a range of factors affect their health and well-being.

translation.cy: Bydd gweithgareddau corfforol ynghyd â chyﬂeoedd i ddatblygu cydberthnasau yn rhoi cyﬂeoedd i ddysgwyr chwarae amrywiaeth o rannau sy’n gofyn am gydweithredu.
translation.en: Physical activity as well as opportunities to develop relationships will provide learners with contexts for playing a range of collaborative roles.

translation.cy: • pwysigrwydd gwydnwch a rheoli’ch hunan
translation.en: • the importance of resilience and self-regulation

translation.cy: Mae deall sut y caiff cydberthnasau iach eu ffurﬁo, eu datblygu a’u cynnal yn ein galluogi i ddatblygu’r sgiliau a’r agweddau sy’n caniatáu i ni greu cydberthnasau iach ein hunain.
translation.en: Understanding how healthy relationships are formed, developed and maintained enables us to develop the skills and attitudes which allow us to create healthy relationships of our own.

translation.cy: Mae’r cydberthnasau hyn yn aml yn ein helpu drwy sefyllfaoedd anodd sy’n peri goﬁd a straen yn ystod ein bywyd ac yn ein helpu i ddod yn unigolion iach a hyderus.
translation.en: These relationships often support us through difﬁcult and stressful situations and help us to become healthy, conﬁdent individuals.

translation.cy: Bwriedir iddynt weithredu fel lensys ar gyfer archwilio gwahanol bynciau a materion.
translation.en: They are meant to act as lenses through which different topics and issues can be explored.

translation.cy: Dod yn fwy cyfrifol yn gymdeithasol – Caiff cynnydd ei fodelu fel symud o’r unigolyn i bobl eraill, ac o’r lleol i’r cenedlaethol i’r byd-eang.
translation.en: Becoming more socially responsible – Progression is modelled as moving from oneself to others, and from the local to the national to the global.

translation.cy: neu o ran ehangder (ychwanegu mwy o wybodaeth/sgiliau newydd).
translation.en: or in breadth (adding more new knowledge/skills).

translation.cy: yn gydnaws â cherrig milltir datblygiadol ehangach ac yn droellog yn ogystal â llinol.

translation.cy: Mae hefyd yn disgriﬁo’r wybodaeth, y sgiliau a’r ymagweddau y dylid eu datblygu yn ystod proﬁadau addysgol dysgwyr yng Nghymru.
translation.en: It also describes the knowledge, skills, and dispositions that should be developed during learners’ educational experiences in Wales.

translation.cy: Wrth i ddysgwyr ymwneud yn feirniadol ag amrywiaeth o destunau er mwyn eu helpu i wneud penderfyniadau, byddant yn mynegi eu safbwyntiau mewn ffordd gynyddol hyderus ac yn datblygu eu gwerthoedd a’u hunaniaeth ymhellach a fydd, yn ei dro, yn datblygu eu hyder a’u huchelgais.
translation.en: As learners engage critically with a range of texts to support their decision-making they will articulate their views with greater conﬁdence and further develop their values and identity which, in turn, will develop their conﬁdence and ambition.

translation.cy: Mae llythrennedd yn ffactor sylfaenol wrth alluogi lles.
translation.en: Literacy is a fundamental enabler of well-being.

translation.cy: Bydd Iechyd a Lles yn darparu’r cyd-destun go iawn i helpu i feithrin sgiliau rhifedd.
translation.en: Health and Well-being will provide the real-world context to support the development of numeracy skills.

translation.cy: Bydd angen i ddysgwyr ddeall goblygiadau hyn ar gyfer eu hiechyd a’u lles ac, yn arbennig, yr effaith bosibl ar iechyd a lles y corff, ac iechyd a lles meddyliol ac emosiynol.
translation.en: Learners will need to understand the implications this may have for their health and well-being and, in particular, the possible impact on physical, mental and emotional health and well-being.

translation.cy: Mae hyn yn cynnwys eu cydberthnasau, diogelwch ar-lein, goblygiadau cyfreithiol a dylanwadau cymdeithasol ar-lein (gan gynnwys y cyfryngau cymdeithasol).
translation.en: This includes their relationships with others, online safety, legal implications and socialinﬂuences online (including social media).

translation.cy: Dylent hefyd feithrin y sgiliau ar gyfer cynllunio personol ac ar gyfer gwneud penderfyniadau yng nghyd-destun y cwricwlwm, dysgu a chyﬂawniad a fydd yn eu paratoi ar gyfer y cyfnodau nesaf mewn bywyd.
translation.en: They should also develop the skills for personal planning and for making decisions in the context of curriculum, learning and achievement which will prepare them for the next stages in life.

translation.cy: Dylai dysgwyr broﬁ gweithgareddau sy’n eu galluogi i feithrin y sgiliau a’r nodweddion y bydd eu hangen arnynt er mwyn cyﬂawni a chynnal cyrchfannau cadarnhaol ar ôl gadael yr ysgol.
translation.en: Learners should experience activities which enable them to develop the skills and attributes they will need if they are to achieve and sustain positive destinations beyond their school lives.

translation.en: Through robust and consistent evaluation of scientiﬁc and technological evidence, learners are then supported to become ethical, informed citizens of Wales and the world, who will be able to make informed decisions about future actions.

translation.en: We need to be able to evaluate scientiﬁc claims to help us make informed decisions that affect our world and well-being.

translation.en: For example, the discovery of new knowledge, as well as validation of existing knowledge using scientiﬁc and technological reasoning, connects what matters statements throughout the area of learning and experience.

translation.cy: Mae dysgwyr yn symud ymlaen o ddisgriﬁo syniadau i allu eu hegluro, ac mae eu gwaith dadansoddi a disgriﬁo yn datblygu o’r ansoddol i’r meintiol.
translation.en: Learners move from describing ideas to being able to explain them, and their analysis and description move from qualitative to quantitative.

translation.en: As learners work, both independently and collaboratively, they should access opportunities to participate in the iterative process of planning, creating, evaluating and improving digital content.

translation.en: Such decisions should be informed by the hierarchic and connected nature of concepts set out in the area of learning and experience, including the range of suggested ‘strands’ of progression, in order to ensure foundations in learning are built on and experiences are connected.

translation.cy: Fodd bynnag, bydd ymarferwyr hefyd yn awyddus i ystyried yr angen am ddulliau dysgu ac addysgu mwy penodol o fewn disgyblaethau; daw hyn yn gynyddol bwysig wrth i ddysgwyr wneud cynnydd.
translation.en: However, practitioners will also wish to consider the need for more discrete disciplinary learning and teaching; this becomes increasingly important as learners progress.

translation.cy: Gan ddefnyddio rhesymeg, dychymyg a chreadigrwydd, gallwn gymhwyso gwybodaeth wyddonol er mwyn gwella ein dealltwriaeth o sut mae’r byd yn gweithio.
translation.en: Using logic, imagination and creativity, we can apply scientiﬁc knowledge to further our understanding of how that world works.

translation.cy: • y disgwyliadau eang ar gyfer dysgwyr ar bob cam cynnydd ym Maes Dysgu a Phroﬁad y Dyniaethau.
translation.en: • the broad expectations for learners for the Humanities Area of Learning and Experience at each progression step.

translation.cy: yn cefnogi pedwar diben y cwricwlwm
translation.en: supports the four purposes of the curriculum

translation.cy: Mae Maes Dysgu a Phroﬁad y Dyniaethau yn greiddiol o ran sicrhau bod dysgwyr yn dod yn ddinasyddion egwyddorol, gwybodus yng Nghymru a’r byd drwy fynd i’r afael â materion cyfoes a hanesyddol, archwilio proﬁadau dynol ar garreg eu drws a ledled y byd, ac ystyried gwahanol persbectifau.
translation.en: The Humanities Area of Learning and Experience is central to learners becoming ethical, informed citizens of Wales and the world through engaging with contemporary and historical issues, exploring human experiences on their own doorstep and across the globe, and contemplating different perspectives.

translation.cy: Drwy hyn, byddant yn dod i ddeall, parchu a herio amrywiaeth o fydolygon, gan wybod sut i arfer eu hawliau democrataidd a gwneud dewisiadau gwybodus, gan ddangos ymwybyddiaeth o bwysigrwydd dyfodol cynaliadwy i bawb.
translation.en: Through this they will come to understand, respect and challenge a variety of world views, knowing how to exercise their democratic rights and to make informed choices, conscious of the importance of a sustainable future for all.

translation.cy: Bydd dysgwyr yn cael y cyﬂeoedd i ddod yn gyfranwyr mentrus, creadigol sy’n barod i chwarae eu rhan yn llawn yn eu bywyd a’u gwaith, ynghyd â chyﬂeoedd i ddod yn ddinasyddion cyfrifol, wrth iddynt ymwneud yn feirniadol â heriau a chyﬂeoedd lleol, cenedlaethol a byd-eang o’r gorffennol a’r presennol, a cheisio dychmygu dyfodol posibl.
translation.en: Learners will have the opportunities to become enterprising, creative contributors, ready to play a full part in life and work, as well as opportunities to become responsible citizens, as they engage critically with local, national and global challenges and opportunities past and present, and seek to imagine possible futures.

translation.cy: DATGANIADAU O’R HYN SY’N BWYSIG  YN Y DYNIAETHAU
translation.en: WHAT MATTERS STATEMENTS FOR HUMANITIES

translation.cy: Mae datblygu meddwl ymholgar yn galluogi dysgwyr i archwilio ac ymchwilio i’r byd, i’w orffennol, ei bresennol a’i ddyfodol, drostynt eu hunain.
translation.en: Developing an enquiring mind enables learners to explore and investigate the world, past, present and future, for themselves.

translation.cy: Bydd hyn yn galluogi dysgwyr yng Nghymru i feithrin hunanymwybyddiaeth wrth iddynt greu eu safbwyntiau gwybodus eu hunain.
translation.en: This will enable learners in Wales to develop self-awareness as they create their own informed viewpoints.

translation.cy: Bydd hyn yn dwysáu ymwybyddiaeth dysgwyr o’r modd y mae gweithredoedd dynol yn dylanwadu ar gynaliadwyedd ein byd yn y dyfodol.
translation.en: This will heighten learners’ awareness of how the future sustainability of our world is inﬂuenced by the impact of human actions.

translation.cy: O ganlyniad, daw dysgwyr i ddeall y gall y dewisiadau y mae pob un ohonom yn eu gwneud, yn unigol ac ar y cyd, gael effeithiau sylweddol.
translation.en: Consequently, learners will come to realise that the choices we all make, individually and collectively, can have major impacts.

translation.cy: Dros amser, mae’r cymdeithasau hyn wedi esblygu, gan broﬁ parhad a newid sydd wedi effeithio ar eu bywydau nhw a bywydau pobl eraill, ac sy’n parhau i wneud hynny.
translation.en: Over time, these societies have evolved, experiencing continuity and change that has affected, and continues to affect, their own and other people’s lives.

translation.cy: Mae’r Dyniaethau yn meithrin dealltwriaeth o achosion, canlyniadau ac arwyddocâd y newidiadau a’r grymoedd sydd wedi dylanwadu ar gymdeithasau.
translation.en: Humanities builds an understanding of the causes, consequences and signiﬁcance of the changes and forces that have shaped societies.

translation.cy: Bydd cwestiynu a gwerthuso ymatebion sydd eisoes yn bodoli i heriau a chyﬂeoedd yn helpu dysgwyr i ddatblygu fel dinasyddion byd-eang hunanymwybodol, gwybodus ac egwyddorolsy’n myfyrio’n feirniadol ar eu credoau a’u gwerthoedd eu hunain.
translation.en: Questioning and evaluating existing responses to challenges and opportunities will help learners develop as self-aware, informed, ethical global citizens who critically reﬂect on their own beliefs and values.

translation.cy: Mae’r datganiadau o’r hyn sy’n bwysig ym Maes Dysgu a Phroﬁad y Dyniaethau yn cynnig ymagwedd gyfannol ac integredig.
translation.en: The what matters statements for the Humanities Area of Learning and Experience offer a holistic and integrated approach.

translation.cy: Datblygu cwricwlwm eang a chytbwys
translation.en: Developing a broad and balanced curriculum

translation.cy: Dylai sgiliau darllen dysgwyr gael eu datblygu drwy ddarllen amrywiaeth o ddeunyddiau o amrywiaeth o leoedd ac amseroedd er mwyn dadansoddi tystiolaeth, meddwl yn feirniadol, dod i gasgliadau ynglŷn ag ystyr a gwerthuso dehongliadau a safbwyntiau.
translation.en: Learners’ reading skills should be developed by accessing a range of materials from a variety of places and times to analyse evidence, to think critically, to infer meaning, and to evaluate interpretations and viewpoints.

translation.cy: Rhifedd
translation.en: Numeracy

translation.cy: Mae’r Dyniaethau yn rhoi amrywiaeth eang o gyﬂeoedd i ddysgwyr feithrin eu sgiliau rhifedd mewn cyd-destunau go iawn.
translation.en: Humanities provides learners with a wide range of opportunities to develop their numeracy skills in real-world contexts.

translation.cy: Gall y sgil o ddatblygu holiaduron syml i ddadansoddi setiau data mawr gael ei ategu a’i ddatblygu ym mhob rhan o’r Dyniaethau wrth i ddysgwyr gasglu a chofnodi data.
translation.en: Developing simple questionnaires to analyse large data sets can all be supported and developed across Humanities as learners collect and record data.

translation.cy: Wrth i ddysgwyr wneud defnydd cynyddol o dechnoleg ddigidol i ymholi ac ymchwilio, mae sicrhau dibynadwyedd y ffynonellau hyn yn hollbwysig wrth iddynt geisio ategu casgliadau.
translation.en: As learners increasingly use digital technology to enquire and investigate, ensuring the reliability of these sources is critical as they look to support conclusions.

translation.cy: • astudio hanes, daearyddiaeth, diwylliannau, gwerthoedd, ieithoedd a chredoau Cymru, sy’n eu helpu i wneud synnwyr o’u hunaniaeth
translation.en: • study the history, geography, cultures, values, languages and beliefs of Wales, which helps them to make sense of their identity

translation.cy: • meithrin dealltwriaeth o ddigwyddiadau’r byd a’r ffordd y maent wedi dylanwadu ar fywydau a chymdeithasau dynol
translation.en: • build an understanding of world events and how they have inﬂuenced human lives and societies

translation.cy: Mae’r Dyniaethau yn helpu dysgwyr i ddeall amrywiaeth a herio stereoteipiau er mwyn codi uchelgais dysgwyr a’u cred yn eu dyfodol posibl.
translation.en: Humanities help learners to understand diversity and to challenge stereotypes in order to raiselearners’ aspirations and belief in their potential future.

translation.cy: Mae dysgwyr yn datblygu diddordebau, cryfderau, sgiliau a dyheadau drwy broﬁadau fel rhan o’r cwricwlwm ac mewn bywyd y tu hwnt i’r ysgol.
translation.en: Learners develop interests, strengths, skills and aspirations through experiences as part of the curriculum and life beyond school.

translation.cy: Deall cyﬂeoedd ôl-16 ac addysg uwch
translation.en: Understanding post-16 and higher education opportunities

translation.cy: Mae hyn yn cynnwys archwilio cydberthnasau personol, hawliau, gwerthoedd cyffredin, rhywedd a rhywioldeb.
translation.en: This includes exploring personal relationships, rights, shared values, gender and sexuality.

translation.cy: Mae’n amgylchedd diogel i ystyried cydraddoldeb a diffyg gwahaniaethu ac mae’n cynnig cyﬂeoedd i drafod materion sensitif, e.e. trais ar sail rhyw ac anffurﬁo/torri organau cenhedlu benywod.
translation.en: It also provides a safe environment to explore equality and non-discrimination, and opportunities to discuss sensitive issues, e.g. gender-based violence and female genital mutilation/cutting (FGM/C).

translation.cy: Yn y Dyniaethau, bydd cyﬂeoedd i ddatblygu dealltwriaeth o Gonfensiwn y Cenhedloedd Unedig ar Hawliau’r Plentyn (CCUHP) ac annog dysgwyr i gydnabod eu hawliau eu hunain a hawliau pobl eraill.
translation.en: In Humanities there will be opportunities to develop understanding of the United Nations Convention on the Rights of the Child (UNCRC) and for encouraging learners to recognise their own and others’ rights.

translation.cy: hil;
translation.en: race;

translation.cy: anabledd;
translation.en: disability;

translation.cy: hunaniaeth o ran rhywedd neu fynegiant rhywedd;
translation.en: gender identity or expression;

translation.cy: Gwerthoedd, hawliau, diwylliant a rhywioldeb
translation.en: Values, rights, culture and sexuality

translation.cy: Mae’r Dyniaethau yn mynd i’r afael â gwahaniaethu ar sail cyfeiriadedd rhywiol neu hunaniaeth o ran rhywedd ac yn cynnig cyﬂeoedd i ddysgwyr ystyried eu diwylliannau eu hunain a diwylliannau eraill.
translation.en: Humanities addresses discrimination based on sexual orientation or gender identity and offers learners opportunities to explore their own and others’ cultures.

translation.cy: Deall rhywedd
translation.en: Understanding gender

translation.cy: Gall dyniaethau digidol ganolbwyntio ar effeithiau cadarnhaol a niweidiol y cyfryngau cymdeithasol, a’r ffordd y gall pobl bortreadu eu hunain yn ddiogel ar-lein.
translation.en: Digital humanities can focus on the positive and harmful effects of social media, and how people can portray themselves safely and securely online.

translation.cy: Sgiliau ar gyfer iechyd a lles
translation.en: Skills for health and well-being

translation.cy: Mae proﬁadau, gwybodaeth a sgiliau ym maes y Dyniaethau yn hyrwyddo iechyd da a lles da.
translation.en: Humanities experiences, knowledge and skills promote good health and well-being.

translation.cy: Gallai’r Dyniaethau ystyried pa mor gymhleth yw rhywioldeb ac mae’n cynnwys dimensiynau biolegol, cymdeithasol, seicolegol, ysbrydol, moesegol a diwylliannol sy’n esblygu dros oes.
translation.en: Humanities could consider how sexuality is complex and includes biological, social, psychological, spiritual, ethical and cultural dimensions that evolve over the lifespan.

translation.cy: Fodd bynnag, os bydd rhieni/gofalwyr yn gwneud cais amdani, ac os nad oes unrhyw ysgol leol arall yn gallu ei darparu, rhaid i gorff llywodraethu’r ysgol, cymaint ag sy’n rhesymol bosib, ddarparu addysg grefyddol yn unol â’r maes llafur cytûn.
translation.en: However, if the parents/carers request it, and if no other local school is able to provide it, the governing body of the school shall, as far as reasonably possible, provide religious education in accordance with the agreed syllabus.

translation.cy: Cynigir diddymu’r eithriad.
translation.en: It is proposed that the exemption be repealed.

translation.cy: Nid ydym yn cynnig y bydd yn ofynnol i leoliadau a ariennir nas cynhelir addysgu’r maes llafur cytûn, ond bydd angen iddynt roi sylw i ganllawiau ar y ffordd orau o’i addysgu.
translation.en: We do not propose that funded non-maintained settings will be required to teach the agreed syllabus but they will have to have regard to guidance as to how best this could be taught.

translation.cy: Caiff y gwaith hwn ei wneud gan grŵp o ymarferwyr addysg grefyddol, arloeswyr y cwricwlwm, academyddion, a chynrychiolwyr o Gynghorau Ymgynghorol Sefydlog Addysg Grefyddol (CYSAGau) a’r Panel Ymgynghorol Cenedlaethol Addysg Grefyddol.
translation.en: This is being taken forward by a group of religious education practitioners, curriculum pioneers, academics, and representatives from Standing Advisory Councils on Religious Education (SACREs) and the National Advisory Panel for Religious Education (NAPFRE).

translation.cy: Dylai Maes Dysgu a Phroﬁad y Dyniaethau annog pob dysgwr i ymddiddori yn eu dysgu a chymryd perchenogaeth ohono.
translation.en: The Humanities Area of Learning and Experience should encourage all learners to feel engaged in and have ownership of their learning.

translation.cy: Dylai dysgwyr gael cyﬂeoedd i ystyried yr hyn sy’n dylanwadu ar bobl wrth iddynt ymateb i gyfyng gyngor moesegol, datrys problemau go iawn a phresennol neu ystyried digwyddiadau yn y gorffennol.
translation.en: Learners should have opportunities to consider what inﬂuences people as they respond to ethical dilemmas, solve real and present problems or explore past events.

translation.cy: Dylid hefyd ddethol cynnwys er mwyn sicrhau y gall dysgwyr greu cysylltiadau o fewn a rhwng y datganiadau o’r hyn sy’n bwysig yn y maes dysgu a phroﬁad hwn, ac er mwyn sicrhau cynnydd yn y sgiliau a nodwyd yn y camau cynnydd.
translation.en: Content should also be selected to ensure that learners are able to make connections within and between the what matters statements in this area of learning and experience, and to ensure progression in the skills identiﬁed in the progression steps.

translation.cy: Yn naturiol, bydd disgyblaethau unigol yn dod yn fwy amlwg yng Nghamau cynnydd 4 a 5, a bydd arbenigo yn y fath fodd yn arwain at gynnydd o ran gwybodaeth ddisgyblaethol, sgiliau cymhleth a phroﬁadau mwy cyfoethog.
translation.en: Individual disciplines will naturally become more visible in Progression steps 4 and 5, and such specialisation will involve an increase in depth of disciplinary knowledge, complex skills and enriched experiences.

translation.cy: Ni ddylai’r arbenigo cynyddol hyn mewn disgyblaethau unigol olygu y caiff y cwricwlwm ei gulhau, fodd bynnag.
translation.en: Greater specialisation in individual disciplines should not lead to a narrowing of the curriculum, however.

translation.cy: Bydd taith y dysgwyr drwy’r Dyniaethau yn daith o ymholi a darganfod, wrth iddynt gael eu hannog i fod yn chwilfrydig ac i gwestiynu, i feddwl yn feirniadol a myfyrio ar dystiolaeth.
translation.en: Learners’ journey through Humanities will be characterised by enquiry and discovery, as they are encouraged to be curious and to question, to think critically and to reﬂect upon evidence.

translation.cy: Egwyddorion cynnydd yw’r sail ar gyfer datblygu’r deilliannau cyﬂawniad a dylent lywio dilyniant y dysgu o fewn y maes dysgu a phroﬁad.
translation.en: Principles of progression are the basis on which the achievement outcomes have been developed and should guide the progression of learning within the area of learning and experience.

translation.cy: Bydd y maes dysgu a phroﬁad hwn yn helpu dysgwyr i ennill:
translation.en: This area of learning and experience will help learners gain:

translation.cy: Rwyf wedi dangos chwilfrydedd am y byd o’m cwmpas.
translation.en: I have shown curiosity about the world around me.

translation.cy: Gallaf gasglu a chofnodi gwybodaeth a data o ffynonellau penodol er mwyn ateb cwestiynau penodol.
translation.en: I can collect and record information and data from given sources in order to answer speciﬁc questions.

translation.cy: Gallaf lunio syniadau, gwneud rhagfynegiadau, a chynllunio sawl gwahanol ffordd o fynd i’r afael â sefyllfa neu dasg benodol, yn ogystal ag arbroﬁ ag amrywiaeth o opsiynau wrth roi’r syniadau hyn ar waith.
translation.en: I can generate ideas, make predictions, and plan several different ways to approach a given situation or task, as well as experiment with a range of options when putting these ideas into action.

translation.cy: Gallaf werthuso a myfyrio ar fy ymholiad, gan ddisgriﬁo’r camau rwyf wedi’u cymryd, a dod o hyd i feysydd i’w gwella.
translation.en: I can evaluate and reﬂect on my enquiry, describing the steps I have taken, and identify areas for improvement.

translation.cy: Rwyf wedi proﬁ cyﬂeoedd i ymgymryd â gwaith ymchwil sylfaenol yn fy ardal leol a thu hwnt.
translation.en: I have experienced opportunities for undertaking primary research in my local area and beyond.

translation.cy: Gallaf ystyried amrywiaeth o strategaethau hysbys er mwyn cynnal ymholiad a dethol yn annibynnol y dull gweithredu mwyaf effeithiol.
translation.en: I can consider a range of known strategies to conduct an enquiry and independently select the most effective approach.

translation.cy: Gallaf ddadansoddi fy nghanfyddiadau, gan ddisgriﬁo patrymau ac egluro perthnasau ar drawssetiau data.
translation.en: I can analyse my ﬁndings, describing patterns and explaining relationships across data sets.

translation.cy: Gallaf adnabod ac egluro rhai gwahaniaethau rhwng y broses ymholi yng ngwahanolddisgyblaethau’r Dyniaethau.
translation.en: I can identify and explain some differences between the process of enquiry in the different Humanities disciplines.

translation.cy: Rwyf wedi cynnal ymholiadau sy’n canolbwyntio ar gwestiynau sy’n ymwneud â meysydd pwnc penodol yn y Dyniaethau, yn ogystal â themâu a chwestiynau rhyngddisgyblaethol.
translation.en: I have undertaken enquiries focusing on questions relating to speciﬁc Humanities subject

translation.cy: Gallaf gasglu amrywiaeth o dystiolaeth berthnasol, gan gynnwys data meintiol ac ansoddol.
translation.en: I can gather a variety of relevant evidence, including quantitative and qualitative data.

translation.cy: Gallaf ddehongli tystiolaeth, tybio, a dod i gasgliadau, gan gyfosod amrywiaeth o dystiolaeth.
translation.en: I can interpret evidence, infer meaning and draw conclusions, synthesising a range of evidence.

translation.cy: Rwyf wedi ymgymryd â rôl arweiniol wrth ddatblygu ymholiadau sy’n canolbwyntio ar fy ardal leol, Cymru a’r byd ehangach mewn un neu fwy o ddisgyblaethau’r Dyniaethau.
translation.en: I have taken a leading role in developing enquiries focusing on my locality, Wales, and the wider world in one or more of the disciplines in Humanities.

translation.cy: Gallaf gasglu data sylfaenol ac eilaidd meintiol ac ansoddol yn gywir.
translation.en: I can collect relevant quantitative and qualitative primary and secondary data accurately.

translation.cy: Rwyf wedi ystyried fy nghyfrifoldebau egwyddorol fel ymchwilydd astudiaethau cymdeithasol ac astudiaethau busnes, a gweithredu arnynt.
translation.en: I have considered and acted upon my ethical responsibilities as a social studies and business studies researcher.

translation.cy: • Celf, cerddoriaeth, theatr, llenyddiaeth fel tystiolaeth ar gyfer ymholiadau ac fel canolbwynt iddynt.
translation.en: • Art, music, theatre, literature as evidence for and a focus of enquiries.

translation.cy: Cam cynnydd 2
translation.en: Progression step 2

translation.cy: • archwilio cwestiynau athronyddol am fywyd.
translation.en: • explore philosophical questions about life.

translation.cy: Mae angen i ddysgwyr broﬁ:
translation.en: Learners need to experience:

translation.cy: • defnyddio amrywiaeth o wahanol ffynonellau gweledol, llafar, ysgrifenedig a fﬁsegol
translation.en: • using a range of different visual, oral, written and physical sources

translation.cy: • mynd i’r afael ag ymholiadau, yn unigol ac ar y cyd
translation.en: • engagement in enquiries, individually and collaboratively

translation.cy: • y fethodoleg a ddefnyddir mewn ymholiadau sy’n ymwneud â’r Dyniaethau a’r modd y gall hyn fod yn wahanol ar gyfer gwahanol ddisgyblaethau
translation.en: • the methodology used in Humanities enquiries and how this may differ between disciplines

translation.cy: • arsylwi ar wybodaeth ﬂaenorol a’i defnyddio er mwyn creu cwestiynau priodol
translation.en: • observe and use prior knowledge to ask and frame appropriate questions

translation.cy: • mynd i’r afael ag ymholiadau, yn unigol ac ar y cyd
translation.en: • engagement in enquiries, individually and collaboratively

translation.cy: • Ymholiadau hanesyddol a fydd yn cynnwys datblygu dealltwriaeth o’r defnydd o dystiolaeth ysgrifenedig, weledol a fﬁsegol (gan gynnwys tystiolaeth uniongyrchol neu sylfaenol, yn ogystal â ffynonellau eilaidd), ynghyd â gwerth tystiolaeth o’r fath, a hynny er mwyn egluro sut a pham y caiff dehongliadau hanesyddol eu llunio.
translation.en: • Historical enquiries that would include developing an understanding of the use and value of written, visual, and physical evidence (including ﬁrst-hand or primary evidence, as well as secondary sources) to explain how and why historical interpretations are formed.

translation.cy: Cwricwlwm Drafft i Gymru 2022:
translation.en: Draft Curriculum for Wales 2022:

translation.cy: Mae digwyddiadau a phroﬁadau dynol yn gymhleth a chânt eu canfod, eu dehonglia’u cynrychioli mewn gwahanol ffyrdd.
translation.en: Events and human experiences are complex, and are perceived, interpreted and represented in different ways.

translation.cy: • dyfnder gwybodaeth cynyddol, a nodweddir gan y gallu i gysylltu dysgu newydd â gwybodaeth ﬂaenorol, i feithrin dealltwriaeth fwy sofﬁstigedig, ac i ddatrys yr achosion o wrthdaro a all godi pan ddaw gwahanol safbwyntiau ynghyd
translation.en: • increased depth of knowledge, characterised by linking new learning to existing knowledge, developing a more sophisticated understanding and resolving the conﬂicts that can emerge from different points of view

translation.cy: • defnydd mwy sofﬁstigedig o sgiliau perthnasol, gan gynnwys defnydd o eirfa bwnc-benodol
translation.en: • more sophisticated use of relevant skills, including appropriate use of subject-speciﬁc terminology

translation.cy: Gallaf roi tystiolaeth ar gyfer dadl neu safbwynt a chyﬂwyno gwrthddadleuon.
translation.en: I can give evidence for an argument or viewpoint and present counterarguments.

translation.cy: Deilliannau cyﬂawniad
translation.en: Achievement outcomes

translation.cy: Dyniaethau 36
translation.en: Humanities 35

translation.cy: Gallaf fynegi, cyﬁawnhau a thrafod fy marnau personol mewn trafodaethau ac ar bapur.
translation.en: I can express, justify and discuss my personal opinions in debates and in writing.

translation.cy: Gallaf werthfawrogi fod fy hunaniaeth, fy mhroﬁadau a’m credoau yn dylanwadu ar fy nehongliadau.
translation.en: I can appreciate that my interpretations are inﬂuenced by my identity, experiences and beliefs.

translation.cy: Cam cynnydd 5
translation.en: Progression step 5

translation.cy: Gallaf werthfawrogi’r lensys amrywiol y mae pobl yn eu defnyddio i weld y byd a chydnabod cyfyngiadau fy mhersbectif personol.
translation.en: I can appreciate the varied lenses through which one views the world and recognise the limitations of my own perspective.

translation.cy: Gallaf integreiddio persbectifau newydd neu ddiwygiedig i’m ffordd o feddwl.
translation.en: I can integrate new or revised perspectives into my own thinking.

translation.cy: Gallaf ddeall sut y gall ideolegau gwleidyddol, economaidd a chymdeithasol ddylanwadu ar fy nehongliadau personol ac ar ddehongliadau pobl eraill o rôl a swyddogaeth busnes mewn cymdeithas.
translation.en: I can understand how political, economic and social ideologies inﬂuence my own and other people’s interpretations of the roles and functions of business in society.

translation.cy: Yr Hyn sy’n Bwysig yn y Dyniaethau Cwricwlwm Drafft i Gymru 2022:
translation.en: What Matters in Humanities Draft Curriculum for Wales 2022:

translation.cy: Mae’r adran hon yn awgrymu lle gellid cyfoethogi dysgu drwy wneud cysylltiadau rhwng y datganiadau o’r hyn sy’n bwysig ar draws Maes Dysgu a Phroﬁad y Dyniaethau.
translation.en: This section suggests where learning can be enriched through drawing links between other what matters statements across the Humanities Area of Learning and Experience.

translation.cy: • Deall y gall dehongliadau a safbwyntiau ddatblygu o ymholiadau penodol.
translation.en: • Understanding that interpretations and viewpoints can develop from speciﬁc enquiries.

translation.cy: • Dehongliadau a gyﬂwynir gan ffynonellau a thystiolaeth benodol.
translation.en: • Interpretations presented by speciﬁc sources and evidence.

translation.cy: Mae hefyd yn awgrymu ymhle gellid ystyried gwahanol elfennau o ddysgu gyda’i gilydd er mwyn cefnogi dysgu sy’n fwy holistaidd.
translation.en: It also suggests where different elements of learning could be considered together in order to support more holistic learning.

translation.cy: • Sut mae gwerthoedd a normau unigolion yn creu hunaniaeth gyfunol a gwerthoedd cyfunol.
translation.en: • How the values and norms of individuals form a collective identity and collective values.

translation.cy: Fel rhan o’r datganiad hwn o’r hyn sy’n bwysig, dylai dysgwyr ystyried cysyniadau gan gynnwys canfod ystyr, cwestiynau Eithaf a chwestiynau athronyddol, cynrychioliadau, persbectifau, dehongliadau hanesyddol, arwyddocâd, dilysrwydd a llunio barnau.
translation.en: In this what matters statement, learners should explore concepts including seeking meaning, Ultimate and philosophical questions, representations, perspectives, historical interpretations, signiﬁcance, validity and making judgements.

translation.cy: • amrywiaeth o straeon symbolaidd, arferion, arteffactau, celf, dawns, drama, cerddoriaeth a bwyd.
translation.en: • a range of symbolic stories, rituals, artefacts, art, dance, drama, music and food.

translation.cy: • amrywiaeth o gyﬂeoedd i fynd i’r afael â chwestiynau Eithaf
translation.en: • a range of opportunities to engage with Ultimate questions

translation.cy: • cyﬂeu eu harsylwadau, meddyliau a theimladau gan ddefnyddio geiriau, arwyddion neu symbolau
translation.en: • communicate their observations, thoughts and feelings using words, signs or symbols

translation.cy: • cydnabod bod gan bobl wahanol farnau a safbwyntiau ac y gallant fod yn wahanol i’w barnau a’u safbwyntiau personol.
translation.en: • recognise that people have different opinions and viewpoints and that they may differ from their own.

translation.cy: Mae angen i ddysgwyr broﬁ:
translation.en: Learners need to experience:

translation.cy: • bod gan bobl wahanol farnau ac ailadrodd y dystiolaeth a ddefnyddiwyd i ategu’r barnau hyn
translation.en: • that people have different opinions and recount the evidence used for these opinions

translation.cy: • cael gafael ar ddehongliadau a phersbectifau drwy amrywiaeth o gyfryngau fﬁsegol a digidol
translation.en: • accessing interpretations and perspectives through a variety of physical and digital media

translation.cy: Mae angen i ddysgwyr wybod:
translation.en: Learners need to know:

translation.cy: • y modd y caiff dehongliadau eu llywio a’u ffurﬁo
translation.en: • how interpretations are shaped and formed

translation.cy: • archwilio gwahanol ddehongliadau o bobl, cymdeithasau, cyfnodau amser a digwyddiadau;
translation.en: • explore different interpretations of people, societies, periods of time and events;

translation.cy: • archwilio’r modd y mae gan bobl wahanol ddehongliadau mewn perthynas ag arwyddocâd digwyddiadau, pobl, newidiadau a phroﬁadau
translation.en: • explore how people have differing interpretations relating to the signiﬁcance of events,people, changes and experiences

translation.cy: • amrywiaeth o gyﬂeoedd i glywed a thrafod barnau amgen
translation.en: • a range of opportunities to hear and discuss alternative opinions

translation.cy: • trafodaeth gydweithredol am amrywiaeth eang o safbwyntiau a dehongliadau amrywiol, gan gynnwys cyﬂeoedd ar gyfer trafodaethau ffurﬁol ac anffurﬁol
translation.en: • collaborative discussion on a wide range of varied viewpoints and interpretations, including opportunities for formal and informal debates

translation.cy: • ymchwilio i a deall yr hyn sy’n dylanwadu ar eu dehongliadau a’u barnau personol ac yn eu llywio, a manteisio ar amrywiaeth o ddehongliadau a barnau er mwyn llunio persbectif personol rhesymegol
translation.en: • investigate and understand what inﬂuences and shapes their own interpretations and opinions and be able to draw on a range of interpretations and opinions to come to a reasoned personal perspective

translation.cy: • gwerthuso dilysrwydd a hygrededd dehongliadau drwy drafod y modd y caiff dehongliadau eu llywio a’r modd y gallant newid dros amser
translation.en: • evaluate the validity and credibility of interpretations through discussion of how interpretations are shaped and how they can change over time

translation.cy: • llunio, mynegi a thrafod barnau personol ar amrywiaeth o faterion ar draws y Dyniaethau
translation.en: • form, express and discuss personal opinions about a range of issues across the Humanities

translation.cy: • trafod, dadansoddi a gwerthuso’r dehongliadau a gynigir gan eraill
translation.en: • discuss, analyse and evaluate the interpretations offered by others

translation.cy: Hanes
translation.en: History

translation.cy: • am ganfyddiadau, dehongliadau a chynrychioliadau o fydolygon, credoau ac arferion, symbolaeth, pererindod, arferion, defodau, seremonïau, llenyddiaeth, celf, traddodiadau, dawns a cherddoriaeth crefyddol ac anghrefyddol
translation.en: • perceptions, interpretations and representations of religious and non-religious world views, beliefs and practices, symbolism, pilgrimage, rituals, rites of passage, ceremonies, literature, art, rituals, dance and music

translation.cy: YR HYN SY’N BWYSIG  YN Y DYNIAETHAU
translation.en: WHAT MATTERS IN HUMANITIES

translation.cy: Drwy ddeall amrywiaeth o brosesau fﬁsegol, a’u hachosion a’u heffeithiau, bydd dysgwyr yn gwerthfawrogi sut mae lleoedd, amgylcheddau a thirweddau yn newid yng Nghymru a’r byd ehangach.
translation.en: Through understanding a variety of physical processes, and their causes and effects, learners will appreciate how places, environments and landscapes change within Wales and the wider world.

translation.cy: Gallaf egluro rhai bydolygon crefyddol ac anghrefyddol am natur bywyd a marwolaeth, a chredoau am fywyd ar ôl marwolaeth a’r cysyniad o Realiti Eithaf.
translation.en: I can explain some religious and non-religious world views about the nature of life and death and beliefs about life after death and the concept of Ultimate Reality.

translation.cy: Gallaf werthuso ac egluro patrymau parhad a newid yn y berthynas rhwng pobl a’r amgylchedd yn y presennol a’r gorffennol, a’r effaith a gaiff y naill ar y llall dros ystod o gyd-destunau ac ar amrywiaeth o raddfeydd, a gallaf awgrymu strategaethau posibl i leihau’r effeithiau hyn.
translation.en: I can evaluate and explain the patterns of continuity and change in the relationship between humans and the environment in the past and present, and the impact each has upon the other in a range of contexts and at a range of scales, and can suggest possible strategies to reduce these impacts.

translation.cy: Yr Hyn sy’n Bwysig yn y Dyniaethau Cwricwlwm Drafft i Gymru 2022:
translation.en: What Matters in Humanities Draft Curriculum for Wales 2022:

translation.cy: Mae hefyd yn awgrymu ymhle gellid ystyried gwahanol elfennau o ddysgu gyda’i gilydd er mwyn cefnogi dysgusy’n fwy holistaidd.
translation.en: It also suggests where different elements of learning could be considered together in order to support more holistic learning.

translation.cy: • Dehongliadau o newidiadau i’r byd naturiol.
translation.en: • Interpretations of changes to the natural world.

translation.cy: • Effaith gymharol gwahanol gymdeithasau ar wahanol adegau ar y byd naturiol.
translation.en: • The relative impact of different societies at different times on the natural world.

translation.cy: • Amser a threfn gronolegol.
translation.en: • Time and chronological ordering.

translation.cy: Fel rhan o’r datganiad hwn o’r hyn sy’n bwysig, dylai dysgwyr ystyried cysyniadau sy’n gysylltiedig â lle, gofod, yr amgylchedd, prosesau fﬁsegol, arwyddocâd, achos ac effaith, a newid a pharhad.
translation.en: In this what matters statement, learners should explore the concepts of place, space, environment,physical processes, signiﬁcance, cause and effect, and change and continuity.

translation.cy: Cam cynnydd 1
translation.en: Progression step 1

translation.cy: • dysgu yn yr awyr agored, sy’n cynnwys archwilio a phroﬁadau uniongyrchol o leoedd, amgylcheddau a thirweddau, er mwyn deall sut mae’r byd naturiol yn gweithio (dylai hyn gynnwys ardal leol y dysgwr ei hun)
translation.en: • outdoor learning, which includes exploration and ﬁrst-hand experiences of places, environments and landscapes, to help them understand how the natural world works (this should include the learner’s own locality)

translation.cy: Mae angen i ddysgwyr allu a gwybod sut i:
translation.en: Learners need to know how to and be able to:

translation.cy: • adnabod nodweddion penodol lleoedd, amgylcheddau a thirweddau drwy archwiliadau uniongyrchol
translation.en: • identify the distinctive features of places, environments and landscapes through ﬁrst-hand exploration

translation.cy: • dangos ymwybyddiaeth o rai bydolygon crefyddol ac anghrefyddol am y byd naturiol, gan gynnwys am darddiadau’r byd naturiol
translation.en: • show awareness of some religious and non-religious world views about the natural world, including about the origins of the natural world

translation.cy: • disgriﬁo rhai o’r effeithiau y mae pobl fel defnyddwyr a chynhyrchwyr yn eu cael ar leoedd,amgylcheddau a thirweddau
translation.en: • describe some of the effects that humans as consumers and producers have on places, environments and landscapes

translation.cy: • disgriﬁo’r modd y mae’r byd naturiol wedi effeithio ar bobl a’u hamgylcheddau yn y gorffennol a’r presennol
translation.en: • describe how the natural world has impacted on people and their environments in the past and present

translation.cy: Mae angen i ddysgwyr broﬁ:
translation.en: Learners need to experience:

translation.cy: • adnabod sut mae’r byd naturiol wedi effeithio ar bobl yn y gorffennol a’r presennol mewn ffyrdd cadarnhaol a negyddol
translation.en: • identify how the natural world has impacted on humans in the past and present in both positive and negative ways

translation.cy: • cyﬂeoedd i feithrin chwilfrydedd ynghylch y byd naturiol a gwerthfawrogiad ohono
translation.en: • opportunities to develop a curiosity about and an appreciation of the natural world

translation.cy: Mae angen i ddysgwyr wybod:
translation.en: Learners need to know:

translation.cy: • disgriﬁo ac egluro patrymau a rhesymau dros newidiadau o ran dosbarthiad gofodol aneddiadau a nodweddion, megis mudo, poblogaeth neu ddiwydianeiddio
translation.en: • describe and explain patterns and reasons for changes in spatial distribution of settlements and features, such as migration, population or industrialisation

translation.cy: • am amrywiaeth o gredoau, athrawiaethau ac arferion crefyddol ac anghrefyddol sy’n gysylltiedig â gofodau, lleoedd a ffenomena arwyddocaol yn y byd naturiol
translation.en: • about a range of religious and non-religious beliefs, teachings and practices associated with signiﬁcant spaces, places and phenomena in the natural world

translation.cy: • gwerthuso’n feirniadol ystod o ffactorau sydd wedi cael effaith ar yr amgylchedd yng Nghymru a’r byd ehangach ac sy’n parhau i gael effeithiau, megis newid yn yr hinsawdd a chanlyniadau byw mewn modd anghynaliadwy
translation.en: • critically evaluate a variety of factors that have and continue to have an impact on the environment in Wales and the wider world, such as climate change and the consequences of living in an unsustainable way

translation.cy: • archwilio amrywiaeth o amgylcheddau a chael cyﬂeoedd i feithrin eu chwilfrydedd ynghylch yr amgylcheddau hynny a’u gwerthfawrogiad ohonynt
translation.en: • explore a range of environments and experience opportunities to develop their curiosity about and appreciation of them

translation.cy: Yr Hyn sy’n Bwysig yn y Dyniaethau Cwricwlwm Drafft i Gymru 2022:
translation.en: What Matters in Humanities Draft Curriculum for Wales 2022:

translation.cy: • gwybodaeth ddyfnach, a nodweddir gan y gallu i gysylltu dysgu newydd â gwybodaeth ﬂaenorol, i feithrin dealltwriaeth fwy sofﬁstigedig, ac i ddatrys yr achosion o wrthdaro a all godi pan ddaw gwahanol safbwyntiau ynghyd
translation.en: • increased depth of knowledge, characterised by linking new learning to existing knowledge, developing a more sophisticated understanding and resolving the conﬂicts that can emerge from different points of view

translation.cy: Deilliannau cyﬂawniad
translation.en: Achievement outcomes

translation.cy: Gallaf adnabod amseroedd, digwyddiadau a thraddodiadau arbennig yn fy nghymuned a’r byd ehangach.
translation.en: I can identify special times, events and traditions in my community and in the wider world.

translation.cy: Gallaf ddangos ymwybyddiaeth fy mod yn rhan o wahanol gymunedau.
translation.en: I can show an awareness that I am part of different communities.

translation.cy: Gallaf gydnabod pwysigrwydd y gwahanol reolau, rolau a chyfrifoldebau yn yr amrywiol gymunedau rwy’n perthyn iddynt.
translation.en: I can recognise the importance of the different rules, roles and responsibilities within the various communities to which I belong.

translation.cy: Yr Hyn sy’n Bwysig yn y Dyniaethau Cwricwlwm Drafft i Gymru 2022:
translation.en: What Matters in Humanities Draft Curriculum for Wales 2022:

translation.cy: Dyniaethau 63
translation.en: Humanities 61

translation.cy: Gallaf egluro achosion a natur anghydraddoldebau rhwng cymdeithasau ac o fewn cymdeithasau.
translation.en: I can explain the causes and nature of inequalities between and within societies.

translation.cy: • Effaith gymharol gwahanol gymdeithasau ar wahanol adegau ar y byd naturiol.
translation.en: • The relative impact of different societies at different times on the natural world.

translation.cy: Mae dinasyddion gwybodus, hunanymwybodol yn mynd i’r afael â’r heriau a’r cyﬂeoeddsy’n wynebu dynoliaeth, ac yn gallu cymryd camau ystyrlon, egwyddorol a chynaliadwy.
translation.en: Informed, self-aware citizens engage with the challenges and opportunities that face humanity, and are able to take considered, ethical and sustainable action.

translation.cy: Gwyddoniaeth a Thechnoleg
translation.en: Science and Technology

translation.cy: Yr Hyn sy’n Bwysig yn y Dyniaethau Cwricwlwm Drafft i Gymru 2022:
translation.en: What Matters in Humanities Draft Curriculum for Wales 2022:

translation.cy: Dyniaethau 67
translation.en: Humanities 65

translation.cy: • cyﬂeoedd i ddefnyddio technoleg ddigidol i gymryd rhan mewn ymweliadau rhithwir ac i gyfathrebu ag amrywiaeth o bobl mewn cymuned fyd-eang
translation.en: • opportunities to use digital technology to participate in virtual visits and to communicate with a range of people in a global community

translation.cy: • sut mae bywydau pobl yn wahanol o fewn cymdeithasau, ac mewn gwahanol leoliadau ac ar wahanol adegau, ac yn gallu rhoi rhesymau dros y gwahaniaethau hyn
translation.en: • how people’s lives differ within societies, and in different places and at different times, and be able to give reasons for these differences

translation.cy: Cam cynnydd 4
translation.en: Progression step 4

translation.cy: • cyﬂeoedd i archwilio ac ymgysylltu â’u cymunedau a thu hwnt, drwy straeon, dathliadau,gwrthrychau, digwyddiadau a thraddodiadau, a chyﬂeu eu teimladau amdanynt
translation.en: • opportunities to explore and engage with their communities and beyond, through stories, celebrations, objects, events and traditions, and to communicate their feelings about them

translation.cy: • sut a pham y mae cymdeithasau a bywydau pobl wedi newid neu wedi aros yr un peth, a gallu esbonio a llunio barn am effaith newid a pharhad
translation.en: • how and why societies and people’s lives have changed or stayed the same, and be able to explain and make judgements about the signiﬁcance of change and continuity

translation.cy: Mae Cwricwlwm i Gymru 2022 yn ceisio caniatáu ar gyfer ehangu’r dysgu, gan gefnogi lleoliadau ac ysgolion i fod yn fwy hyblyg o ran eu dulliau gweithredu, ac yn darparu mwy o asiantaeth i arweinwyr addysg ac ymarferwyr, ac felly eu galluogi i fod yn arloesol a chreadigol.
translation.en: Curriculum for Wales 2022 seeks to allow for a broadening of learning, supporting settings and schools to be more ﬂexible in their approaches, and provides education leaders and practitioners with greater agency, enabling them to be innovative and creative.

translation.cy: Rhaid i’r meysydd dysgu a phroﬁad gynnwys Cymraeg, Saesneg, addysg grefyddol, addysg cydberthynas a rhywioldeb, a’r tri chyfrifoldeb trawsgwricwlaidd, sef llythrennedd, rhifedd a chymhwysedd digidol, fel sy’n briodol.
translation.en: Welsh, English, religious education, relationships and sexuality education, and the three cross-curricular responsibilities of literacy, numeracy and digital competence must be embedded in the areas of learning and experience as appropriate.

translation.cy: Bydd Llywodraeth Cymru yn ystyried yr hyn a ddaw o’r ymgynghoriad Papur Gwyn Cenhadaeth ein Cenedl:
translation.en: The Welsh Government will consider the outcomes of the White Paper consultation Our National Mission:

translation.cy: Cwricwlwm Gweddnewidiol wrth wneud penderfyniadau ar gynigion terfynol ar gyfer deddfwriaeth ar y cwricwlwm.
translation.en: A Transformational Curriculum to inform decisions on ﬁnalising proposals for legislation on the curriculum.

translation.cy: Maent wedi ymchwilio i arferion gorau a modelau cwricwlwm, ac wedi ystyried cyngor arbenigol er mwyn ceisio gweithredu canfyddiadau ac argymhellion Dyfodol Llwyddiannus:
translation.en: They have researched best practice and curriculum models, considered expert advice, in order to take forward the ﬁndings and recommendations from Successful Futures:

translation.cy: Bydd y cwricwlwm yn cael ei gyﬂwyno i Flwyddyn 8 ym mis Medi 2023 ﬂwyddyn ar ôl blwyddyn hyd nes y’i cyﬂwynir i Flwyddyn 11 yn 2026.
translation.en: The curriculum will roll out to Year 8 in September 2023 and year on year until it is introduced to Year 11 in 2026.

translation.cy: • unigolion iach, hyderus sy’n barod i fyw bywyd gan wireddu eu dyheadau fel aelodau gwerthfawr o gymdeithas.
translation.en: • healthy, conﬁdent individuals, ready to lead fulﬁlling lives as valued members of society.

translation.cy: Mae hyn hefyd yn berthnasol i leoliadau a ariennir nas cynhelir.
translation.en: This also applies to funded non-maintained settings.

translation.cy: • Gwyddoniaeth a Thechnoleg
translation.en: • Science and Technology.

translation.cy: • cymorth i gynllunio ar gyfer dysgu.
translation.en: • planning for learning support.

translation.cy: Dylai’r dysgu fod yn gydlynol ac wedi’i gynllunio ar draws y meysydd dysgu a phroﬁad gwahanol, gan adeiladu ar gysylltiadau, dibyniaethau a rhyngddibyniaethau cynhenid.
translation.en: Learning should be coherent and planned across the different areas of learning and experience, building on inherent links, dependencies and interdependencies.

translation.cy: Dylai ymarferwyr gynnwys dysgu i gyﬂawni’r dyletswyddau hyn o fewn a, lle’n briodol, ar draws y meysydd dysgu a phroﬁad, a dylai’r cyfrifoldebau trawsgwricwlaidd sef llythrennedd, rhifedd a chymhwysedd digidol gael eu cynnwys ym mhob maes dysgu a phroﬁad fel y bo’n briodol.
translation.en: Practitioners should embed learning to meet these duties within and, where appropriate, across the areas of learning and experience, and the cross-curricular responsibilities of literacy, numeracy and digital competence should be embedded across all areas of learning and experience as appropriate.

translation.cy: Gall dysgu dwfn helpu i sicrhau bod y disgriﬁadau dysgu yn y deilliannau cyﬂawniad yn cael eu cyﬂawni.
translation.en: Deep learning can support learning descriptions in the achievement outcomes to be met securely.

translation.cy: Mae’r canllawiau Cwricwlwm i Gymru 2022 ar gyfer pob maes dysgu a phroﬁad yn cynnwys gwybodaeth ychwanegol sy’n cael ei ystyried yn hanfodol ar gyfer cynllunio a datblygu cwricwla mewn lleoliadau ac ysgolion.
translation.en: The Curriculum for Wales 2022 guidance for each area of learning and experience includes additional information considered essential to design and development of curricula in settings and schools.

translation.cy: Maent hefyd yn cynnwys deunyddiau ategol sy’n egluro sut mae’r maes dysgu a phroﬁad yn cefnogi’r dysgu yn yr elfennau hyn.
translation.en: They also include supporting material which explains how the area of learning and experience supports learning in these elements.

translation.cy: Mae’r cyfrifoldebau trawsgwricwlaidd, sef llythrennedd, rhifedd a chymhwysedd digidol, yn sail i bron pob math o ddysgu ac maent yn hanfodol er mwyn i ddysgwyr allu cymryd rhan yn llwyddiannus ac yn hyderus yn y byd modern.
translation.en: The cross-curricular responsibilities of literacy, numeracy and digital competence support almost all learning and are essential for learners to be able to participate successfully and conﬁdently in the modern world.

translation.cy: Maent wedi’u hymgorffori ar draws canllawiau Cwricwlwm i Gymru 2022, lle maent yn cefnogi’r dysgu a amlinellir yn y canllawiau meysydd dysgu a phroﬁad.
translation.en: They are embedded within Curriculum for Wales 2022 guidance, where they support the learning set out within the areas of learning and experience guidance.

translation.cy: Addysg cydberthynas a rhywioldeb
translation.en: Relationships and sexuality education

translation.cy: Mae pedwar diben y cwricwlwm yn cefnogi dysgwyr i dyfu yn unigolion iach, hyderus sy’n gallu ffurﬁo cydberthnasau cadarnhaol wedi’u seilio ar ymddiriedaeth a pharch at ei gilydd, a datblygu eu lles meddyliol ac emosiynol drwy ddatblygu hyder, cadernid ac empathi.
translation.en: The four purposes of the curriculum support learners to grow as healthy, conﬁdent individuals who are able to build relationships based on mutual trust and respect, and develop their mental and emotional well-being by developing their resilience and empathy.

translation.cy: • gydberthnasau
translation.en: • relationships

translation.cy: • trais a chadw’n ddiogel
translation.en: • violence and staying safe

translation.cy: Nid ydym yn cynnig y bydd yn ofynnol i leoliadau a ariennir nas cynhelir addysgu’r maes llafur cytûn, ond bydd angen iddynt roi sylw i ganllawiau ar y ffordd orau o’i addysgu.
translation.en: We do not propose that funded non-maintained settings will be required to teach the agreed syllabus but they will have to have regard to guidance as to how best this could be taught.

translation.cy: Gofynion statudol arfaethedig eraill Cwricwlwm Drafft i Gymru 2022:
translation.en: Other proposed statutory requirements Draft Curriculum for Wales 2022:

translation.cy: Caiff y gwaith hwn ei wneud gan grŵp o ymarferwyr addysg grefyddol, arloeswyr y cwricwlwm, academyddion, a chynrychiolwyr o Gynghorau Ymgynghorol Sefydlog Addysg Grefyddol (CYSAGau) a Phanel Ymgynghorol Cenedlaethol Addysg Grefyddol.
translation.en: This is being taken forward by a group of religious education practitioners, curriculum pioneers, academics, and representatives from Standing Advisory Councils on Religious Education (SACREs) and the National Advisory Panel for Religious Education (NAPFRE).

translation.cy: Un o brif nodweddion pedwar diben y cwricwlwm yw datblygu dysgwyr uchelgeisiol, galluog sy’n gallu cyfathrebu’n effeithiol mewn gwahanol ffurﬁau a lleoliadau, drwy’r Gymraeg a’r Saesneg.
translation.en: One of the key characteristics of the four purposes of the curriculum is to develop ambitious, capable learners who can communicate effectively in different forms and settings, using both Welsh and English.

translation.cy: Y cynigion cyfredol ar gyfer deddfwriaeth yw y bydd dyletswydd ar bob lleoliad a ariennir nas cynhelir ac ysgol i ddysgu Cymraeg i ddysgwyr 3 i 16 oed.
translation.en: Current proposals for legislation are that there will be a duty on all funded non-maintained settings and schools to teach Welsh for learners aged 3 to 16.

translation.cy: Byddwn yn adolygu’r disgwyliadau ar gyfer dysgwyr sy’n dysgu’r Gymraeg mewn lleoliadau/ysgolion/ffrydiau cyfrwng Saesneg ac yn cynyddu’r disgwyliadau hynny wrth i’r carfannau weithio trwy Gwricwlwm i Gymru 2022, ac wrth i sgiliau methodolegol a phroﬁad ymarferwyr gynyddu.
translation.en: Expectations for those learning Welsh in English-medium settings/schools/streams will be reviewed and gradually increased as cohorts learn through Curriculum for Wales 2022, and as the Welsh language methodology skills and experience of practitioners increase.

translation.cy: Bydd hyn yn cyfrannu at wireddu’r uchelgais o gael miliwn o siaradwyr Cymraeg erbyn 2050.
translation.en: This will contribute to realising the ambition of having one million Welsh speakers by 2050.

translation.cy: Mae’r Maes Dysgu a Phroﬁad Ieithoedd, Llythrennedd a Chyfathrebu yn dod â Chymraeg, Saesneg ac ieithoedd rhyngwladol ynghyd.
translation.en: The Languages, Literacy and Communication Area of Learning and Experience brings together English, Welsh and international languages.

translation.en: This is supported by each area of learning and experience.

translation.cy: • ymwybyddiaeth o sgiliau unigol, rhinweddau a diddordebau, a sut y maent yn effeithio ar ddewisiadau gyrfa, gan godi dyheadau dysgwyr a dealltwriaeth o ganlyniadau
translation.en: • awareness of individual skills, attributes and interests, and how they impact on career choices, raising learner aspiration and understanding of consequences

translation.cy: Mae hyn yn sylfaen ar gyfer dysgu parhaus, sy’n galluogi dysgwyr uwchradd i wneud penderfyniadau gyrfa deallus a phriodol.
translation.en: This forms the basis of continued learning, enabling learners in secondary school to make informed and appropriate careers decisions.

translation.cy: Dylid cyﬂawni’r ehangder dysgu ar draws y meysydd dysgu a phroﬁad drwy ddysgu parhaus hyd at 16 oed er mwyn rhoi sylfaen addysgol gadarn i ddysgwyr ar gyfer eu bywyd, eu hastudiaethau a’u gwaith yn y dyfodol.
translation.en: Breadth of learning across the areas of learning and experience should be achieved through continued learning up to the age of 16 to provide learners with a sound educational basis for future life, study and work.

translation.en: Draft guidance to support the new Curriculum for Wales 2022 has been designed with the four purposes of the curriculum at its heart.

translation.en: This document sets out proposals that will underpin assessment in Curriculum for Wales 2022.

translation.en: Learner progression and their journey towards the four purposes of the curriculum have been central in its development.

translation.cy: Yn ddiweddar cyﬂwynwyd y cynigion deddfwriaethol i gefnogi’r cwricwlwm newydd a’r trefniadau asesu yn ymgynghoriad Papur Gwyn Cenhadaeth Ein Cenedl:

translation.en: This will support professional dialogue regarding the nature of progression, the selection of appropriate learning and assessment activities, as well as ensuring a shared understanding of what achievement looks like in the context of the achievement outcomes.

translation.en: This will help them plan appropriately, agree next steps for each individual learner, seek additional support if needed, and report back to parents/carers.

translation.cy: Mae’r dangosydd Sgôr Pwyntiau wedi’i Chapio CA4 yn mesur sgorau pwyntiau cyfartalog fesul disgybl 15 oed ar gyfer yr holl gymwysterau a gyflawnir ar bob gradd hyd at yr hyn sy’n cyfateb i 8 TGAU (h.y. yr ‘8 TGAU gorau neu gyfwerth’), ac mae wedi ei seilio ar gyfartaledd tair blynedd dros y blynyddoedd academaidd 2010/11 – 2012/13.
translation.en: The indicator on KS4 Capped Point Score measures the average points per 15 year old for all qualifications at all grades achieved up to the equivalent of 8 GCSEs (i.e. the ‘best 8 GCSEs or equivalent’), and is based on a three-year average (academic years 2010/11-2012/13).

translation.cy: Mae’r data’n deillio o’r Cyfrifiad Ysgolion Blynyddol ar Lefel Disgyblion.

translation.en: The indicator on KS2 Average Point Score measures the average point scores of pupils as assessed by teachers in the final year of primary school, and is based on a three-year average (academic years 2010/11-2012/13).

translation.cy: Gostyngodd canran yr oedolion heb unrhyw gymwysterau o 29.2 yn 2008 (a ddefnyddiwyd ar gyfer MALIC 2011) i 19.6 yn 2014.
