translation.en: Chapter 17 addresses when it will be necessary for a local authority to continue to maintain an IDP for a young person.

translation.cy: Mae Pennod 22 yn rhoi rhagor o arweiniad am gydlynu cyfarfodydd at y dibenion hyn.
translation.en: Chapter 22 provides further guidance on co-ordinating meetings for these purposes.

translation.cy: 34 Adrannau 23(10) a 24(9) o’r Ddeddf.
translation.en: Sections 23(10) and 24(9) of the Act.

translation.cy: Os bydd ysgol a gynhelir neu sefydliad addysg bellach yn adolygu’r CDU, gall ddod i’r amlwg bod angen i’r awdurdod lleol gymryd drosodd y cyfrifoldeb am y CDU oherwydd natur anghenion y plentyn neu’r person ifanc.
translation.en: Where a maintained school or FEI is reviewing the IDP, it might become apparent that the child’s or young person’s needs are such that the local authority might need to take over responsibility for the IDP.

translation.cy: Yn dilyn adolygiad, pan fydd ysgol a gynhelir, sefydliad addysg bellach neu awdurdod lleol yn hysbysu plentyn, rhiant y plentyn neu berson ifanc ynghylch ei benderfyniad i beidio â diwygio CDU neu’n rhoi copi o CDU diwygiedig i blentyn, rhiant y plentyn neu berson ifanc, rhaid i’r ysgol, y sefydliad addysg bellach neu’r awdurdod lleol roi’r canlynol hefyd:
translation.en: Following a review, when a maintained school, FEI or local authority notifies a child, the child’s parent or a young person of its decision not to revise an IDP or gives a copy of a revised IDP to a child, the child’s parent or a young person, the school, FEI or local authority must also give:

translation.cy: y dyddiad arfaethedig ar gyfer dechrau’r adolygiad nesaf;
translation.en: the proposed date for starting the next review;

translation.cy: manylion trefniadau’r awdurdod lleol cyfrifol ar gyfer osgoi a datrys anghytundebau a’i wasanaethau eirioli annibynnol;
translation.en: details of the responsible local authority’s arrangements for the avoidance and resolution of disagreements and its independent advocacy services;

translation.cy: O dan adran 28 o’r Ddeddf.
translation.en: Under section 28 of the Act.

translation.cy: yn achos CDU a gynhelir gan sefydliad addysg bellach neu awdurdod lleol, gwybodaeth am yr hawl i apelio i’r Tribiwnlys ynghylch agweddau penodol ar y CDU.
translation.en: in the case of an IDP maintained by an FEI or local authority, information about the right to appeal to the Tribunal about particular aspects of the IDP.

translation.cy: Gweler y penodau hynny am fanylion y gofynion amserlen, yn cynnwys yr eithriad.
translation.en: See those chapters for the detail of the timescale requirements, including the exception.

translation.cy: Ailystyriaeth gan awdurdodau lleol o CDU ysgol a gynhelir
translation.en: A local authority’s reconsideration of a maintained school IDP

translation.cy: Pan wneir cais o’r fath, rhaid i’r awdurdod lleol roi gwybod i’r ysgol a gwahodd yr ysgol i roi ei sylwadau cyn i’r awdurdod lleol benderfynu a ddylid diwygio’r CDU.
translation.en: Where such a request is made, the local authority must inform the school and invite representations from it before the local authority decides whether to revise the IDP.

translation.en: The chapter sets out general principles and good practice on planning for transitions and highlights the additional support some learners with ALN may require to overcome common issues related to transitions.

translation.en: Children and young people with ALN may find transitions more challenging than their peers do and consequently, may need additional support to ensure their education or training, including their ALP, is not adversely effected by the transition.

translation.en: Early and co-ordinated transition planning will support children and young people with ALN to make positive transitions.

translation.cy: Efallai y bydd angen dulliau gweithredu gwahanol ar wahanol bwyntiau pontio, gan ddibynnu ar ffactorau fel anghenion penodol y plentyn neu'r person ifanc neu natur y lleoliad newydd y mae'n pontio iddo.
translation.en: Different transition points may require different approaches depending on factors such as the child or young person’s specific needs or the nature of the new setting they are transitioning to.

translation.cy: Fodd bynnag, mewn achosion eraill, mae adolygiad CDU sy'n digwydd yn fuan ar ôl pontio i leoliad newydd yn rhoi cyfle i'r plentyn, rhiant y plentyn, neu'r person ifanc drafod ei brofiad a thrafod a oes angen gwneud unrhyw ddiwygiadau i'w CDU yn sgil hynny.
translation.en: However, in other cases, an IDP review which takes place shortly after a transition to a new setting gives the opportunity for the child, a child’s parent, or the young person to discuss their experience and whether any revisions need to be made to their IDP in light of it.

translation.cy: Nid yw’r gwaith o gynllunio proses bontio wedi'i gyfyngu i adolygiadau CDU, a gall cynllunio ehangach ddigwydd y tu allan i adolygiad ffurfiol.
translation.en: Transition planning is not confined to IDP reviews and broader transition planning can take place outside a formal review.

translation.cy: Fodd bynnag, bydd yn cymryd llawer mwy o amser i gynllunio rhai pwyntiau pontio nag eraill.

translation.en: For learners in year 9, 10 or 11, the school or local authority undertaking a review of their IDP which is to consider transition from compulsory education may wish to involve a careers adviser in the review to discuss career options.

translation.en: The matters specified by the FSA must include an assessment of the levels of risk to public health— (a) associated with the type of food handled by an establishment, (b) associated with the method of handling the food, and arising from the record of compliance with food hygiene law at the establishment.

translation.en: This section amends section 57 of FHEA 1992 which enables the Welsh Ministers to intervene in a FEI (by making changes to the governing body or issuing directions), if they consider that the FEI is being mis-managed or otherwise failing.

translation.cy: Effaith y diwygiadau yw dileu'r gofyniad i SABau gydymffurfio â chyfarwyddiadau a wneir gan Weinidogion Cymru mewn perthynas â chynllunio cwricwla lleol a chydweithio i ddarparu cwricwla lleol.
translation.en: The effect of the amendments is to remove the requirement for FEIs to comply with directions made by the Welsh Ministers relating to the planning of local curricula and joint working to deliver local curricula.

translation.cy: Mae’r adran hon yn darparu bod rhaid i Weinidogion Cymru, heb fod yn hwyrach na 31 Gorffennaf 2016, adolygu gweithrediad y Ddeddf.
translation.en: This section provides that the Welsh Ministers must no later than 31 July 2016 review the operation of the Act.

translation.cy: Yn benodol, rhaid i Weinidogion Cymru ystyried effaith y Ddeddf ar ariannu addysg a ddarperir i’r rhaisy’n 16 i 18 oed mewn SABau yng Nghymru.
translation.en: In particular the Welsh Ministers must consider the Act’s impact on the funding of education provided to those aged 16 to 18 at Welsh FEIs.

translation.cy: Cynnwys
translation.en: Contents

translation.cy: gofynion cwricwlwmarfaethedig a nodir mewn deddfwriaeth ar gyfer pob dysgwr 3 i 16, er mwyn sicrhau bod yr un dysgu craidd yn digwydd ym mhob ysgol, a sicrhau dull cyson ar gyfer yr holl ddysgwyr yng Nghymru
translation.en: the proposed curriculum requirementsset out in legislation for all learners aged 3 to 16, to ensure all schools cover the same core learning and to secure a consistency of approach for learners across Wales

translation.cy: Er mwyn cynorthwyo ysgolion i ddatblygu eu cwricwlwm, byddwn yn cyhoeddi canllawiau Cwricwlwm i Gymru.
translation.en: To assist schools to develop their curriculum, we will publish the Curriculum for Wales guidance.

translation.cy: Wrth wireddu’r rhain, rydym yn gosod disgwyliadau uchel i bawb, yn hyrwyddo lles personol a chenedlaethol, yn herio anwybodaeth a ffug-wybodaeth, ac yn annog dysgwyr i chwarae eu rhan fel dinasyddion effro a beirniadol.
translation.en: In fulfilling these, we set high expectations for all, promote individual and national well-being, tackle ignorance and misinformation, and encourage critical and civic engagement.

translation.cy: Mae’r Fframwaith hwn yn sy’n cael ei bennu’n genedlaethol ac mae’n cynnwys gofynion i gwricwlwm, a fydd yn cael eu nodi mewn deddfwriaeth, ynghyd ag ystod o ganllawiau ategol.
translation.en: The Framework is determined nationally and includes both the curriculum requirements, which will be set out in legislation, and a range of supporting guidance.

translation.cy: Nid yw Fframwaith yn gofyn bod lleoliadau ac ysgolion yn datblygu amserlen sydd wedi’i strwythuro’n benodol yn ôl y Meysydd, na chwaith drefnu’r lleoliad/ysgol na’r staffio ar sail hyn.
translation.en: The Framework does notrequire settings and schools to develop a timetable explicitly structured along the lines of the Areas or to organise the setting or school or staffing on that basis.

translation.cy: Yn lle hyn, mae canllawiau Cwricwlwm i Gymru yn gosod yr hanfodion dysgu a ddylai fod yn sail i’r testunau a’r gweithgareddau hyn.
translation.en: Instead, the Curriculum for Wales guidance sets out the essence of learning which should underpin them.

translation.cy: ddarparu cwricwlwm fydd yn gallu cael ei fabwysiadu gan leoliadau meithrin a ariennir nas cynhelir.
translation.en: be required to provide a curriculum which funded non-maintained nursery settings can adopt.

translation.cy: Nodwedd arbennig arall o’r fframwaith yw’r pwyslais a roddir ar gynnydd dysgwyr.
translation.en: Another defining characteristic of the framework is the emphasis placed on learners’ progression.

translation.cy: Trwy archwilio’r syniadau a’r egwyddorion allweddol sy’n cael eu cynnwys yn y datganiadau hyn y byddan nhw’n datblygu eu dysgu.
translation.en: It is through exploration of the key ideas and principles contained in these statements that they will develop their learning.

translation.cy: Maen nhw wedi’u trefnu yn bum cam cynnydd sy’n cynnwys cyfeirbwyntiau ar gyfer cyflymder y cynnydd.
translation.en: These are arranged in five progression steps which provide reference points for the pace of that progression.

translation.cy: Caiff canllawiau penodol, ar wahân, eu darparu ar gyfer y lleoliadau hyn yn 2021.
translation.en: Separate, specific guidance will be provided for these settings in 2021.

translation.cy: Os caiff y Bil ei basio, bydd y crynodeb hwn yn cael ei ddiweddaru a'i ehangu i helpu i gynorthwyo’r broses o gynllunio, mabwysiadu a gweithredu cwricwlwm ysgol neu gwricwlwm perthnasol arall.
translation.en: If the Bill is passed, this summary will be updated and expanded to help in the design, adoption and implementation of a school curriculum or other relevant curriculum.

translation.cy: Rhaid cydymffurfio â’r dyletswyddau hyn.
translation.en: Duties must be complied with.

translation.cy: Gofynion deddfwriaethol arfaethedig – gofynion cwricwlwm
translation.en: Proposed legislative requirements – the curriculum requirements

translation.cy: Pwrpas cwricwlwm yw galluogi dysgwyr i ddatblygu fel:
translation.en: The purpose of a curriculum is to enable learners to develop as:

translation.cy: cyfranwyr mentrus, creadigol sy'n barod i chwarae rhan lawn mewn bywyd a gwaith
translation.en: enterprising, creative contributors, ready to play a full part in life and work

translation.cy: Darparu ar gyfer dilyniant priodol i ddysgwyr a chynnwys ystod o ddarpariaeth i sicrhau hyn (yn gysylltiedig ag oedrannau, galluoedd a doniau).
translation.en: Provide for appropriate progression for learners and includes a range of provision to ensure this (linked to ages, abilities and aptitudes).

translation.cy: Mae'n rhaid i gwricwlwm pob ysgol a phob lleoliad a ariennir nas cynhelir gynnwys yr holl elfennau a nodir yng nghod datganiadau o’r hyn sy’n bwysig.
translation.en: All the elements set out in the statements of what matters code must be covered in each school and funded non-maintained settings’ curriculum.

translation.cy: adlewyrchu'r egwyddorion cynnydd a nodir yn y cod cynnydd
translation.en: reflect the principles of progression set out in the progression code

translation.cy: Rhaid i ysgolion gyhoeddi crynodeb o'r cwricwlwm a fabwysiedir ganddyn nhw ac adolygu’r cwricwlwm hwnnw’n barhaus.
translation.en: Schools must publish a summary of their adopted curriculum and keep their curriculum under review.

translation.cy: addas ar gyfer dysgwyr o wahanol oedrannau, galluoedd a doniau
translation.en: is suitable for learners of different ages, abilities and aptitudes

translation.cy: Bydd angen i leoliadaumeithrin a ariennir nas cynhelir fabwysiadu cwricwlwm ar gyfer eu dysgwyr.
translation.en: Funded non-maintained nursery settings will be required to adopt a curriculum for their learners.

translation.cy: Bydd Gweinidogion Cymru yn sicrhau bod y cwricwlwm hwn ar gael yn 2021 ac yn cynnwys y sector yn y broses o'i ddatblygu.
translation.en: The Welsh Ministers will make this curriculum available in 2021 and will engage the sector in its development.

translation.cy: darparu ar gyfer cynnydd priodol i ddysgwyr a chynnwys ystod o ddarpariaeth i sicrhau hyn (yn gysylltiedig ag oedrannau, galluoedd a doniau).
translation.en: provide for appropriate progression for learners and include a range of provision to ensure this (linked to ages, abilities and aptitudes).

translation.cy: adlewyrchu'r egwyddorion cynnydd a nodir yn y cod cynnydd
translation.en: reflect the principles of progression set out in the progression code

translation.cy: Rhaid i'r crynodeb o'u cwricwlwm a gyhoeddir nodi eu hymagwedd tuag at addysgu'r Gymraeg a'r Saesneg.
translation.en: The published summary of their curriculum must set out their approach to teaching English and Welsh.

translation.cy: addas ar gyfer oedrannau, galluoedd a doniau gwahanol ddysgwyr ac fel ei fod yn cynnig cynnydd priodol ar gyfer dysgwyr.
translation.en: is suitable for learners of different ages, abilities and aptitudes and offers appropriate progression for those learners.

translation.cy: Mae Gweinidogion Cymru yn bwriadu cyhoeddi canllawiau i helpu ysgolion a lleoliadau eraill i fodloni gofynion cwricwlwm ac i wneud paratoadau o flaen llaw tra bo’r Bil yn cael ei ystyried gan y Senedd.
translation.en: The Welsh Ministers plan to issue guidance to help schools and other settings in meeting the curriculum requirements and to make preparations while the Bill is being considered by the Senedd.

translation.cy: cwricwlwm Gweinidogion Cymru ar gyfer lleoliadau meithrin a ariennir nas cynhelir
translation.en: Welsh Ministers’ curriculum for funded non-maintained nursery settings

translation.cy: Gofynion ehangach
translation.en: Wider requirements

translation.cy: Mae amrywiaeth o ofynion deddfwriaethol y gallai fod angen i ysgoliona lleoliadaueu hystyried neu roi sylw iddyn nhw wrth reoli eu sefydliadau.
translation.en: There are a range of legislative requirements which settings and schools may need to consider or have regard to when managing their organisations.

translation.cy: Fodd bynnag, mae'n ei gwneud yn ofynnol i lywodraeth leol a llywodraeth genedlaethol (ynghyd â chyrff cyhoeddus eraill) weithredu datblygu cynaladwy.
translation.en: However it does require local and national government (alongside other public bodies) to carry out sustainable development.

translation.cy: Mae hyn yn golygu bod yn rhaid iddyn nhw weithio i wella lles economaidd, cymdeithasol, amgylcheddol a diwylliannol Cymru.
translation.en: This means that they must work to improve the economic, social, environmental and cultural well-being of Wales.

translation.cy: Mae gan ddysgwyr hawliau dynol penodol a warentir gan Gonfensiwn y Cenhedloedd Unedig ar Hawliau'r Plentyn.
translation.en: Learners have specific human rights enshrined by the United Nations Convention on the Rights of the Child (UNCRC).

translation.cy: dysgu drwy hawliau dynol:
translation.en: learn through human rights:

translation.cy: Cynllunio eich cwricwlwm
translation.en: Designing your curriculum

translation.cy: galluogi eich dysgwyr i gyflawni'r pedwar diben ac yn eu paratoi ar gyfer dysgu parhaus, gwaith a bywyd?
translation.en: enable your learners to realise the four purposes and equip them for ongoing learning, work and life?

translation.cy: cefnogi cynnydd ar hyd continwwm dysgu, a sut rydych yn gweithio gydag eraill i sicrhau cysondeb yn y cyfnodau pontio ar hyd continwwm 3 i 16?
translation.en: support progression along a continuum of learning and how are you working with others to ensure there is alignment between different points of transition within the 3 to 16 continuum?

translation.cy: ymgorffori cyd-awduro gyda dysgwyr, eu teuluoedd a'r gymuned ehangach?
translation.en: build in co-construction with learners, their families and the wider community?

translation.cy: Fel gweddill y canllawiau hyn, fe'u lluniwyd ar gyfer ysgolion yn bennaf, ond byddan nhw hefyd yn ddefnyddiol i leoliadau addysgol eraill.
translation.en: Like the rest of this guidance, it is primarily for schools but will also be of use to other educational settings.

translation.cy: Sut y dylem ei ddysgu?
translation.en: How should we teach it?

translation.cy: Dylai hyn fod yn sgwrs barhaus ar gyfer yr ysgol gyfan a thu hwnt, gan ymgysylltu â'r rhieni/gofalwyr a'r gymuned ehangach, gan gynnwys busnesau, academia a gwasanaethau cyhoeddus.
translation.en: This should be an ongoing conversation for the whole school and beyond, engaging with parents/carers and the wider community, including business, academia and public services.

translation.cy: Dylai hefyd ystyried, fel rhan annatod o'r broses o gynllunio cwricwlwm, sut y bydd asesu yn cefnogi'r weledigaeth hon ar gyfer eu cwricwlwm a'r dysgu y bydd yn ei gefnogi.
translation.en: It should also consider, as an intrinsic part of curriculum design, how assessment will support this vision for their curriculum and the learning it will support.

translation.cy: cyfrannu at allu dysgwyr i gyflawni'r pedwar diben ac i feithrin y sgiliau cyfannol sy'n sail i’r dibenion
translation.en: contributes to learners’ realisation of the four purposesand acquisition of the integral skills which underpin them

translation.cy: bodloni gofynion cwricwlwm.
translation.en: fulfils curriculum requirements.

translation.cy: ddinasyddion egwyddorol, gwybodus yng Nghymru a’r byd
translation.en: ethical, informed citizens of Wales and the world

translation.cy: Bydd ein holl blant a phobl ifanc yn cael eu cefnogi i ddatblygu yn:
translation.en: All our children and young people will be supported to develop as:

translation.cy: ymholgar ac yn mwynhau datrys problemau
translation.en: are questioning and enjoy solving problems

translation.cy: cysylltu ac yn cymhwyso eu gwybodaeth a’u sgiliau i greu syniadau a chynnyrch
translation.en: connect and apply their knowledge and skills to create ideas and products

translation.cy: ac sy’n barod i chwarae rhan lawn mewn bywyd a gwaith
translation.en: and are ready to play a full part in life and work

translation.cy: ddinasyddion egwyddorol, gwybodus sy’n:
translation.en: ethical, informed citizens who:

translation.cy: canfod, yn gwerthuso ac yn defnyddio tystiolaeth wrth ffurfio barn
translation.en: find, evaluate and use evidence in forming views

translation.cy: Meddwl yn feirniadol a datrys problemau
translation.en: Critical thinking and problem-solving

translation.cy: Dylai dysgwyr feithrin deallusrwydd ac ymwybyddiaeth emosiynol, gan ddod yn hyderus ac yn annibynnol.
translation.en: Learners should develop emotional intelligence and awareness, becoming confident and independent.

translation.cy: Dylen nhw allu gwerthuso eu dysgu a'u camgymeriadau, gan adnabod meysydd i'w datblygu.
translation.en: They should be able to evaluate their learning and mistakes, identifying areas for development.

translation.cy: Wrth feithrin y sgiliau hyn, dylai dysgwyr:
translation.en: When developing these skills, learners should:

translation.cy: meithrin ymwybyddiaeth o ddatblygiadau technolegol sy'n dod i'r amlwg
translation.en: develop awareness of emerging technological advances

translation.cy: Yn hytrach na chynllunio ar gyfer y sgiliau hyn ar wahân, dylai’r ysgol gyfan ymroi i ymwneud ag ymgorffori'r sgiliau hyn ar draws y cwricwlwm.
translation.en: Rather than planning for these skills separately, the whole school should be involved and engaged to embed these skills across the curriculum.

translation.cy: Mae cefnogi dysgwyr i wneud cynnydd yn un o ysgogwyr sylfaenol y Fframwaith.
translation.en: Supporting learners to make progress is a fundamental driver of the Framework.

translation.cy: Mae'r egwyddorion cynnydd isod yn cyfleu'r disgwyliadau cenedlaethol ar gyfer y cynnydd a wneir gan ddysgwyr ar hyd y continwwm dysgu.
translation.en: The principles of progression below articulate the national expectations for learners’ progress throughout the continuum of learning.

translation.cy: Caiff yr egwyddorion hyn eu datblygu ymhellach i roi cymorth i ymarferwyr a byddan nhw’n rhan o'r cod cynnydd a fydd yn rhan statudol o’r Fframwaith.
translation.en: These principles will be further developed to support practitioners and will form part of the progression code which will be a statutory part of the Framework.

translation.cy: Mae’r Fframwaith hefyd yn adlewyrchu ein cenedl ddwyieithog.
translation.en: The Framework also reflects our bilingual nation.

translation.cy: Dylai fod llwybrau ar gael i bob dysgwr ddysgu Cymraeg a Saesneg er mwyn eu galluogi i fagu'r hyder i ddefnyddio’r ddwy iaith mewn bywyd bob dydd.
translation.en: All learners should have appropriate pathways for learning Welsh and English to enable them to develop the confidence to use both languages in everyday life.

translation.cy: Mae hyn yn galluogi'r ymarferydd i ymateb i anghenion unigol yr holl ddysgwyr yn ei ystafell ddosbarth yn barhaus.
translation.en: This allows the practitioner to respond to the individual needs of the full range of learners within their classroom on an ongoing basis.

translation.cy: Dylid defnyddio hyn i nodi cryfderau a meysydd i’w gwella yng nghwricwlwm yr ysgol a'r dull addysgu dyddiol, gan gynnwys ystyried sut y mae anghenion dysgwyr fel unigolion wedi cael eu diwallu.
translation.en: This should be used to identify strengths and areas for improvement in both the school curriculum and daily practice, including consideration of how the needs of learners as individuals have been met.

translation.cy: Dylai ysgolion fod yn ymwybodol o anghenion ac amgylchiadau eu holl ddysgwyr wrth gynllunio eu cwricwlwm eu hunain, gan ystyried cyfle teg wrth roi cymorth ac ymyriadau ar waith neu wneud addasiadau rhesymol.
translation.en: Schools should be aware of the needs and circumstances of all their learners when designing their own curriculum, considering equity of opportunity when putting into place support and interventions or making reasonable adjustments.

translation.cy: Bwriedir iddyn nhw hefyd gefnogi ysgolion i ddylunio cwricwla ysgol cynhwysol.
translation.en: It is also intended to support schools to design inclusive school curricula.

translation.cy: Lle mae'r canllawiau hyn yn cyfeirio at ferfau penodol fel 'siarad', 'symud' neu 'greu', dylid eu dehongli yn unol ag anghenion y dysgwyr.
translation.en: Where this guidance makes reference to specific verbs such as ‘talk’, ‘move’ or ‘create’, these should be interpreted according to the needs of the learners.

translation.cy: bod yn eang ac yn gytbwys
translation.en: be broad and balanced

translation.cy: cynnwys pob un o'r chwe Maes
translation.en: include all six Areas

translation.cy: ymgorffori'r sgiliau trawsgwricwlaidd gorfodol
translation.en: embed the mandatory cross-curricular skills

translation.cy: Defnyddio'r canllawiau i ddewis cynnwys cwricwlwm
translation.en: Using the guidance to select curriculum content

translation.cy: Disgrifiadau dysgu
translation.en: Descriptions of learning

translation.cy: Dylid eu harchwilio drwy amrywiaeth o gyd-destunau, testunau a gweithgareddau a ddewisir yn ystod y broses o gynllunio cwricwlwm.
translation.en: They should be explored through a range of contexts, topics and activities selected in the process of curriculum design.

translation.cy: Lle mae'r dysgu yn gorgyffwrdd, mae'r disgrifiadau dysgu wedi'u llunio i gael eu hystyried drwy ystod o wahanol safbwyntiau disgyblaethol gwahanol, a dylai ymarferwyr geisio cynnwys y safbwyntiau disgyblaethol hyn yn y dysgu.
translation.en: Where overlaps in learning exist, descriptions of learning are designed to be considered through a range of different disciplinary lenses and practitioners should seek to incorporate these disciplinary perspectives into learning.

translation.cy: Wrth ystyried disgrifiadau dysgu neu gyd-destun, testun neu brofiad penodol, mae'r egwyddorion cynnydd yn helpu ymarferwyr i ddeall sut y dylai dysgwyr wneud cynnydd mewn modd mwy soffistigedig neu ddwfn.
translation.en: When considering descriptions of learning or a specific context, topic or experience, the principles of progression help practitioners to understand how learners should progress with greater sophistication or depth.

translation.cy: Disgwylir i ysgolion alluogi pob dysgwr i ddilyn ystod o gyrsiau astudio ac ennill cymwysterau addas ar ddiwedd addysg orfodol.
translation.en: Schools will be expected to enable all learners to access a range of courses of study and to take suitable qualifications at the end of compulsory education.

translation.cy: Mae plant yn dechrau dysgu am gydberthnasau ymhell cyn iddyn nhw ddechrau yn yr ysgol.
translation.en: Children begin to learn about relationships long before they start school.

translation.cy: Cyn gynted ag y byddan nhw’n dod yn rhan o'r byd cymdeithasol, byddan nhw’n clywed ac yn rhyngweithio â negeseuon cymhleth a chroes yn aml ynghylch rhywedd, cydberthnasau a rhywioldeb a fydd yn llywio eu bywydau o ddydd i ddydd a'r dyfodol y byddan nhw’n ei ddychmygu.
translation.en: As soon as they enter the social world they will be encountering and interacting with complex and often contradictory messages about gender, relationships and sexuality that will shape their day-to-day lives and imagined futures.

translation.cy: Daw'r negeseuon hyn o hysbysebion, llyfrau, cerddoriaeth, y cyfryngau cymdeithasol a'r teledu ac aelodau o'r teulu, cyfoedion a chymunedau.
translation.en: These messages come from advertising, books, music, social media and television, and from family members, peers and communities.

translation.cy: Mae hyn yn galluogi dysgwyr i adlewyrchu eu safbwyntiau a'u teimladau am ystod o faterion sy'n ymwneud ag addysg cydberthnasau a rhywioldeb, a'u mynegi.
translation.en: This enables learners to reflect and express their views and feelings on a range of RSE issues.

translation.cy: Wrth wraidd hyn, y mae cydnabod, trafod ac ymgysylltu ag ystod amrywiol o safbwyntiau:
translation.en: Central to this is acknowledging, discussing and engaging with a diverse range of perspectives:

translation.cy: Dylai'r dysgu fod:
translation.en: Learning should be:

translation.cy: yn berthnasol ac yn ddatblygiadol briodol er mwyn sicrhau bod yr holl ddarpariaeth addysg cydberthynas a rhywioldeb yn cydnabod ac yn ymateb i alluoedd ac anghenion y dysgwyr eu hunain.
translation.en: relevant and developmentally appropriate to ensure that all RSE provision recognises and responds to learners’ own capacities and needs.

translation.cy: Ni fydd yn gwneud tybiaethau, ond yn hytrach bydd yn cydweddu â gwybodaeth a phrofiadau esblygol dysgwyr ac adeiladu arnyn nhw
translation.en: It will not assume, but attune to and build upon learners’ evolving knowledge and experience

translation.cy: Wrth wraidd y dysgu hwn fydd cydnabod a gwerthfawrogi amrywiaeth a gwahaniaeth mewn perthynas â rhyw, rhywedd, rhywioldeb a chydberthnasau, a sicrhau bod darpariaeth addysg cydberthynas a rhywioldeb yn cynnwys bywydau LGBTQ+
translation.en: Central here will be recognising and valuing diversity and difference across the domains of sex, gender, sexuality and relationships, and ensuring that RSE provision is inclusive of LGBTQ+ lives

translation.cy: Addysg hawliau dynol a Chonfensiwn y Cenhedloedd Unedig ar Hawliau'r Plentyn
translation.en: Human rights education and the United Nations Convention on the Rights of the Child (UNCRC)

translation.cy: Cafodd pedwar dibeny cwricwlwm eu llywio gan egwyddorion CCUHP.
translation.en: The principles of the UNCRCinformed the development of the four purposes.

translation.cy: Mae addysg hawliau dynol yn annog dysgwyr i ystyried eu hagweddau a'u hymddygiadau'n feirniadol ac yn galluogi dysgwyr i fod yn ddinasyddion egwyddorol, gwybodus, a all fod yn eiriolwyr dros eu hawliau eu hunain a hawliau pobl eraill.
translation.en: Human rights education encourages learners to critically examine their own attitudes and behaviours and enables learners to be ethically-informed citizens, who can be advocates for their rights and the rights of others.

translation.cy: Mae gwerthfawrogi gwahanol gyfraniadau a phrofiadau'r rhai hynny sy'n rhan o'n grwpiau cymdeithasol yn atgyfnerthu'r cysylltiadau rhyngom ac yn cefnogi lles holl aelodau'r grwpiau hynny.
translation.en: Valuing the different contributions and experiences of those in our social groups strengthens the connections between us and supports the well-being of all members of those groups.

translation.cy: Mae creu cwricwlwm sy'n cydnabod diwylliant amrywiol eu cymdeithas yn galluogi dysgwyr i ddathlu natur amrywiol pob cymdeithas.
translation.en: Creating a curriculum which recognises the diverse culture of their society enables learners to celebrate the diverse nature of all societies.

translation.cy: Wrth gynllunio cwricwlwm, dylai ymarferwyr geisio cynnwys cyfleoedd i ddysgwyr:
translation.en: In designing a curriculum, practitioners should incorporate opportunities for learners to:

translation.cy: dathlu cefndiroedd, gwerthoedd a nodweddion amrywiol
translation.en: celebrate diverse backgrounds, values and characteristics

translation.cy: Gyrfaoedd a phrofiadau cysylltiedig â byd gwaith
translation.en: Careers and work-related experiences

translation.cy: Mae'r rhain yn cefnogi dysgwyr i fod yn wydn, yn greadigol ac yn uchelgeisiol, gan ei wneud yn ofynnol iddyn nhw ddatrys problemau, ymdrin â gwahanol wybodaeth a gweithio'n annibynnol.
translation.en: These support learners to be resilient, creative and ambitious, requiring them to solve problems, engage with different information and work independently.

translation.cy: Mae cydweithredu ag unigolion a chyflogwyr yn cynnig cyfleoedd i ddysgwyr ddysgu am waith, cyflogaeth a'r sgiliau a gaiff eu gwerthfawrogi yn y gweithle.
translation.en: Collaboration with individuals and employers provides learners with opportunities to learn about work, employment and the skills valued in the workplace.

translation.cy: Gall y rhain gynnig profiad dysgu dilys sy'n eu helpu i ddatblygu i fod yn gyfranwyr mentrus a chreadigol, gan greu cysylltiadau â byd gwaith, a chodi eu dyheadau.
translation.en: These can provide an authentic learning experience which helps them develop as enterprising, creative contributors, forming links with the world of work and raising their aspirations.

translation.cy: Mae'n bwysig bod dysgwyr yn ymwybodol o'r holl gyfleoedd sydd ar gael iddyn nhw ôl-16, a'u bod wedi'u paratoi'n dda i wneud cynnydd tuag at ddysgu pellach.
translation.en: It is important for learners to be aware of all opportunities available to them post-16, and that they are all well prepared for progression to further learning.

translation.cy: Mae hyn yn cynnwys y berthynas rhwng gweithgareddau dynol a'r amgylched lleol, cenedlaethol a rhyngwladol.
translation.en: This includes the relationships between human activities and the local, national and international environment.

translation.cy: Dylai dealltwriaeth dysgwyr o Gymru hefyd gydnabod y ffordd y mae safbwyntiau, gwerthoedd a hunaniaethau yn siapio Cymru, yn hytrach na chyflwyno darlun nodweddiadol o hunaniaeth Gymreig unffurf.
translation.en: Learners’ understanding of Wales should also recognise how different perspectives, values and identities shape Wales, rather than presenting a simplistic characterisation of a uniform Welsh identity.

translation.cy: cydnabod ac ymgysylltu â ffactorau, dylanwadau ac effeithiau (gan gynnwys effeithiau economaidd, cymdeithasol ac amgylcheddol) yn lleol, yn genedlaethol ac yn rhyngwladol
translation.en: recognise and engage with factors, influences and impacts (including economic, social and environmental impacts) locally, nationally and internationally

translation.cy: archwilio, dadansoddi'n feirniadol ac ymateb i faterion cyfoes a heriau sy'n effeithio ar eu bywydau a bywydau pobl eraill drwy bob cyd-destun
translation.en: explore, critically analyse and respond to contemporary issues and challenges affecting their lives and the lives of others through each context

translation.cy: adnabod sut y mae ein hieithoedd yn datgloi gwybodaeth am ein llenyddiaeth, ein daearyddiaeth a'n hanes a'u cysylltiadau y tu hwnt i Gymru
translation.en: recognise how our languages unlock knowledge about our literature, geography, history and their links beyond Wales

translation.cy: Datblygu methodoleg ar gyfer cynllunio cwricwlwm:
translation.en: Developing a methodology for curriculum design:

translation.cy: bod yn destun myfyrio a chael ei ddiwygio, yn seiliedig ar ddealltwriaeth a feithrinwyd drwy bob agwedd ar y dysgu ac addysgu, a chael ei gefnogi gan ymholiad proffesiynol
translation.en: be reflected upon and revised, based on understanding gained from all aspects of learning and teaching, and supported by professional inquiry

translation.cy: dysgu o ymholiad proffesiynol
translation.en: learning from professional inquiry

translation.cy: Yn benodol, mae cydweithredu rhwng lleoliadau, ysgolion, a sefydliadau addysg bellach yn cefnogi'r canlynol.
translation.en: In particular collaboration across settings, schools and further education supports the following.

translation.cy: Er mwyn sicrhau tegwch i ddysgwyr o fewn ardal leol a ledled Cymru, mae'n bwysig sicrhau dealltwriaeth a rennir o hanfodion y broses cynllunio cwricwlwm, ynghyd â dealltwriaeth a rennir o gynnydd dysgwyr, gan gynnwys disgwyliadau o beth yw cynnydd ac ar ba gyflymder y gallai dysgwyr wneud cynnydd.
translation.en: To ensure equity for learners within a local area and across Wales, it is important that there is a shared understanding of the fundamentals of curriculum design, along with a shared understanding of learner progression, including expectations around what progression may look like and the pace at which learners may progress.

translation.cy: Pontio
translation.en: Transition

translation.cy: Mae Gweinidogion Cymru, gan weithio gyda chonsortia rhanbarthol a rhanddeiliaid eraill, yn datblygu rhwydweithiau i gefnogi a rhannu dysgu ar gyfer ymarferwyr er mwyn cefnogi dealltwriaeth o Fframwaith Cwricwlwm i Gymru.
translation.en: Welsh Ministers, working with regional consortia and other stakeholders, are developing networks to support and disseminate learning for practitioners to support understanding of the Curriculum for Wales Framework.

translation.cy: Caiff rhagor o wybodaeth am y rhain ei darparu yn 2020 a 2021.
translation.en: More information on these will be provided in 2020 and 2021.

translation.cy: Proses yw cyfranogiad, sy'n cefnogi deialog rhwng dysgwyr a gweithwyr proffesiynol.
translation.en: It is also a process that supports a dialogue between learners and professionals.

translation.cy: Dylai'r broses o gynlllunio cwricwlwm hefyd ddefnyddio strwythur sy'n sicrhau bod pob grŵp o blant yn gallu cymryd rhan, gan gynnwys y rheini a all gael eu hymyleiddio.
translation.en: Curriculum design should also use a participation structure that ensures all groups of learners can participate, including those who can be marginalised.

translation.cy: Gall cynnwys dysgwyr yn uniongyrchol yn y broses o gynllunio’u cwricwlwm gynnwys y camau canlynol.
translation.en: Involving learners directly in the designing of their curriculum could include the following steps.

translation.cy: Mae ysgolion ac ymarferwyr hefyd yn chwarae rôl hanfodol wrth sicrhau bod dysgwyr, rhieni, gofalwyr a chymunedau yn deall y weledigaeth a'r ethos sy'n sail i'r cwricwlwm.
translation.en: Schools and practitioners also play a critical role in ensuring learners, parents, carers and communities understand the vision and ethos underpinning the curriculum.

translation.cy: Bydd yn ofynnol i ysgolion gyhoeddi crynodeb o'u cwricwlwm ac adolygu'r crynodeb os byddan nhw’n gwneud newidiadau i'r cwricwlwm.
translation.en: Schools will be required to publish a summary of their curriculum and revise the summary if they make changes to the curriculum.

translation.cy: canolbwyntio’n gyson ar ddibenion cyffredinol y cwricwlwm
translation.en: maintains a consistent focus on the overall purposes of the curriculum

translation.cy: cyfleoedd ar gyfer symud corfforol sy'n sail i ddysgu ym mhob un o'r Meysydd
translation.en: opportunities for physical movement which underpin learning in all Areas

translation.cy: dysgu drwy brofiadau uniongyrchol, ymarferol a dilys
translation.en: learning through first-hand, practical and authentic experiences

translation.cy: Bydd yn ofynnol i ysgolion uwchradd gynllunio cwricwlwm ar gyfer pob grŵp blwyddyn erbyn 2022, ond bydd angen parhau i fireinio'r dyluniad hwn yn unol â'r broses o gyflwyno'r cwricwlwm y tu hwnt i 2022 er mwyn ystyried manylion cymwysterau pan fyddan nhw wedi'u cadarnhau.
translation.en: Secondary schools will be required to design a curriculum for all year groups in advance of 2022, but will need to continue to refine this design in line with the phased roll-out of the curriculum beyond 2022 and to take account of the details of qualifications when they are confirmed.

translation.cy: Wrth i'w cwricwlwm gael ei gyflwyno, dylai ysgolion ystyried sut y dylai eu cwricwlwm gael ei adolygu mewn ymateb i'r ddysgu.
translation.en: As the curriculum is rolled out, schools should consider how their curriculum should be revised in response to learning.

translation.cy: Mae’n bwysig fod y Maes yn anelu at sicrhau bod y celfyddydau mynegiannol yn agored i bob dysgwr, a thrwy’r dull cynhwysol hwn, ehangu gorwelion pob un ohonyn nhw.
translation.en: Importantly, this Area wants to make the expressive arts accessible to all learners and, through this inclusive approach, expand the horizons of every learner.

translation.cy: Bydd hyn o gymorth iddyn nhw ddod yn unigolion iach, hyderus sy’n barod i fyw bywydau cyflawn fel aelodau gwerthfawr o gymdeithas.
translation.en: Experiencing the expressive arts can also encourage learners to develop not only their ability to appreciate the creative workof other people, but also their own creative talents, artistic skills and performance skills.

translation.cy: Golyga hyn gynnig cyfleoedd i ddysgwyr gael profiadau megis ymweld â theatrau ac orielau, ac i ddod ag arbenigedd ymarferwyr allanol i mewn i’r ystafell ddosbarth.
translation.en: This means providing learners with opportunities such as visits to theatres and galleries and bringing the expertise of external practitioners into the classroom.

translation.cy: Drwy’r profiad hwn, caiff y dysgwyr gefnogaeth i ddod yn ddinasyddion egwyddorol, gwybodus yng Nghymru a’r byd.
translation.en: From this experience they are supported to become ethical, informed citizens of Wales and the world.

translation.cy: Mae archwilio’r celfyddydau mynegiannol yn hanfodol er mwyn dyfnhau sgiliau a gwybodaeth gelfyddydol, ac mae’n galluogi dysgwyr i ddod yn unigolion chwilfrydig a chreadigol.
translation.en: Exploring the expressive arts is essential to developing artistic skills and knowledge and it enables learners to become curious and creative individuals.

translation.cy: Mae ymwneud â’r Maes hwn yn annog ymateb, ac mae hyn yn ysgogi dysgwyr i fyfyrio ar effeithiolrwydd eu gwaith eu hunain a gwaith eraill, gan gynnwys gwaith artistiaid o Gymru a thu hwnt.
translation.en: The act of responding encouraged by engagement in this Area challenges learners to reflect on the effectiveness of their own work and that of others, including the work of artists from Wales and beyond.

translation.cy: Mae dysgwyr yn nodi cysylltiadau yn y broses greadigolar draws y disgyblaethau er mwyn archwilio, creu, dehongli ac ymateb.
translation.en: Learners make links in the creative processacross the disciplines to explore, create, interpret and respond.

translation.cy: Effeithiolrwydd cynyddol
translation.en: Increasing effectiveness as a learner

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu gofyn cwestiynau i ganfod sut y caiff gwaith creadigol ei wneud.
translation.en: I can ask questions to discover how creative work is made.

translation.cy: Rwy’n dechrau archwilio syniadau, teimladau a gwahanol naws mewn amrywiaeth o waith creadigol.
translation.en: I am beginning to explore ideas, feelings and moods in a variety of creative work.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu ymchwilio yn annibynnol i ddiben ac ystyr ystod eang o waith creadigol ac ystyried pa effaith y gallan nhw ei chael ar wahanol gynulleidfaoedd.
translation.en: I can independently research the purpose and meaning of a wide range of creative work and consider how they can impact on different audiences.

translation.cy: Gydag arweiniad, rwy’n gallu ystyried y ffordd y caiff hwyliau, emosiynau a syniadau eu cyﬂeu yn fy ngwaith creadigol fy hun ac yng ngwaith creadigol pobl eraill.
translation.en: I can consider, with guidance, how moods, emotions and ideas are communicated both in my own creative work and in the creative work of others.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu myfyrio ar y ffordd y mae artistiaid wedi llwyddo i greu effeithiau neu gyﬂeu hwyliau, emosiynau a syniadau yn eu gwaith.
translation.en: I can reflect upon how artists have achieved effects or communicated moods, emotions and ideas in their work.

translation.cy: Cam cynnydd 2
translation.en: Progression step 2

translation.cy: Cam cynnydd 3
translation.en: Progression step 3

translation.cy: Mae’r datganiadau o’r hyn sy’n bwysig yn galluogi dysgwyr i ddatblygu gwybodaeth, a sgiliau creadigol ac arloesol.
translation.en: The statements of what matters enable learners to develop knowledge, and creative and innovative skills.

translation.cy: Effeithiolrwydd personol
translation.en: Personal effectiveness

translation.cy: Mae’r disgyblaethau hyn yn rhannu’r broses greadigol, a phob un yn cyfrannu sgiliau trosglwyddadwy a gwybodaeth tuag at brofiad dysgwr.
translation.en: These disciplines share the creative process, and each contributes transferable skills and knowledge to a learner's experience.

translation.cy: Gyda’i gilydd maen nhw’n galluogi’r dysgwyr i ymwneud yn llawn â’r broses greadigoly mae gan bob un o’r disgyblaethau yn y celfyddydau mynegiannol yn gyffredin.
translation.en: Together they allow learners to engage fully with the creative processwhich each of the expressive arts’ disciplines has in common.

translation.cy: profiad, gwybodaeth a sgiliau sy’n gynhenid i bob disgyblaeth, yn ogystal ag ar draws pob un
translation.en: experience, knowledge and skills inherent to and across each discipline

translation.cy: gwerthfawrogiad ac ymateb beirniadol
translation.en: critical appreciation and response

translation.cy: cyfleoedd i ddysgwyr gymryd ystod o rolau a chyfrifoldebau o fewn y broses greadigol.
translation.en: opportunities for learners to take on a range of roles and responsibilities within the creative process.

translation.cy: Enghreifftio ehangder
translation.en: Illustrating breadth

translation.cy: Mae'r ffilmiau Tiger Bay, House of America, a Solomon a Gaenor i gyd yn portreadu profiadau a chymunedau Cymreig gwahanol, gallai'r dysgwyr ddefnyddio'r rhain i adnabod a dadansoddi cymeriad, hunaniaeth a lle, wrth iddyn nhw herio a datblygu eu hunaniaethau eu hunain a’u dychymyg drwy'r celfyddydau.
translation.en: The films Tiger Bay, House of America, and Solomon a Gaenor each portray different Welsh experiences and communities, learners could use these to recognise and analyse character, identity and place, as they challenge and develop their own identities and imagination through the arts.

translation.cy: Mae’r rhain yn cynnwys, ond heb eu cyfyngu, i’r canlynol:
translation.en: These include but are not limited to the following:

translation.cy: Cyd-destunau lleol, cenedlaethol a rhyngwladol yn y Maes hwn
translation.en: Local, national and international contexts in this Area

translation.cy: Mae’r Maes hwn yn rhoi’r sgiliau angenrheidiol i ddysgwyr ddilyn gyrfaoedd o fewn y diwydiannau creadigol a diwylliannol.
translation.en: This Area equips learners with the necessary skills to pursue careers within the creative and cultural industries.

translation.cy: Mae hyn yn cynnwys arferion sy’n hybu iechyd megis gweithgareddau corfforol gan gynnwys chwaraeon a gweithgareddau eraill; deiet cytbwys; gofal a hylendid personol; cwsg; ac amddiffyn rhag haint.
translation.en: This includes health-promoting behaviours such as physical activity, including but not limited to sport; balanced diet; personal care and hygiene; sleep; and protection from infection.

translation.cy: Bydd dysgwyr yn cael eu hannog i ddeall y byddan nhw’n cael profiad o amrywiaeth o gydberthnasau drwy gydol eu bywydau.
translation.en: Learners will be encouraged to understand that, throughout their lives, they will experience a range of relationships.

translation.cy: Ehangder a dyfnder gwybodaeth cynyddol
translation.en: Increasing breadth and depth of knowledge

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu ymateb yn greadigol a dychmygus i anogaeth.
translation.en: I can respond to prompts in imaginative and creative ways.

translation.cy: Rwyf wedi datblygu dealltwriaeth fy mod angen deiet cytbwys, ac rwy’n gallu gwneud dewisiadau gwybodus am y bwyd rwy’n ei fwyta a’i baratoi i gefnogi fy iechyd a lles corfforol.
translation.en: I have developed an understanding that I need a balanced diet and I can make informed choices about the food I eat and prepare to support my physical health and well-being.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu adnabod manteision fy mod yn gallu canolbwyntio ar yr hyn rwy’n ei ganfod a’i feddwl ac rwy’n gwybod fy mod yn datblygu fy hunanymwybyddiaeth.
translation.en: I can recognise the benefits of being able to focus attention on my perceptions and thoughts and know that I am developing my self-awareness.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu sylwi ar fy nheimladau, a’u cyfathrebu.
translation.en: I can notice and communicate my feelings.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu myfyrio a dysgu o’r gorffennol er mwyn rhagweld a pharatoi fy hun ac eraill ar gyfer proﬁadau yn y dyfodol.
translation.en: I can reflect and learn from the past in order to anticipate and prepare myself and others for future experiences.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu deall sut a pham mae proﬁadau yn effeithio arnaf i ac ar eraill.
translation.en: I can understand how and why experiences affect me and others.

translation.cy: Cam cynnydd 1
translation.en: Progression step 1

translation.cy: Cam cynnydd 2
translation.en: Progression step 2

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu ymchwilio, archwilio a gwerthuso ystod o dystiolaeth er mwyn gwneud penderfyniadau ystyriol a gwybodus.
translation.en: I can research, examine and evaluate a range of evidence to make considered and informed decisions.

translation.cy: Rwyf wedi datblygu ymwybyddiaeth y gall fy mhenderfyniadau effeithio arnaf i ac ar eraill.
translation.en: I have developed an awareness that my decisions can affect me and others.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu rhagweld, asesu a rheoli risg.
translation.en: I can anticipate, assess and manage risks.

translation.cy: Cam cynnydd 2
translation.en: Progression step 2

translation.cy: Cam cynnydd 5
translation.en: Progression step 5

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu hyrwyddo agweddaua gwerthoedd cadarnhaol, a herio rhai niweidiol pan mae hyn yn addas.
translation.en: I can promote positive attitudes and values, and, where appropriate, I can challenge harmful ones.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu parchu safbwyntiau pobl eraill a defnyddio hyn er mwyn helpu i ddatrys achosion o wrthdaro.
translation.en: I can respect other people’s points of view and use this to help resolve conflict.

translation.cy: Mae hyn yn rhoi arweiniad penodol i’w ddefnyddio wrth ymgorffori dysgu o fewn iechyd a lles yn eich cwricwlwm.
translation.en: This provides specific guidance when incorporating learning in health and well-being in your curriculum.

translation.cy: Mae gan lenyddiaeth botensial sylweddol i gefnogi empathi, iechyd meddwl a lles emosiynol y dysgwyr.
translation.en: Literature has significant potential to support learners’ empathy, mental health and emotional well-being.

translation.cy: Mae hyn yn cynnwys perthynas ag eraill, diogelwch ar-lein, goblygiadau cyfreithiol a dylanwadaucymdeithasol ar-lein (gan gynnwys cyfryngau cymdeithasol).
translation.en: This includes relationships with others, online safety, legal implications and social influences online (including social media).

translation.cy: Mae dysgu yn y Maes hwn yn cynnig y cyfle i ddysgwyr ddatblygu’r hyder a’r meddwl agored i archwilio syniadau, i ystyried barn pobl eraill, a’r dewrder i fynegi eu safbwyntiau eu hunain.
translation.en: Learning in this Area provides learners with the opportunity to develop the confidence and openness to explore ideas, to consider the opinions of others, and the courage to express their own.

translation.cy: Wrth gynllunio dysgu ac addysgu o fewn y Maes yn y cwricwlwm dylai ymarferwyr sicrhau eu bod yn cwmpasu’r holl ddatganiadau am yr hyn sy’n bwysig gymaint â phosib.
translation.en: When designing learning and teaching in this Area in the curriculum practitioners should ensure that they draw from across the statements of what matters wherever possible.

translation.cy: Mae’r Maes hwn yn elfen gwbl newydd o’r cwricwlwm yng Nghymru.
translation.en: This Area is an entirely new element of the curriculum in Wales.

translation.cy: Er enghraifft, gall cynnig bwyd maethlon yn ffreutur yr ysgol gefnogi dysgwyr yn eu mwynhad a dealltwriaeth o bwysigrwydd cael deiet iach a chytbwys.
translation.en: For example, a healthy food offer in the school canteen can support the learners in their enjoyment and understanding about the importance of having a healthy, balanced diet.

translation.cy: Hefyd, byddai dysgu am fuddiannau gweithgaredd corfforol cyson yn cael ei gyfoethogi a’i ymwreiddio pe bai digon o gyfleoedd trwy’r diwrnod ysgol i fod yn actif.
translation.en: Similarly, learning about the benefits of regular physical activity will be enriched and embedded if there are plenty of opportunities throughout a school day to be physically active.

translation.cy: Nodi anghenion dysgwyr
translation.en: Identify the needs of learners

translation.cy: Efallai y byddai’n fanteisiol defnyddio cyrff allanol i gynnig cefnogaeth wrth gynllunio a gweithredu rhai pynciau a materion.
translation.en: It may be felt that there are times when it would be beneficial to use external organisations to provide support in planning and delivery on certain topics and issues.

translation.cy: Pa gyfleoedd ddylai eich dysgwyr eu cael i ddatblygu defnydd iach, diogel a chyfrifol o dechnoleg ddigidol a’r byd ar-lein?
translation.en: What opportunities should your learners have to develop healthy, safe and responsible use of digital technology and the online world?

translation.cy: Pa sgiliau sydd eu hangen ar eich dysgwyr i ddatblygu cydberthnasau iach?
translation.en: What skills do your learners need to develop healthy relationships?

translation.cy: Dylai ymarferwyr gefnogi dysgwyr i adnabod sut mae’r ffactorau hyn yn rhyng-gysylltiedig ac yn effeithio ar eu hiechyd a lles yn gyfan, nid yr agwedd gorfforol yn unig.
translation.en: Practitioners should support learners to recognise how these factors are interconnected and impact on the whole of their health and well-being, not simply its physical aspect.

translation.cy: Gallai’r broses o wneud penderfyniad gynnwys datrys problemau, nodi datrysiadau posib, asesu gwybodaeth yn feirniadol, gwerthuso dadleuon amhaeddiant ac ymwneud â safbwyntiau gwahanol ac ymateb yn gadarnhaol iddyn nhw.
translation.en: The decision-making process may include problem-solving, identifying potential solutions, critically assessing information, appraising arguments for merit and engaging with and responding constructively to opposing opinions.

translation.cy: Dylai lleoliadau ac ysgolion ystyried y rôl y gall dylanwadau cymdeithasol ei chael ar ymddygiad dysgwyr, a’r dylanwadau all hyrwyddo ac annog ymddygiadau iach er lles y gymdeithas, yn ogystal â’r rhai sy’n arwain at faterion megis gwahaniaethu, hiliaeth neu ragfarn.
translation.en: Settings and schools should take account of the role that social influences can play on learner behaviour and the influences that can promote and encourage healthy prosocial behaviours as well as those that lead to issues such as discrimination, racism or prejudice.

translation.cy: Dylen nhw gael cyfleoedd i ddatblygu’r wybodaeth a’r sgiliau sydd eu hangen i chwlio cymorth iddyn nhw eu hunain ac i eraill, a phwy i fynd atyn nhw ar gyfer cymorth mewn ystod o sefyllfaoedd, o ffrindiau, teulu ac athrawon i asiantaethau a chyrff allanol megis Childline, Cymorth i Fenywod, NSPCC, yr heddlu, gwasanaethau cwnsela ac elusennau, gweithwyr iechyd proffesiynol, Child Exploitation and Online Protection (CEOP), ac ati.
translation.en: They should be given opportunities to develop the knowledge and skills needed to seek help for themselves and others, and who to approach for support in a variety of situations, ranging from friends, family and teachers to external agencies and organisations such as Childline, Women’s Aid, NSPCC, the police, counselling services and charities, health professionals, Child Exploitation and Online Protection (CEOP), etc.

translation.cy: Dylid ystyried pynciau, themâu a gweithgareddau yn holistaidd gan ystyried gwahanol agweddau ar iechyd a lles dysgwyr.
translation.en: Topics, themes and activities should be considered holistically, considering different aspects of a learners’ health and well-being.

translation.cy: Gall yr ystyriaethau dechreuol nodi’r cysylltiadau canlynol i’r datganiadau o’r hyn sy’n bwysig:
translation.en: Initial thinking may identify the following links to the statements of what matters:

translation.cy: Enghreifftio ehangder
translation.en: Illustrating breadth

translation.cy: Gallai dysgu am ymddygiadau, sefyllfaoedd a chyflyrau sy’n effeithio ar iechyd corfforol a lles gynnwys dysgu am gamddefnyddio sylweddau, datblygu sgiliau cymorth cyntaf a deall cyflyrau iechyd.
translation.en: Learning about behaviours, situations and conditions that affect physical health and well-being could include learning about substance misuse, the development of first aid skills and an understanding of health conditions.

translation.cy: Mae’r ddau Faes yma yn cyfuno i ddarparu sgiliau fydd yn galluogi dysgwyr i gyfathrebu’n effeithiol. Bydd hyn yn ei dro yn darparu sail ar gyfer datblygu cydberthnasau iach.
translation.en: These two Areas link together to provide learners with the skills to effectively communicate which in turn provide a foundation for developing healthy relationships.

translation.cy: Ymdrinnir â llythrennedd ariannol yn y datganiad o’r hyn sy’n bwysig sy’n ymdrin â’r system rif.
translation.en: Financial literacy is provided for in the statement of what matters dealing with the number system.

translation.cy: Mae gwybodaeth a dealltwriaeth o fioleg, datblygiad corfforol, cydberthnasau biolegol a rhywiol a’r cyswllt rhwng iechyd corfforol ac emosiynol yn hanfodol i ddysgu yn y Maes hwn.
translation.en: Knowledge and understanding of biology, physical development, biological and sexual relationships and the link between physical and emotional health are fundamental to learning in the Health and Well-being Area of Learning and Experience.

translation.cy: Gall dysgu sut mae’r ymennydd yn gweithio fod o gymorth i ddysgwyr ddeall eu meddyliau, teimladau ac emosiynau.
translation.en: Learning how the brain works can help learners understand their thoughts, feelings and emotions.

translation.cy: Dylai dysgwyr ddatblygu gwahanol fathau o gydberthnasau sy’n eu galluogi i werthfawrogi tebygrwydd a gwahaniaethau o fewn eu cymunedau lleol, a chyda gwahanol unigolion a chymunedau, yn genedlaethol ac yn rhyngwladol.
translation.en: Learners should develop a range of relationships that enable them to value similarities and differences within their local communities and with different individuals and communities nationally and internationally.

translation.cy: Penderfyniadau allweddol ar gyfer dysgwyr fydd y rhai hynny yn ymwneud â gyrfaoedd.
translation.en: Key decisions for learners will be those around careers.

translation.cy: Yn ogystal, gall dysgwyr gael eu cyflwyno i ddisgyblaethau cysylltiedig eraill, megis y clasuron, economeg, y gyfraith, athroniaeth, gwleidyddiaeth, seicoleg a chymdeithaseg, os a lle bydd hynny’n briodol.
translation.en: Learners may also be introduced to other complementary disciplines, such as classics, economics, law, philosophy, politics, psychology and sociology, if and where appropriate.

translation.cy: Gall hyn hefyd hyrwyddo dealltwriaeth o’r ffordd y mae pobl Cymru, ei chymunedau, ei hanes, ei diwylliant, ei thirwedd, ei hadnoddau a’i diwydiannau yn cydberthyn i weddill y byd.
translation.en: It can also promote an understanding of how the people of Wales, its communities, history, culture, landscape, resources and industries, interrelate with the rest of the world.

translation.cy: Bydd dehongli a chyfuno gwybodaeth o gymorth i ddysgwyr adeiladu ar yr hyn a ddysgwyd eisoes a llywio ymhellach eu dealltwriaeth o’r byd.
translation.en: Interpreting and synthesising information will help learners build upon what they have already learned and further inform their understanding of the world.

translation.cy: Mae’r agwedd hon o’r Maes hwn yn ysgogi archwilio cysyniadau, gan gynnwys archwilio ystyr, dod i farn, cwestiynau athronyddol a phwysig bywyd, ffyrdd o gyfleu, safbwyntiau, dehongliadau, arwyddocâd a dilysrwydd.
translation.en: This aspect of the Area will encourage the exploration of concepts, including seeking meaning, making judgements, ultimateand philosophical questions, representations, perspectives, interpretations, significance and validity.

translation.cy: Yn ei dro, gall hyn alluogi dysgwyr i adnabod beth sy’n gwneud lleoedd a gofodau yn wahanol ac i ddatblygu ymwybyddiaeth o’r cysylltiadau sydd rhwng pobl a’u hamgylchedd, a hynny mewn cyd-destun cyfoes a hanesyddol.
translation.en: This in turn will enable learners to identify what makes places and spaces distinct, and to develop an awareness of the interconnections between humans and their environment in both contemporary and historical contexts.

translation.cy: Bydd hyn hefyd yn annog dysgwyr, fel cynhyrchwyr a defnyddwyr, i ddeall eu heffaith hwy eu hunain ar y byd naturiol.
translation.en: It will also encourage learners to understand, as producers and consumers, their own impact on the natural world.

translation.cy: Gall profiadau yn y Maes hwn annog dealltwriaeth feirniadol o sut mae cymdeithasau wedi cael eu trefnu, eu strwythuro a’u harwain, yn lleol, yng Nghymru ac yn fyd-eang.
translation.en: Experiences in this Area can encourage a critical understanding of how societies are and have been organised, structured and led, in the learners’ own locality and in Wales, as well as in the wider world.

translation.cy: Mae’r agwedd hon o’r Maes hwn yn annog dysgwyr i archwilio cysyniadau gan gynnwys dinasyddiaeth, awdurdod a llywodraethiant, rhyng-gysylltu, cyfiawnder a chydraddoldeb, menter, hawliau, a gweithredu a chyfrifoldeb cymdeithasol.
translation.en: This aspect of the Area encourages learners to explore concepts, including citizenship, authority and governance, interconnectedness, justice and equality, enterprise, rights, and social actionand responsibility.

translation.cy: Egwyddorion cynnydd
translation.en: Principles of progression

translation.cy: Wrth iddyn nhw symud drwy’r continwwm dysgu, mae dysgwyr yn meithrin dealltwriaeth gynyddol o’r nodweddion sy’n diffinio’r disgyblaethau sylfaenol (gan gynnwys hanes; daearyddiaeth; crefydd, gwerthoedd a moeseg; astudiaethau busnes ac astudiaethau cymdeithasol) a’r ffordd y gellir dod â’r rhain at ei gilydd i ddarparu ffyrdd gwahanol o ystyried materion a mynd i’r afael â chwestiynau neu broblemau.
translation.en: As they move through the continuum of learning, learners have an increased understanding of the defining features of the constituent disciplines (including history; geography; religion, values and ethics; business studies and social studies) and how these can be brought together to provide different lenses through which to view issues and address questions or problems.

translation.cy: Wrth i ddysgwyr wneud cynnydd yn y Maes hwn, byddan nhw’n gofyn cwestiynau ymholi cynyddol soffistigedig.
translation.en: As learners make progress within this Area, they will be asking increasingly sophisticated enquiry questions.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu adnabod y gwahaniaeth rhwng ffeithiau a chredoau.
translation.en: I can recognise the difference between facts and beliefs.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu cydnabod ac esbonio bod fy marn i, a barn pobl eraill, yn werthfawr.
translation.en: I can recognise and explain that my opinions and the opinions of others have value.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu disgriﬁo ac esbonio pam y gall patrymau dosbarthu lleoedd, amgylcheddau a thirffurfiau newid dros gyfnod o amser yn fy ardal leol ac yng Nghymru, yn ogystal ag yn y byd ehangach.
translation.en: I can describe and explain why spatial patterns of places, environments and landforms may change over time in my locality and in Wales, as well as in the wider world.

translation.cy: Cam cynnydd 3
translation.en: Progression step 3

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu adnabod pethau tebyg a gwahanol ym mywydau pobl, yn y gorffennol a’r presennol.
translation.en: I can recognise similarities and differences between people’s lives, both in the past and present.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu ddefnyddio fy nealltwriaeth fanwl o natur a graddau newid a pharhad i esbonio a dadansoddi’r modd y mae cymunedau a chymdeithasau wedi addasu a newid, a hynny yn fy ardal i, yng Nghymru yn ogystal ag yn y byd ehangach.
translation.en: I can use my detailed understanding of the nature and extent of change and continuity to explain and analyse how communities and societies have adapted and changed in my locality and in Wales, as well as in the wider world.

translation.cy: Mae gen i ymwybyddiaeth o’r hyn sy’n iawn a’r hyn sy’n anghywir, ac y dylai fy ngweithredoedd adlewyrchu hyn.
translation.en: I have an awareness of what is right and wrong and that my actions should reflect that.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu esbonio pwysigrwydd y rhannau mae unigolion, cymdeithasau, mudiadau cymdeithasol a llywodraethau yn ei chwarae wrth amddiffyn hawliau dynol pobl.
translation.en: I can explain the importance of the roles played by individuals, societies, social movements and governments in defending people’s human rights.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu deall canlyniadau fy ngweithredoedd a gweithredoedd pobl eraill, a’r modd y mae’r rhain yn effeithio ar faterion lleol, cenedlaethol a byd-eang
translation.en: I can understand the consequences of my actions and the actions of others, and how these affect local, national and global issues.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu cymryd rhan mewn dod i benderfyniadau, ac rwy’n gallu rhannu barn a thystiolaeth gyda’r rhai sy’n gwneud penderfyniadau a chynrychiolwyr etholedig yn fy nghymuned.
translation.en: I can participate in decision-making, and I can share opinions and evidence with decision-makers and elected representatives in my community.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu dadansoddi ac esbonio effaith penderfyniadau ar bobl, eu hawliau a’r amgylchedd, penderfyniadau a wneir gan unigolion a llywodraeth leol, cenedlaethol a byd-eang a sefydliadau anllywodraethol.
translation.en: I can analyse and explain the impact of decisions made by individuals, local, national or global governance, and non-governmental organisations on people, their rights and the environment.

translation.cy: Llythrennedd
translation.en: Literacy

translation.cy: Sicrhau mynediad ac archwilio ystod o destunau o amrywiol leoedd a chyfnodau er mwyn dadansoddi tystiolaeth, meddwl yn feirniadol, dod i gasgliad, a gwerthuso dehongliadau a safbwyntiau.
translation.en: Accessing and exploring a range of texts from a variety of places and times to analyse evidence, to think critically, to infer meaning, and to evaluate interpretations and viewpoints.

translation.cy: Meddwl yn feirniadol a datrys problemau
translation.en: Critical thinking and problem-solving

translation.cy: Effeithiolrwydd personol
translation.en: Personal effectiveness

translation.cy: Safbwyntiau lleol, cenedlaethol a’r byd ehangach
translation.en: Local, national and the wider world perspectives

translation.cy: Dewis ystod o gyfnodau sydd wedi cael effaith sylweddol ar y ddynoliaeth a’r byd yn y gorffennol a’r presennol.
translation.en: Select a range of periods that have had considerable effects on humanity and the world in the past and present.

translation.cy: Dewis pynciau heriol i alluogi meddwl dwfn a myfyrio.
translation.en: Select challenging topics to enable deep thinking and reflection.

translation.cy: Dewis nifer gyfyngedig o bynciau ymhob blwyddyn i sicrhau dyfnder ac ansawdd i’r dysgu, lle y gall pynciau orgyffwrdd er mwyn atgyfnerthu cysyniadau allweddol.
translation.en: Select a limited number of topics in each year to ensure the depth and quality of learning, where topics may overlap in order to reinforce key concepts.

translation.cy: Mae’r disgyblaethau yn y Maes hwn yn cynnig golwg amrywiol ar y profiad dynol.
translation.en: The disciplines in this Area provide a variety of lenses through which to view the human experience.

translation.cy: datblygu dealltwriaeth o ddehongliad hanesyddol a sgiliau ymdrin â ffynhonnell
translation.en: develop historical interpretation understanding and source-based skills

translation.cy: Daearyddiaeth
translation.en: Geography

translation.cy: darparu sgiliau i’r dysgwyr gwestiynu, defnyddio a dadansoddi mapiau, delweddau a Systemau Gwybodaeth Ddaearyddol
translation.en: equip learners with the skills to question, use and analyse maps, images, and Geographical Information Systems

translation.cy: Dylai cynllun cwricwlwm ysgol:
translation.en: School curriculum design should:

translation.cy: ddatblygu dealltwriaeth o’r disgyblaeth a’i gwerth
translation.en: develop an understanding of the discipline and its value

translation.cy: profi ynghyd â myfyrio ar ryfeddod y byd naturiol
translation.en: experience and reflect on the wonder of the natural world

translation.cy: dysgu mewn ardaloedd naturiol lleol a safleoedd hanesyddol
translation.en: learn in local natural spaces and historical sites

translation.cy: gweithgareddau menter ac entrepreneuraidd
translation.en: enterprise and entrepreneurial activities

translation.cy: Enghreifftiau yn unig yw'r rhain.
translation.en: These are illustrations only.

translation.cy: Gellir gwerthfawrogi'r argyfwng hinsawdd yn well drwy archwilio'r chwyldro diwydiannol, daearyddiaeth a thopograffi unigryw Cymru, a chysylltiadau rhyngwladol.
translation.en: The climate emergency can be better appreciated by exploring the industrial revolution, the distinct geography and topography of Wales, and international relations.

translation.cy: Mae celf, cerddoriaeth, dawns, theatr, ffurfiau cyfryngol a llenyddol yn ddarnau gwerthfawr o dystiolaeth ar gyfer ymchwiliadau yn y dyniaethau ac yn gyfryngau ar gyfer mynegi dehongliadau a safbwyntiau pobl.
translation.en: Art, music, dance, theatre, forms of media and literature are valuable pieces of evidence for enquiries in the humanities and are mediums for expression of people’s interpretations and viewpoints.

translation.cy: Mae archwilio’r celfyddydau o wahanol gyfnodau, diwylliannau a chymdeithasau, gan gynnwys o Gymru (e.e.
translation.en: Exploring the arts from various times, cultures and societies, including from Wales (e.g.

translation.cy: Mae llenyddiaeth yn darparu tystiolaeth werthfawr ar gyfer ymchwiliadau mewn dyniaethau, ac yn gallu bod yn destun yr ymchwiliadau hyn.
translation.en: Literature provides valuable evidence for, and can be a focus of, enquiries in humanities.

translation.cy: Yn aml bydd hefyd yn cynnwys casgliad o ddata cynradd gan ddefnyddio dulliau samplu, a chynrychioliad a dadansoddiad data ac ystadegau mewn amrywiaeth o ffurfiau.
translation.en: Humanities enquiries will often include the collection of primary data using sampling methods, and the representation and analysis of data and statistics in a range of forms.

translation.cy: Gyrfaoedd a phrofiadau cysylltiedig â gwaith yn y Maes hwn
translation.en: Careers and work-related experiences in this Area

translation.cy: Mae gyrfaoedd a phrofiadau cysylltiedig â gwaith yn cynnig cyd-destun pwysig i ddysgwyr ymholi, archwilio ac ymchwilio i farchnad lafur y gorffennol, y presennol a’r dyfodol.
translation.en: Careers and work-related experiences provide an important context for learners to undertake enquiry, exploration and investigation into the labour market past, present and future.

translation.cy: Mae’n anelu at annog dysgwyr i drosglwyddo’r hyn maen nhw wedi’i ddysgu am sut mae ieithoedd yn gweithio mewn un iaith er mwyn dysgu a defnyddio ieithoedd eraill. Bwriedir i’r dull amlieithog a lluosieithog hwn danio chwilfrydedd a brwdfrydedd y dysgwyr a chynnig sylfaen gadarn iddyn nhw ddatblygu diddordeb gydol oes yn ieithoedd Cymru ac ieithoedd y byd, a thrwy hyn eu gwneud yn ddysgwyr uchelgeisiol, galluog, sy’n barod i ddysgu drwy gydol eu hoes.
translation.en: This multilingual and plurilingual approach is intended to ignite learners’ curiosity and enthusiasm and provide them with a firm foundation for a lifelong interest in the languages of Wales and the languages of the world; and thus to make them ambitious, capable learners, ready to learn throughout their lives.

translation.cy: Mae deall ieithoedd yn allweddol i ddeall y byd o’n hamgylch.
translation.en: Understanding languages is key to understanding the world around us.

translation.cy: Gyda’i gilydd, nod y proﬁadau llenyddol hyn yw tanio dychymyg a chreadigrwydd dysgwyr a bod o gymorth i feithrin cariad gydol oes tuag at lenyddiaeth.
translation.en: In all, the literary experiences offered aim to spark learners’ imagination and creativity and help to build a lifelong love of literature.

translation.cy: Mae'r dysgwr yn datblygu'n holistaidd o ran ei ddealltwriaeth a'i ddefnydd pwrpasol o ieithoedd, llythrennedd a chyfathrebu wrth wrando a darllen, siarad ac ysgrifennu, a rhyngweithio a chyfryngu mewn ystod eang o gyd-destunau.
translation.en: The learner grows holistically in their understanding and purposeful use of languages, literacy and communication when listening and reading, when speaking and writing and when interacting and mediating in a wide range of contexts.

translation.cy: Gall dysgwyr ail iaith ddefnyddio iaith fformiwlaïg gydag ychydig iawn o gamgymeriadau i ddechrau ac, wrth iddyn nhw wneud cynnydd a defnyddio iaith mewn ffordd fwy uchelgeisiol a digymell, gall ymddangos fel eu bod yn gwneud mwy o gamgymeriadau.
translation.en: Second language learners may use formulaic language with few mistakes initially and, as they progress and when being more ambitious and spontaneous in their use of language, they may appear to make more mistakes.

translation.cy: Mae cysylltiad agos rhwng y meddwl sydd ei angen i ddeall a chyfathrebu'r holl ddysgu a'r hyn sy'n galluogi dysgwyr i feithrin sgiliau derbyn, dehongli a mynegi iaith.
translation.en: The thinking needed to understand and to communicate all learning is closely related to that which enables learners to develop receptive, interpretive and expressive language skills.

translation.cy: Wrth i ddysgwyr feithrin dealltwriaeth o ieithoedd ychwanegol, caiff patrymau o ran defnydd iaith eu hadnabod, eu haddasu a'u cymhwyso mewn cyd-destunau newydd.
translation.en: As learners develop an understanding of additional languages, patterns of language use are identified, adapted and applied in new contexts.

translation.cy: Wrth iddyn nhw symud ar hyd y continwwm dysgu, bydd dysgwyr yn adeiladu ar sgiliau ieithyddol sylfaenol i feithrin medr sy'n eu galluogi i oresgyn ystod o heriau cyfathrebu yn llwyddiannus.
translation.en: As they move along the continuum of learning, learners will build on basic linguistic skills to develop a capability that enables them to overcome a range of communicative challenges successfully.

translation.cy: Cam cynnydd 2
translation.en: Progression step 2

translation.cy: Rwy’n dechrau bod yn ymwybodol o gysylltiad rhwng iaith(ieithoedd) a diwylliant, ac rwy’n datblygu ymdeimlad o berthyn.
translation.en: I am beginning to be aware of a link between language(s) and culture and am developing a sense of belonging.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu deall bod cysylltiadau rhwng iaith, diwylliant a hunaniaeth a bod rhain yn amrywio o fewn Cymru ac o amgylch y byd.
translation.en: I can understand that there are connections between language, culture and identity and that these differ within Wales and around the world.

translation.cy: Mae deall ieithoedd yn allweddol i ddeall y byd o’n hamgylch.
translation.en: Understanding languages is key to understanding the world around us.

translation.cy: Rwy’n dechrau gwahaniaethu ffonemauyn glywedol mewn gwahanol safleoedd.
translation.en: I am beginning to discriminate phonemesaurally in different positions.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu defnyddio ystod o strategaethau i ddarllen gyda rhuglder cynyddol.
translation.en: I can use a range of strategies to read with increasing fluency.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu defnyddio ystod o strategaethau i grynhoi, syntheseiddio a dadansoddi gwybodaeth er mwyn deall testunau’n fanwl.
translation.en: I can employ a range of strategies to summarise, synthesise and analyseinformation to gain in-depth understanding of texts.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu siarad am yr hyn rwy’n ei glywed, ei ddarllen neu’i weld, a mynegi barn syml.
translation.en: I can talk about what I hear, read or see and express simple opinions.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu gwrando a darllen i ddatblygu ystod eang o eirfa gyffredinol a phenodol, ac rwy’n gallu eu defnyddio’n fanwl gywir mewn gwahanol gyd-destunau.
translation.en: I can listen and read to build an extensive range of general and specific vocabulary, and I can use them with precision in different contexts.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu adnabod a dilyn gwybodaeth a chyfarwyddiadau syml am bynciau cyfarwydd ac arferion.
translation.en: I can recognise and follow information and simple instructions about familiar topics and routines.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu gwrando ar, deall ac yna adalw’n ddiweddarach yr hyn rwyf wedi’i glywed.
translation.en: I can listen to, understand and later recall what I have heard.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu defnyddio ciwiau amrywiol i ragfynegi’r ystyr gyffredinol mewn amrywiaeth o gyd-destunau llafar.
translation.en: I can use a variety of cuesto predict the general meaning in a variety of spoken contexts.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu gwrando, deall ac ymateb i ystod o gwestiynau a chyfarwyddiadau aml-gam mewn amrywiaeth o gyd-destunau cyfarwydd.
translation.en: I can listen, understand and respond to a range of questions and multi-step instructions in a variety of familiar contexts.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu defnyddio cyd-destun a lluniau i’m helpu i ddeall geiriau.
translation.en: I can use context and pictures to help me understand words.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu dehongli ystyr o destun a delweddau.
translation.en: I can infer meaning from text and images.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu arbrofi gyda geirfa rwyf newydd ei dysgu.
translation.en: I can experiment with newly-learned vocabulary.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu adnabod ymadroddion ageiriau aml eu defnydda deall yr ystyr gyffredinol yn yr hyn rwy’n ei glywed, ei ddarllen a’i weld.
translation.en: I can recognise high-frequency wordsand phrases and understand the general meaning in what I hear, read and see.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu defnyddio fy ngwybodaeth o adeiladwaith geiriau, gramadeg gan gynnwys cystrawen, a threfn testunau i gefnogi fy nealltwriaeth o’r hyn rwy’n ei glywed a’i ddarllen.
translation.en: I can use my knowledge of word construction, grammar, including syntax, and text organisation to support my understanding of what I hear and read.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu cyfathrebu gan ddefnyddio geirfa sy’n gynyddol amrywiol ac yn gynyddol fanwl gywir.
translation.en: I can communicate using an increasingly varied and precisevocabulary.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu esbonio gwybodaeth a rhannu syniadau, barn a theimladau gan ddefnyddio geirfa berthnasol.
translation.en: I can explain information and share ideas, opinions and feelings using relevant vocabulary.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu ysgrifennu gan ddefnyddio geirfa sy’n gynyddol ddychmygus, amrywiol a manwl gywir.
translation.en: I can write using an increasingly imaginative, varied and precise vocabulary.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu gwneud dewisiadau gwybodus am eirfa, iaith idiomatiga chystrawen er mwyn mynegi fy hun.
translation.en: I can make informed choices about vocabulary, idiomatic language and syntax in order to express myself.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu edrych dros fy ngwaith ac rwy’n dechrau defnyddio ystod o strategaethau ac adnoddau cyfarwydd i wella fy ngwaith llafar ac ysgrifennu.
translation.en: I can review my work and am beginning to use a range of familiar strategies and tools to improve my speaking and writing.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu myfyrio’n feirniadol ar fy nefnydd o iaith ac yn gallu ystyried yn wrthrychol effaith fy nghyfathrebu gweledol, llafar ac ysgrifenedig.
translation.en: I can reflect critically on my use of language and can consider the effects of my spoken, written and visual communicationobjectively.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu ymgymryd ag ystod o rolau a rheoli fy nghyfraniad yn briodol.
translation.en: I can adopt a range of roles and manage my contributions appropriately.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu ymateb i safbwyntiau pobl eraill, gan ymofyn eglurhad, strwythuro dadleuon, crynhoi ac esbonio’r hyn rwyf wedi’i glywed, ei ddarllen neu’i weld.
translation.en: I can respond to others’ points of view by seeking clarity, structuring arguments, summarising and explaining what I have heard, read or seen.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu rhoi ymgais ar sillafu geiriau anoddach mewn ffordd resymol gan ddefnyddio ystod o strategaethau.
translation.en: I can attempt to spell more difficult words plausibly using a range of strategies.

translation.cy: Rwy’n dechrau mynegi fy nheimladau.
translation.en: I am beginning to express my feelings.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu defnyddio geirfa sy’n gynyddol ddychmygus ac amrywiol.
translation.en: I can use an increasingly imaginative and varied vocabulary.

translation.en: Progression step 2
