translation.cy: Galwodd panel rhyngwladol o arbenigwyr, dan gadeiryddiaeth Dr Ruth Hussey, am “chwyldro o’r tu mewn” i ysgogi’r newidiadau sydd eu hangen i’n system iechyd a gofal cymdeithasol, er mwyn medru diwallu anghenion y genhedlaeth bresennol a chenedlaethau’r dyfodol yng Nghymru.
translation.en: An international panel of experts, chaired by Dr Ruth Hussey, called for a “revolution from within”, to drive the changes we need to see in our health and social care system, so that it is able to meet the needs of current and future generations in Wales.

translation.cy: Mae’r cynllun hwn yn ymateb i adroddiad yr Adolygiad Seneddol.
translation.en: This plan is a response to the Parliamentary Review report.

translation.cy: Rhaid i ni ganolbwyntio ar drawsnewid, arloesi a chyflawni gan wybod bod gennym sylfeini cadarn i adeiladu arnynt yn ein system bresennol.
translation.en: Our focus has to be on transformation, innovation and delivery knowing we have foundations to build on in our current system.

translation.cy: Heb ymateb a newid, ni fyddwn yn llwyddo i gyflawni anghenion poblogaeth Cymru.
translation.en: Without response and change we will fall short of meeting the needs of the Welsh population.

translation.cy: Bydd arweiniad a chyfeiriad cadarn yn genedlaethol yn helpu gyda’r newidiadau hyn, gan ein galluogi i gydio ym mhotensial llawn ein system integredig a’n dull o gynllunio, ond bydd y prawf go-iawn yn dod wrth ddarparu gwasanaethau a chanlyniadau gwell ar draws Cymru.
translation.en: Stronger national leadership and direction will support these changes, enabling us to grasp the full potential of our integrated system and our planning approach, but our real test will be in the delivery of services and improved outcomes across Wales.

translation.cy: llesiant ac atal salwch.
translation.en: preventing illness.

translation.cy: Byddwn yn parhau i geisio sicrhau ansawdd a gwerth drwy gydlynu ein gwaith ymchwil, arloesi a gwella.
translation.en: We will continue to pursue quality and value through co-ordinating our research, innovation and improvement activity.

translation.cy: Bydd gwasanaethau ysbytai yn cael eu llunio i leihau’r amser sy’n cael ei dreulio yn yr ysbyty, a chyflymu adferiad.
translation.en: Hospital services will be designed to reduce the time spent in hospital, and to speed up recovery.

translation.cy: Yn sgil y pwyslais ar ysgogi newid a gwelliant, y pwyslais ar lesiant, atal ac ymyrryd yn gynnar, ac ar ddefnyddio technoleg i gefnogi gwasanaethau o ansawdd uchel, bydd y system gyfan yn fwy effeithiol, effeithlon a theg, ac felly’n fwy cynaliadwy i genedlaethau’r dyfodol yng Nghymru.”
translation.en: Because of its emphasis on driving change and improvement, its emphasis on wellbeing, prevention and early intervention, and on using technology to support high quality services, this whole system approach will be more effective, efficient and equitable, so that it is sustainable for future generations in Wales.”

translation.cy: Gwerthoedd
translation.en: Values

translation.cy: Integreiddio gwelliant yn ein gwaith bob dydd a dileu niwed, gwahaniaethu a gwastraff.
translation.en: Integrating improvement into everyday working and eliminating harm, variation and waste.

translation.cy: ac ar ddarparu’r gwasanaethau cyhoeddus gorau posib, gan ein helpu i wneud gwell dewisiadau ynghylch sut, ble a phryd i ddarparu cymorth a gwasanaethau.
translation.en: Welsh population, and on the best possible delivery of public services, helping us to make better choices about how and where and when to provide support and services.

translation.cy: Y gwerthoedd craidd sy’n sail i’r GIG yng Nghymru yw:
translation.en: The core values that underpin the NHS in Wales are:

translation.cy: Gwerthoedd system gyfan arfaethedig Cydlynu gwasanaethau iechyd a gofal cymdeithasol yn ddi-dor o amgylch anghenion a dewisiadau’r unigolyn, fel nad oes gwahaniaeth pwy sy’n darparu’r gwasanaethau unigol.
translation.en: Co-ordinating health and social care services seamlessly, wrapped around the needs and preferences of the individual, so that it makes no difference who is providing individual services.

translation.cy: Yn falch o’r hyn y mae’n ei gyflawni, ac yn falch o’r ffordd y mae’n parhau i gyflawni yn unol ag egwyddorion sylfaenol Aneurin Bevan.
translation.en: Proud of what it achieves, and proud of how it continues to deliver against Aneurin Bevan’s founding principles.

translation.cy: Dangosodd astudiaeth enwog Carfan Caerffili effaith ‘ffactorau bywyd’ fel peidio smygu, osgoi goryfed, cadw at bwysau iach, deiet da ac ymarfer corff.
translation.en: The renowned Caerphilly Cohort study demonstrates the impact of ‘lifestyle factors’ such as not smoking, avoiding excessive drinking, maintaining a healthy weight, good diet and exercise.

translation.cy: Bydd pobl yn cael cymorth i barhau i gadw’n brysur a bod yn annibynnol yn eu cartrefi eu hunain cyn hired â phosibl.
translation.en: People will be supported to remain active and independent, in their own homes, for as long as possible.

translation.cy: Pan fo anghenion neu amgylchiadau pobl yn golygu nad oes modd iddynt fyw yn eu cartrefi eu hunain, neu os mai’r ffordd orau o amddiffyn eu llesiant yw gofalu amdanynt mewn lleoliad arall, gallant ddisgwyl cael gofal o ansawdd uchel – ar draws yr holl system, bydd amrywiol gymorth mewn gwahanol leoliadau, a fydd yn cael ei ddarparu mewn ffordd bersonol i ddiwallu anghenion a dewisiadau pobl.
translation.en: When someone’s needs or circumstances mean that they can no longer live in their own home, or if their wellbeing is best protected by being looked after in another setting, they can expect to have high quality care provided – across the whole system, there will be a range of support in different settings, which will be personalised to meet people’s needs and preferences.

translation.cy: Rydym yn gwybod bod ffactorau o’n plentyndod, yn arbennig ‘profiadau niweidiol yn ystod plentyndod’, yn cael effaith sylweddol arnom wrth i ni dyfu.
translation.en: We know that factors in our childhood, particularly ‘adverse childhood experiences,’ have a significant impact on us as we grow up.

translation.cy: ein cynllun Iechyd a Gofal Cymdeithasol
translation.en: our plan for health and social care

translation.cy: Mae’r dull holistaidd sydd ei angen arnom hefyd yn un sy’n darparu lefel gyfartal o driniaeth, gofal neu gymorth i bobl drwy gydol eu bywydau, boed yn fater iechyd corfforol neu feddyliol.
translation.en: one that provides an equitable level of treatment, care or support to people throughout their lives and irrespective of whether it is a matter of physical or mental health.

translation.cy: Ein gweledigaeth at y dyfodol yw un drefn system gyfan lle caiff gwasanaethau sy’n cael eu darparu gan wahanol ddarparwyr eu cydlynu’n ddi-dor ar gyfer ac o amgylch yr unigolyn.
translation.en: Our future vision is of a single whole system approach in which services delivered by different providers are co-ordinated seamlessly for and around the individual.

translation.cy: Mae gwasanaethau mewn ysbytai yn ddwys o ran adnoddau, ac fe fyddai’n well gan y rhan fwyaf o bobl fod yn agosach at y cartref. Bydd hyn yn caniatáu modelau partneriaeth newydd rhwng gwahanol ddarparwyr ac unigolion, gan alluogi pobl i aros yn yr ysbyty am gyfnod mor fyr â phosib.
translation.en: Hospital-based services are resource intensive, and most people would prefer to be closer to home, which will allow new models of partnership between different providers, and individuals, enabling people to minimise their hospital stay.

translation.cy: Ni fydd modd i rai pobl gyrraedd at wasanaethau digidol, a bydd eraill yn dewis peidio.
translation.en: Some people will be unable to access digital services, others will choose not to.

translation.cy: Mae nifer fawr o bethau na ellir eu darparu yn ddigidol na thrwy dechnoleg.
translation.en: There are many things which can not be delivered digitally or through technology.

translation.cy: Pobl fydd sylfaen gwasanaethau iechyd a gofal o ansawdd uchel o hyd.
translation.en: People will always be the foundation of high quality health and social care services.

translation.cy: Bydd gwasanaethau mewn ysbyty yn parhau i fod yn rhan hanfodol a gweledol o’n system iechyd a gofal yn y dyfodol.
translation.en: Hospital based services will remain an essential and visible part of our future health and care system.

translation.cy: Yn gyffredinol bydd pobl yn cael cymorth amrywiaeth o wasanaethau a gweithgareddau cymunedol, gan adeiladu ar ganolfannau cymunedol lleol ac ar gymorth meddygon teulu a gofal sylfaenol.
translation.en: People will be broadly supported by a range of community-based services and activities, building on local community hubs and on GP and primary care support.

translation.cy: Drwy ein hymrwymiad i gadw mewn cysylltiad yn barhaus, gan gynnwys wrth ddatblygu’r Cynllun hwn, rydym am arwain ein partneriaid a’n rhanddeiliaid i gyflawni ein gweledigaeth ar gyfer y degawd nesaf.
translation.en: Through our commitment to genuine continuous engagement, including in developing this Plan, we want to lead all of our partners and stakeholders towards achieving our vision for the next decade.

translation.cy: Mae’r syniad o bedwar nod cysylltiedig – a ddisgrifir gyda’i gilydd fel Nod Pedwarplyg – yn ysgogi datblygiad nifer o systemau iechyd a gofal cymdeithasol sy’n perfformio’n dda ar draws y byd.
translation.en: The idea of four interlocking aims – described together as the Quadruple Aim – is driving the development of many high performing international health and social care systems.

translation.cy: Mae iechyd a gofal cymdeithasol cynaliadwy yn her fyd-eang.
translation.en: Sustainable health and social care is a global challenge.

translation.cy: Byddwn hefyd yn defnyddio’r Nod Pedwarplyg i adrodd ar ein cynnydd tuag at gyflawni’r weledigaeth ar gyfer y dyfodol.
translation.en: We will also use the Quadruple Aim to report on our progress towards achieving the future vision.

translation.cy: Bydd yr egwyddorion cynllunio hyn yn helpu i gysoni’r nifer o brosiectau a rhaglenni newid sydd angen eu gweld, ar draws ein holl system, er mwyn iddynt fedru cyfuno i gyflawni ‘chwyldro o’r tu mewn’ yn ein system iechyd a gofal cymdeithasol.
translation.en: These design principles will help to align the many change projects and programmes we need to see, across our whole system, so that they can combine together to deliver a ‘revolution from within’ in health and social care.

translation.cy: Bydd yr egwyddorion cynllunio yn helpu pobl i gadarnhau a ydynt yn mynd i’r cyfeiriad cywir, ar y cyflymdra cywir.
translation.en: The design principles will help people to check whether they are heading in the right direction, at the right pace.

translation.cy: Bydd yr egwyddorion cynllunio yn helpu i arwain yr arloesi a’r awydd am newid sydd gennym eisoes ar draws iechyd a gofal cymdeithasol, er mwyn iddo adeiladu’n gynt ac yn bwrpasol i fodelau di-dor o iechyd a gofal cymdeithasol y gellir eu datblygu’n rhanbarthol ac yn genedlaethol, yn unol â’n gweledigaeth o drefn system gyfan yn y dyfodol.
translation.en: The design principles will help to guide the innovation and appetite for change which we already have across health and social care, so that it builds more quickly and with more purpose into new models of seamless local health and social care, which can be scaled regionally and nationally, in line with our future vision of a whole system approach.

translation.cy: meddygaeth fanwl;
translation.en: precision medicine;

translation.cy: Seiliedig ar dystiolaeth – defnyddio ymchwil, dysg a gwybodaeth i ddeall beth sy’n gweithio;
translation.en: Evidence driven – using research, knowledge and information to understand what works;

translation.cy: Datblygu – sicrhau bod modd datblygu arfer da o lefel leol i lefel ranbarthol a chenedlaethol, ac allan i dimau a sefydliadau eraill.
translation.en: Scalable – ensuring that good practice scales up from local to regional and national level, and out to other teams and organisations.

translation.cy: Mae’n galonogol gweld bod rhai o’r modelau hyn wedi dechrau’n lleol, gan gynnwys drwy’r clystyrau gofal sylfaenol, a bod nifer wedi dangos cydweithio effeithiol rhwng darparwyr iechyd a gofal cymdeithasol.
translation.en: It is encouraging that some of these models have originated in a very local context, including through primary care clusters, and that many have demonstrated effective joint working between health and social care providers.

translation.cy: Gwelir swyddogaeth bwysig i’r Byrddau Partneriaeth Rhanbarthol wrth ysgogi datblygiad modelau iechyd a gofal cymdeithasol, gan gynnwys gofal sylfaenol ac eilaidd, ar lefel leol.
translation.en: We see a key role for Regional Partnership Boards (RPBs) in driving the development at local level of models of health and social care, including primary and secondary care.

translation.cy: Neu gallai gyflawni cynaliadwyedd tymor hir drwy wasanaethau ataliol sy’n gwella canlyniadau iechyd a llesiant, gan gefnogi gwasanaethau statudol.
translation.en: It could also deliver long-term sustainability through preventative services that improve health and wellbeing outcomes, supporting statutory services.

translation.cy: Fel rhan o’n hymgais i sicrhau ffordd fwy clir a chyson o drawsnewid, byddwn yn adolygu pob un o’r rhain ac yn ystyried cyfleoedd i’w cysoni a’u huno i’r Rhaglen Drawsnewid a’n dull cenedlaethol o drawsnewid.
translation.en: As part of our drive towards a more coherent and co-ordinated approach to transformation, we will review all of these and consider opportunities to align and merge them into the Transformation Programme and our national approach to transformation.

translation.cy: Byddwn yn parhau i fuddsoddi yn ein dull o wella ansawdd, gan gynnwys cryfhau ein talent a’n harweinyddiaeth, a chynllunio ar sail genedlaethol i sicrhau bod arfer da yn cael ei rhannu’n eang.
translation.en: We will continue to invest in our approach to improving quality, including through strengthening our talent and leadership, and planning on a national basis to ensure that good practice is widely shared.

translation.cy: Byddwn yn parhau i ddatblygu ein gwybodaeth glinigol o ansawdd uchel, a datblygu mesurau gan ddefnyddio adborth gan bobl, cleifion a staff, er mwyn ymwreiddio gofal iechyd seiliedig ar werth fel ffordd o fesur yr hyn sy’n bwysig i bobl, gan sicrhau bod gweithgarwch gwella yn canolbwyntio ar ganlyniadau.
translation.en: We will continue to develop our high quality clinical information, and develop measures using feedback from people patients and staff, so that we can embed value-based healthcare as the way we measure what matters most to people, ensuring that improvement activity is focussed on outcomes.

translation.cy: gofal henoed bregus;
translation.en: frail elderly care;

translation.cy: Drwy wneud gwell defnydd o dechnoleg ddigidol, data a chyfathrebu, bydd modd i ni wella ansawdd a gwerth gwasanaethau iechyd a gofal cymdeithasol, er mwyn iddynt fod yn gost-effeithiol ac yn gynaliadwy. Bydd hefyd yn golygu bod ein cynnig yn cyfateb i ddisgwyliadau pobl o dechnoleg yn eu bywydau bob dydd.
translation.en: Making better use of digital, data, and communication technologies will help us to raise the quality and value of health and social care services, so that they are cost-effective and sustainable and also bring our offer in line with increasing expectations of technology in people’s dayto-day lives.

translation.cy: Mae System Wybodaeth Gofal Cymunedol Cymru yn rhaglen genedlaethol sy’n caniatáu i wybodaeth gael ei rhannu’n ddiogel rhwng gwasanaethau iechyd a gofal cymdeithasol.
translation.en: The Welsh Community Care Information System is a national programme enabling the safe sharing of information between health and social care.

translation.cy: Wrth gael yr holl wybodaeth sydd ei angen am yr unigolyn, neu am grwpiau o unigolion tebyg, bydd modd darparu gwell canlyniadau drwy helpu clinigwyr ar bob lefel i wneud gwell penderfyniadau.
translation.en: Having all the information needed about the individual, or about groups of similar people, will deliver better outcomes by helping clinicians at every level to make better decisions.

translation.cy: dod o hyd i’r gwasanaeth mwyaf priodol ar gyfer eu hanghenion, cyfrannu a rhannu gwybodaeth am eu hiechyd a’u gofal, rheoli apwyntiadau a chyfathrebu gyda gweithwyr proffesiynol, a gweithio gydag eraill i gydlynu’r gofal a’r driniaeth sydd eu hangen, er mwyn eu darparu’n ddi-dor.
translation.en: finding the most appropriate service for their needs, contributing to and sharing information about their health and care, managing appointments and communications with professionals, and working with others to co-ordinate the care and treatment they need, so that it is delivered seamlessly.

translation.cy: Mae technoleg ddigidol yn datblygu’n gyflym tu hwnt, ac rydym yn disgwyl gweld cyfleoedd a heriau newydd drwy gydol cyfnod y cynllun hwn.
translation.en: Digital technology develops at a very rapid pace, and we expect to see new opportunities and challenges throughout the life of this plan.

translation.cy: Byddwn yn buddsoddi i ddatblygu’r sgiliau angenrheidiol o fewn ein gweithlu ein hunain, er enghraifft i wneud gwell dewis o wybodeg glinigol ac ysgogi prosiectau trawsnewid digidol.
translation.en: We will invest to develop the skills we need within our own workforce, for example to make better use of clinical informatics, and to drive digital transformation projects.

translation.cy: Hefyd mae angen i ni gael gwell dealltwriaeth o lefelau’r adnodd rydym yn ei fuddsoddi ar hyn o bryd i atal salwch a datblygiad afiechyd.
translation.en: We also need to increase our understanding of the levels of resource we are currently investing in preventing ill-health and the progression of disease.

translation.cy: Er mwyn penderfynu a yw’r newid yn digwydd yn ddigon cyflym, byddwn yn llunio dull o olrhain y newid dros amser, a chyhoeddi’r canlyniadau a geir.
translation.en: In order to determine whether the rate of change is sufficient, we will design a methodology to track this changing pattern over time and publish the results that it provides.

translation.cy: Ein huchelgais yw darparu cyfleusterau modern ac addas i’r diben er mwyn ategu’r modelau gofal newydd, ond bydd angen cydbwyso hyn bob amser gyda chynnal ein seilwaith presennol wrth flaenoriaethu’r defnydd o gyllid cyfalaf.
translation.en: Our ambition is to deliver modern and fit for purpose facilities to support the new models of care, but we will always have to balance this against maintaining our existing infrastructure when prioritising the application of capital funding.

translation.cy: Bellach mae amrywiol ddyletswyddau cyfreithiol ar wasanaethau iechyd a gofal cymdeithasol i ymgynghori a thrafod, sy’n golygu weithiau bod rhaid gwneud hynny yn unigol, mewn ffordd wahanol.
translation.en: Providers of health and social care services now have varying legal duties to consult and engage, which means they must sometimes do so separately, and in different ways.

translation.cy: Mae hefyd yn golygu gwerthfawrogiad tecach o’r swyddogaeth eang ac amrywiol y mae pobl yn ei chwarae yn y nod cyffredin o ddarparu gwasanaethau o ansawdd uchel, ar draws system eang o ddarpariaeth sylfaenol a chymunedol i wasanaethau gofal mewn ysbyty neu arbenigol.
translation.en: It also means a more equitable appreciation of the wide and varied roles people play in the joint aim of delivering high quality services, across a broad system which runs from primary and community provision through to hospital based care and specialised services.

translation.cy: Wrth i fwy o fodelau iechyd a gofal di-dor ymddangos gydag anogaeth a chefnogaeth y cynllun hwn, bydd angen dull gweithredu clir a chyson i ddatblygu a chynllunio’r holl weithlu er mwyn datblygu a chyflwyno’r ffyrdd newydd o weithio gorau ar draws Cymru.
translation.en: As more new seamless models of health and care emerge with the encouragement and support of this plan, we will need a clear and coherent approach to developing and planning the whole workforce so that we are ready to develop and roll-out the best new ways of working across Wales.

translation.cy: I wneud hyn, bydd Llywodraeth Cymru yn comisiynu Addysg a Gwella Iechyd Cymru a Gofal Cymdeithasol Cymru i ddatblygu strategaeth hirdymor ar gyfer y gweithlu mewn partneriaeth â’r GIG a Llywodraeth Leol, y sector gwirfoddol ac annibynnol yn ogystal â rheoleiddwyr, cyrff proffesiynol a darparwyr addysg.
translation.en: To do this, the Welsh Government will commission Health Education and Improvement Wales (HEIW) and Social Care Wales (SCW) to develop a long-term workforce strategy in partnership with NHS and Local Government, the voluntary and independent sectors as well as regulators, professional bodies, and education providers.

translation.cy: Wrth wneud hynny bydd angen nodi anghenion recriwtio a staffio cyffredin a datblygu pecynnau cyflogaeth deniadol a all helpu i ddenu unigolion a theuluoedd i hyfforddi, gweithio a byw yng nghymunedau Cymru.
translation.en: In doing so they will need to identify shared recruitment and staffing needs and develop attractive employment packages which can help entice individuals and families to train, work and live in Welsh communities.

translation.cy: Bydd ein dull gweithredu cenedlaethol yn cael ei arwain gan fodelau newydd o iechyd a gofal cymdeithasol a fydd yn gofyn am sgiliau sy’n canolbwyntio ar atal a llesiant, wedi’u hategu gan sgiliau cyffredinol a all fod yn llwyfan i bobl addasu ac amrywio drwy gydol eu gyrfaoedd.
translation.en: Our national approach will be guided by emerging models of health and social care which will require workforce skills focussed on prevention and wellbeing, underpinned by increasing generalist skills which can be a platform for people to adapt and diversify throughout their careers.

translation.cy: Roedd yr Adolygiad Seneddol yn cydnabod mai un o’r prif ffactorau wrth ddarparu gwasanaethau iechyd a gofal cymdeithasol o ansawdd uchel yw llesiant a chyfranogaeth y staff, felly un dimensiwn o’r Nod Pedwarplyg yw:
translation.en: The Parliamentary Review recognised that a key factor in delivering high quality health and social care is the wellbeing and engagement of staff, making one dimension of the quadruple aim:

translation.cy: Byddant yn rhan o’r goruchwylio cenedlaethol drwy’r Fframwaith Cynllunio a’r drefn rheoli perfformiad.
translation.en: They will inform national oversight of delivery through the planning framework and the performance management system.

translation.cy: Felly mae Byrddau Gwasanaethau Cyhoeddus yn rhan ganolog o’r agenda ehangach hon i ddatblygu gwaith effeithiol a meddwl tymor hirach ar lefel leol.
translation.en: Public Service Boards are therefore central to this broader agenda to develop effective working and longer-term thinking at a local level.

translation.cy: Byddwn yn disgwyl gweld gwaith effeithiol a llyfn ar lefel leol ranbarthol a chenedlaethol.
translation.en: We will expect to see effective and streamlined working at local, regional and national levels.

translation.cy: Dros gyfnod o amser, bydd tair agwedd y dull gweithredu hwn – cynlluniau iechyd ar lefel bwrdd/ymddiriedolaeth iechyd lleol, cynlluniau iechyd a gofal cymdeithasol rhanbarthol, a chynlluniau iechyd cenedlaethol – yn uno i wireddu cynlluniau system gyfan.
translation.en: Over time, all three aspects of this planned approach – local health board/trust level health planning, regional health and social care planning, and national health planning – will converge to make whole system planning a reality.

translation.cy: Bydd un drefn canlyniadau iechyd a gofal cymdeithasol genedlaethol, yn unol â’r Nod Pedwarplyg, yn pwysleisio pwysigrwydd yr hyn y mae gwasanaethau yn ei gyflawni i gymunedau ac unigolion.
translation.en: A single national health and social care outcomes approach, aligned to the Quadruple Aim, will emphasise the importance of what services actually deliver for communities and individuals.

translation.cy: Eisoes ceir parodrwydd i edrych ar waith partneriaeth rhwng Arolygiaethau ac fe ddylai hyn symud tuag at ddull cyfun o sicrhau craffu priodol ar ddarpariaeth iechyd a gofal.
translation.en: There is already a willingness to explore partnership working between Inspectorates, and this should move towards a combined approach to ensuring effective scrutiny of health and care delivery.

translation.cy: Bydd swyddogaeth weithredol genedlaethol yn sicrhau dull cyson o gynllunio, gosod blaenoriaethau ar sail canlyniadau, rheoli perfformiad ac atebolrwydd.
translation.en: A national executive function will ensure a consistent approach to planning, priority setting based on outcomes, performance management and accountability.

translation.cy: CYFLWYNIAD
translation.en: INTRODUCTION

translation.cy: Felly, os yw'n ymddangos nad oes angen esboniad neu sylw ar adran neu ran o adran, ni wneir hynny.
translation.en: So, where a section or part of a section does not seem to require any explanation or comment, none is given.

translation.cy: Bydd Aelodau Cynulliad Cenedlaethol Cymru yn cael eu galw’n Aelodau’r Senedd neu’n Members of the Senedd.
translation.en: Members of the National Assembly for Wales will be known as Members of the Senedd or Aelodau‟r Senedd.

translation.cy: Mae adran 2 yn disodli'r cyfeiriad yn adran 1 o Ddeddf 2006 at “National Assembly for Wales” gyda “Senedd Cymru or the Welsh Parliament” (y cyfeirir ati yng ngweddill Deddf 2006 fel “y Senedd”).
translation.en: Section 2 replaces the reference in section 1 of the 2006 Act to “National Assembly for Wales” with “Senedd Cymru or the Welsh Parliament” (to be referred to in the remainder of the 2006 Act as “the Senedd”).

translation.cy: Yn bennaf, mae’r Rhan yn cynnwys diwygiadau i’r gyfraith etholiadol bresennol, yn enwedig Deddf Cynrychiolaeth y Bobl 1983 (“Deddf 1983”) a Rheoliadau Cynrychiolaeth y Bobl (Cymru a Lloegr) 2001 (OS 2001/341) (“Rheoliadau 2001”) sy’n darparu llawer o’r manylion gweithredol ar y system gofrestru (ymysg pethau eraill).
translation.en: The Part mostly contains amendments to existing electoral law, in particular the Representation of the People Act 1983 (“the 1983 Act”) and the Representation of the People (England and Wales) Regulations 2001(SI 2001/341) (“the 2001 Regulations”) which provide much of the operational detail on the registration system (amongst other things).

translation.cy: Mae adran 16(5) yn dileu’r gofyniad yn rheoliad 28 bod rhaid i gais i gofrestru, ac unrhyw wrthwynebiad i gais o’r fath, fod ar gael i’w archwilio, pan wneir cais gan berson o dan 16 oed.
translation.en: Section 16(5) removes the requirement in regulation 28 that an application to register, and any objection to such an application, must be made available for inspection, where an application is made by a person under the age of 16.

translation.cy: Mae'r nodiadau hyn yn cyfeirio at Ddeddf Senedd ac Etholiadau (Cymru) 2020 (dccc 1) a gafodd y Cydsyniad Brenhinol ar 15 Ionawr 2020
translation.en: These notes refer to the Senedd and Elections (Wales) Act 2020 (anaw 1) which received Royal Assent on 15 January 2020

translation.cy: Mae Rheoliad 29ZA yn gwneud darpariaeth ynghylch dilysu gwybodaeth a ddarperir mewn cais i gofrestru sy’n cynnwys anfon y wybodaeth i’w gwirio ar sail cofnodion a gedwir gan Cyllid a Thollau EM a’r Adran Gwaith a Phensiynau.
translation.en: Regulation 29ZA makes provision about verification of information provided in an application for registration which includes sending the information to be checked against records held by HM Revenue and Customs and the Department for Work and Pensions.

translation.cy: Mae adran 17(2) yn darparu nad yw rheoliad 31D(2)(b) yn gymwys pan fo testun adolygiad o’r fath o dan 16 oed.
translation.en: Section 17(2) provides that regulation 31D(2)(b) does not apply where the subject of such a review is under the age of 16.

translation.cy: Mae adran 7B yn nodi o dan ba amgylchiadau y caniateir i berson wneud datganiad o gysylltiad lleol.
translation.en: Section 7B sets out the circumstances under which a person is permitted to make a declaration of local connection.

translation.cy: Mae’r diwygiad yn darparu, o ran cofrestru etholwyr llywodraeth leol yng Nghymru, nad oes angen ardystio datganiad o wasanaeth a wneir gan berson o dan 18 oed fel y nodir yn adran 14(1A).
translation.en: The amendment provides that in relation to the registration of local government electors in Wales, a service declaration made by a person under the age of 18 as set out in section 14(1A) does not need to be attested.

translation.cy: Mae adran 25 yn pennu o dan ba amgylchiadau y caniateir datgelu gwybodaeth person ifanc.
translation.en: Section 25 sets out the circumstances under which a young person‟s information may be disclosed.

translation.cy: Adran 26 – Darpariaeth bellach ar gyfer eithriadau
translation.en: Section 26- Further provision for exceptions

translation.cy: Mae adran 26(2) yn nodi rhestr anghynhwysfawr o’r math o ddarpariaeth y gellir ei gwneud yn y rheoliadau.
translation.en: Section 26(2) sets out a non- exhaustive list of the kind of provision that may be made in the regulations.

translation.cy: Mae'n diwygio’r diffiniad o ddinesydd cymhwysol y Gymanwlad ac yn mewnosod diffiniad newydd o ran dinesydd tramor cymhwysol.
translation.en: It amends the definition of “qualifying Commonwealth citizen” and inserts a new definition of “qualifying foreign citizen”.

translation.cy: Mae'r adran hon yn mewnosod paragraffau newydd 16A i 16C, 20A ac 20B yn Atodlen 1 i Ddeddf Pleidiau Gwleidyddol, Etholiadau a Refferenda 2000 ac yn gwneud rhagor o ddiwygiadau i'r Atodlen honno o ganlyniad i ychwanegu'r paragraffau newydd.
translation.en: This section inserts new paragraphs 16A to 16C, 20A and 20B into Schedule 1 to the Political Parties, Elections and Referendums Act 2000 and makes further amendments to that Schedule as a consequence of the addition of the new paragraphs.

translation.cy: Rhaid darparu cynllun:
translation.en: A plan must be provided when:

translation.cy: Mae'r adran hon hefyd yn diwygio paragraff 18 o Atodlen 1 i Ddeddf Pleidiau Gwleidyddol, Etholiadau a Refferenda 2000 i'w gwneud yn ofynnol i Archwilydd Cyffredinol Cymru gynnal archwiliad arall o gyfrifon y Comisiwn Etholiadol sy'n ymwneud â gweithgarwch y Comisiwn a nodir ym mharagraffau 16A ac 16B os bydd Pwyllgor y Llywydd yn gofyn iddo wneud hynny.
translation.en: This section also amends paragraph 18 of Schedule 1 to the Political Parties, Elections and Referendums Act 2000 to require the Auditor General for Wales (“AGW”) to carry out a further examination of the Electoral Commission‟s accounts relating to the Commission‟s activities set out in paragraphs 16A and 16B if requested to do so by the Llywydd‟s Committee.

translation.cy: Mae'r adroddiadau hynny i'w gosod gerbron y Senedd.
translation.en: Those reports are to be laid before the Senedd.

translation.cy: Dargedwir y trefniadau arbennig a wnaed eisoes mewn perthynas ag Aelodau Seneddol yn adrannau 17A a 17B o Ddeddf 2006.
translation.en: The special arrangements already made in relation to Members of Parliament in sections 17A and 17B of the 2006 Act are retained.

translation.cy: Mae'n darparu y caiff person ei anghymhwyso rhag bod yn Aelod, a rhag bod yn ymgeisydd i fod yn Aelod o'r Senedd os yw wedi’i gynnwys mewn unrhyw un o'r categorïau person a nodir yn Rhan 1 o Atodlen 1A newydd i Ddeddf 2006 neu’n dal unrhyw un o'r swyddi a nodir yn Rhan 2 o Atodlen 1A (a fewnosodwyd gan adran 29(7) o’r Ddeddf).
translation.en: It provides that a person is disqualified from being a Member, and from being a candidate to be a Member of the Senedd, if they fall within any of the categories of person specified in Part 1 of new Schedule 1A to the 2006 Act, or hold any of the offices specified in Part 2 of Schedule 1A (inserted by section 29 (7) of the Act).

translation.cy: Mae Atodlen 1A yn darparu ar gyfer anghymhwyso personau sy'n dal swydd Arglwydd Raglaw, Rhaglaw neu Uchel-Siryf ar gyfer unrhyw ardal yng Nghymru.
translation.en: Schedule 1A provides for the disqualification of persons holding the office of lord-lieutenant, lieutenant or high sheriff for any area in Wales.

translation.cy: Diben y ddarpariaeth hon yw rhoi digon o amser i Aelod o Dŷ'r Arglwyddi sydd â chaniatâd i fod yn absennol yn ystod un tymor yn Senedd y DU (ac sydd am barhau i fod yn absennol) adnewyddu ei ganiatâd i fod yn absennol o'r Tŷ ar ddechrau'r tymor newydd yn Senedd y DU.
translation.en: The purpose of this provision is to allow a Member of the House of Lords on leave of absence during one Parliament (and who wishes to continue that absence) sufficient time to renew their leave of absence from the House at the start of the new Parliament.

translation.cy: Mae adran 33 yn mewnosod adrannau 17D, 17E a 17F newydd yn Neddf 2006.
translation.en: Section 33 inserts new sections 17D, 17E and 17F into the 2006 Act.

translation.cy: Yr enw ar hyn yw “y cyfnod perthnasol”.
translation.en: This is known as “the relevant time”.

translation.cy: Mae'r is-adran honno'n darparu, os bydd person sydd wedi'i anghymhwyso rhag bod yn ymgeisydd i fod yn Aelod o'r Senedd yn cael ei enwebu fel ymgeisydd mewn etholiad, y bydd yr enwebiad yn ddi-rym.
translation.en: That subsection provides that if a person who is disqualified from being a candidate for membership of the Senedd is nominated as a candidate at an election, the nomination is void.

translation.cy: Mae'r holl ddarpariaethau a ddiddymwyd yn ymwneud â'r posibilrwydd y caiff person ei anghymhwyso mewn perthynas ag etholaeth neu ranbarth etholiadol Senedd.
translation.en: The repealed provisions all relate to the possibility of a person being disqualified in relation to a particular Senedd constituency or electoral region.

translation.cy: Creu Cymru Unedig, sy’n Decach i Bawb
translation.en: Creating a United and Fairer Wales for All

translation.cy: Boed yn blant ysgol sy’n llwglyd neu’n rhieni sy’n gorfod ceisio ymdopi â chostau gofal plant a mynediad at addysg y blynyddoedd cynnar.
translation.en: From school children going hungry to parents juggling the costs of childcare and access to early years education.

translation.cy: Bydd adroddiad interim ac adroddiad terfynol y Comisiwn yn cael eu cyflwyno ar y cyd i’r ddwy blaid.
translation.en: The commission’s interim and final reports will be presented jointly to both parties.

translation.cy: Ysgol Lywodraethu Genedlaethol – Ymchwilio i weld sut y gallai sefydlu Ysgol Lywodraethu Genedlaethol gyfrannu at wireddu’r egwyddor o Wasanaeth Cyhoeddus Cymru’n Un.
translation.en: National School of Government – Explore how setting up a National School for Government might contribute to the principle of a One Wales Public Service.

translation.cy: Dyddiadau tymhorau ysgol – Amcanu at ddiwygio dyddiadau tymhorau ysgol er mwyn iddynt gyd-fynd yn well â phatrymau bywyd teuluol a chyflogaeth.
translation.en: School term dates – Aim to reform school term dates to bring them more in line with patterns of family life and employment.

translation.cy: Byddwn yn ehangu’r amrediad o gymwysterau galwedigaethol a ddyfeisiwyd yng Nghymru yn sylweddol i gyd-fynd ag anghenion ein dysgwyr a’n heconomi.
translation.en: We will significantly expand the range of madein-Wales vocational qualifications to fit the needs of our learners and our economy.

translation.cy: Mae gan Gymru hanes hir a balch a diwylliant hynod, gyda’n hiaith, sy’n ffynnu heddiw, yn sylfaen i hyn oll.
translation.en: Wales has a long and proud history and distinctive culture, built around our language, which thrives today.

translation.cy: Cynllun Gweithredu Cydraddoldeb Hiliol – Mynd i’r afael â hiliaeth sefydliadol a systemig a chefnogi cyhoeddi’r Cynllun Gweithredu Cydraddoldeb Hiliol.
translation.en: Race Equality Action Plan – Tackle institutionalised and systemic racism and support the publication of the Race Equality Action Plan.

translation.cy: Mae gan Weinidogion Cymru rôl benodol o dan y Ddeddf gan fod eu dyletswydd i bennu amcanion llesiant yn cael ei sbarduno bob 5 mlynedd gan etholiad Senedd Cymru.
translation.en: Welsh Ministers have a distinctive role under the Act as their duty to set well-being objectives is triggered every 5 years by the Senedd Cymru election.

translation.cy: Byddant yn ein galluogi i wneud gwahaniaeth i bawb, ar bob cam o’u bywydau, ble bynnag maent yn byw, beth bynnag fo eu cefndir neu eu hamgylchiadau.
translation.en: They will enable us to make a difference for everyone, at every stage of their lives, irrespective of where they live, their background or circumstances.

translation.cy: Dyma’r deg amcan llesiant:
translation.en: The 10 well-being objectives are:

translation.cy: Darparu gofal iechyd effeithiol, cynaliadwy ac o ansawdd uchel.
translation.en: Provide effective, high quality and sustainable healthcare.

translation.cy: Mae’r amcanion llesiant wedi’u cynllunio i adlewyrchu ein blaenoriaethau ar gyfer diogelu a datblygu ein heconomi, ein cymdeithas, ein hamgylchedd a’n diwylliant.
translation.en: The well-being objectives have been designed to reflect our priorities for protecting and developing our economy, our society, our environment and our culture.

translation.cy: Maent hefyd wedi’u pennu yn unol ag adnodd Deall Dyfodol Cymru, ar sail ein dadansoddiad o’r ffactorau byd-eang a’r ystyriaethau lleol sy’n debygol o effeithio ar Gymru yn y tymor hwy.
translation.en: They are also set in line with the Understanding Wales’ Future resource, drawing on our analysis of the global factors and local considerations which are likely to impact on Wales in the longer term.

translation.cy: Mae’r amcanion llesiant yn ymwneud â’i gilydd ac yn ffurfio dull gweithredu integredig.
translation.en: The well-being objectives relate to each other and form an integrated approach.

translation.cy: Cynnwys
translation.en: Involvement

translation.cy: Mae ein hamcanion llesiant hefyd wedi’u seilio ar ein sgyrsiau parhaus â phobl Cymru, megis yr ymarfer ymgysylltu ‘Cymru Ein Dyfodol’ a gynhaliwyd y llynedd.
translation.en: Our well-being objectives also draw on our ongoing conversations with people in Wales, such as the ‘Our Future Wales’ engagement exercise undertaken last year.

translation.cy: Byddwn bob amser yn gwella ac yn ystyried sut rydym yn gweithredu’n unol â’r egwyddor datblygu cynaliadwy i gyflawni’r amcanion llesiant, gan fanteisio ar yr ymgysylltiad rheolaidd â’n partneriaid a’n rhanddeiliaid.
translation.en: We will continually improve and reflect on how we are acting in accordance with the sustainable development principle in delivering the well-being objectives, drawing on the regular engagement with our partners and stakeholders.

translation.cy: Diogelu, ailadeiladu a datblygu ein gwasanaethau ar gyfer pobl agored i niwed
translation.en: Protect, re-build and develop our services for vulnerable people

translation.cy: Dathlu amrywiaeth a gweithredu i ddileu anghydraddoldeb o bob math
translation.en: Celebrate diversity and move to eliminate inequality in all of its forms

translation.cy: Bwrw ymlaen tuag at filiwn o siaradwyr Cymraeg, a galluogi twristiaeth, chwaraeon a’r celfyddydau i ffynnu
translation.en: Push towards a million Welsh speakers, and enable our tourism, sports and arts industries to thrive

translation.cy: Arwain Cymru mewn sgwrs genedlaethol ar y cyd ynglŷn â’n dyfodol cyfansoddiadol, a rhoi’r presenoldeb cryfaf posibl i’n gwlad ar y llwyfan byd-eang
translation.en: Lead Wales in a national civic conversation about our constitutional future, and give our country the strongest possible presence on the world stage

translation.cy: Yn ogystal ag adrodd ar gynnydd tuag at ein hamcanion llesiant yn ein Hadroddiad Blynyddol, bydd Cyfrifon Blynyddol Llywodraeth Cymru yn parhau i fanylu ar sut y mae’r gwasanaeth sifil yn llywodraethu ei hun i gyflawni amcanion Gweinidogion Cymru – gan gynnwys sut rydym yn cyflawni ein dyletswyddau o dan y Ddeddf.
translation.en: As well as reporting progress towards our well-being objectives in our Annual Report, the Welsh Government Annual Accounts will continue to provide detail of how the civil service governs itself to deliver Welsh Ministers’ objectives – including how we are meeting our duties under the Act.

translation.cy: Byddwn yn defnyddio ein proses gyllidebol i sicrhau bod adnoddau’n cael eu dyrannu i gyflawni’r amcanion llesiant a’r camau cysylltiedig ym mhob blwyddyn o’r tymor hwn. Byddwn hefyd yn parhau i gyhoeddi Cynllun Gwella’r Gyllideb i ddangos sut rydym yn mireinio ac yn gwneud y gorau o’r broses hon.
translation.en: We will use our budget process to ensure that resources are allocated to deliver the well-being objectives and the corresponding steps in each year of this term, and we will continue to publish the Budget Improvement Plan to show how we are refining and optimising this process.

translation.cy: Mae ein hanes a’n diwylliant amrywiol yn denu llawer i Gymru ac rydym yn benderfynol o wneud popeth o fewn ein gallu i helpu’r diwydiant twristiaeth, chwaraeon a’r celfyddydau i adfer o’r pandemig.
translation.en: Our diverse history and culture draws many into Wales and we are determined to do all we can to help our tourism, sports and arts industries recover from the experience of the pandemic.

translation.cy: Mae’r Rhaglen Lywodraethu hon hefyd yn nodi ein hamcanion llesiant, sy’n dangos sut y byddwn yn gwneud y cyfraniad mwyaf posibl at y nodau llesiant yr ydym yn eu pennu ar gyfer cyfnod y 6ed Senedd, yn unol â Deddf Llesiant Cenedlaethau’r Dyfodol.
translation.en: This programme for government also sets out our well-being objectives, showing how we will maximise our contribution to the well-being goals that we are setting for the period of the 6th Senedd, as required by the Well-being of Future Generations Act.

translation.cy: Mae pandemig y coronafeirws wedi dangos ein Gwasanaeth Iechyd ar ei orau, ond mae hefyd wedi rhoi pwysau eithriadol ar staff a gwasanaethau.
translation.en: The coronavirus pandemic has shown our health service at its best, but it has also created extraordinary pressures on staff and services.

translation.cy: Darparu triniaethau a ohiriwyd yn sgil y pandemig.
translation.en: Provide treatments which have been delayed by the pandemic.

translation.cy: Darparu gwell mynediad at feddygon, nyrsys, deintyddion a gweithwyr iechyd proffesiynol eraill.
translation.en: Deliver better access to doctors, nurses, dentists and other health professionals.

translation.cy: Diwygio gofal sylfaenol, gan ddod â gwasanaethau meddygon teulu, fferylliaeth, therapi, tai, gofal cymdeithasol, iechyd meddwl, y gymuned a’r trydydd sector at ei gilydd.
translation.en: Reform primary care, bringing together GP services with pharmacy, therapy, housing, social care, mental health, community and third sector.

translation.cy: Bydd y system hon yn diwallu anghenion ein dinasyddion mwyaf agored i niwed, ac yn cefnogi’r plant, y bobl ifanc a’r teuluoedd hynny sy’n wynebu’r heriau mwyaf.
translation.en: This system will meet the needs of our most vulnerable citizens, and will support those children, young people and families who face the greatest challenges.

translation.cy: Hyrwyddo datrysiad cynaliadwy ar gyfer y DU gyfan fel y bydd gofal yn rhad ac am ddim i bawb pan fo arnynt ei angen a/neu ymgynghori ar ddatrysiad posibl i Gymru yn unig i ddiwallu ein hanghenion gofal hirdymor.
translation.en: Pursue a sustainable UK solution so that care is free for all at the point of need and/or consult on a potential Wales-only solution to meet our long-term care needs.

translation.cy: Creu 125,000 o brentisiaethau pob oed.
translation.en: Create 125,000 all-age apprenticeships.

translation.cy: Lansio Cynllun Buddsoddi 10 mlynedd newydd yn Seilwaith Cymru gyfer economi ddi-garbon.
translation.en: Launch a new 10-year Wales Infrastructure Investment Plan for a zero-carbon economy.

translation.cy: Byddwn yn sicrhau bod natur a’r hinsawdd ar agenda pob gwasanaeth cyhoeddus a busnes sector preifat, a byddwn yn integreiddio camau cadarnhaol dros natur mewn mwy o’n gweithgarwch economaidd.
translation.en: We will make sure that nature and the climate are on the agenda of every public service and private sector business, and we will integrate positive action for nature into more of our economic activity.

translation.cy: Manteisio ar botensial economaidd, diwylliannol a hamdden y Goedwig Genedlaethol gan adeiladu ar ein cynnydd tuag at greu diwydiant coed cynaliadwy.
translation.en: Harness the economic, cultural, and recreational potential of the National Forest as part of progress towards a sustainable timber industry.

translation.cy: Cyflwyno Deddf Aer Glân i Gymru, yn gyson â chanllawiau Sefydliad Iechyd y Byd ac yn yn ehangu’r ddarpariaeth o fonitro ansawdd aer.
translation.en: Introduce a Clean Air Act for Wales, consistent with World Health Organisation guidance and extend the provision of air quality monitoring.

translation.cy: Bwrw ymlaen tuag at filiwn o siaradwyr Cymraeg, a galluogi twristiaeth, chwaraeon a’r celfyddydau i ffynnu
translation.en: Push forward towards a million Welsh speakers, and enable our tourism, sports and arts industries to thrive

translation.cy: Mae’r celfyddydau, twristiaeth a chwaraeon yn hollbwysig i economi Cymru ac i’n bywyd cenedlaethol, ac mae’r iaith Gymraeg yn drysor cenedlaethol sy’n perthyn i bob unigolyn yng Nghymru.
translation.en: The arts, tourism and sport are of vital importance to both the Welsh economy and to our national life, and the Welsh language is a national treasure which belongs to every individual in Wales.

translation.cy: Byddwn yn:
translation.en: We will:

translation.cy: Creu Cynllun Tai mewn Cymunedau Cymraeg.
translation.en: Create a Welsh language Communities Housing Plan.

translation.cy: Byddwn yn gweithio dros Deyrnas Unedig newydd a llwyddiannus, gan bwyso ar Lywodraeth y DU am ddiwygio.
translation.en: We will work for a new and successful United Kingdom, pressing the UK government for reform.

translation.cy: Ceisio diwygio’r dreth gyngor i sicrhau system decach i bawb.
translation.en: Seek to reform council tax to ensure a fairer system for all.

translation.cy: Mae Cymru’n wynebu heriau sylweddol a chymhleth dros y pum mlynedd nesaf.
translation.en: Wales faces significant and complex challenges over the next 5 years.

translation.cy: cydbwyso anghenion pobl heddiw ag anghenion cenedlaethau’r dyfodol;
translation.en: balancing the needs of people today with the needs of future generations;

translation.cy: integreiddio ein dulliau o sicrhau’r ddarpariaeth fwyaf posibl a chynnwys pobl ym mhob agwedd ar ein gwaith drwy gydol tymor y Senedd hon.
translation.en: integrating our approaches to maximise delivery and involving people in all aspects of our work throughout this Senedd term.

translation.cy: Parhau â’n rhaglen hirdymor o ddiwygio addysg, a sicrhau bod anghydraddoldebau addysgol yn lleihau a bod safonau’n codi.
translation.en: Continue our long-term programme of education reform, and ensure educational inequalities narrow and standards rise.

translation.cy: Adeiladu economi gryfach a gwyrddach wrth inni ddatgarboneiddio cymaint â phosibl.
translation.en: Build a stronger, greener economy as we make maximum progress towards decarbonisation.

translation.cy: Ymgorffori ein hymateb i’r argyfwng hinsawdd a natur ym mhopeth a wnawn.
translation.en: Embed our response to the climate and nature emergency in everything we do.

translation.cy: Parhau i ariannu bwrsariaeth y GIG.
translation.en: Continue to fund the NHS bursary.

translation.cy: Capio costau gofal cymdeithasol dibreswyl ar yr uchafswm cyfredol o £100 yr wythnos.
translation.en: Cap the costs of non-residential social care at the current £100 maximum per week.

translation.cy: Darparu mwy o gymorth i bryniant gan weithwyr a cheisio dyblu nifer y busnesau sy’n eiddo i weithwyr.
translation.en: Provide greater support for worker buyouts and seek to double the number of employee-owned businesses.

translation.cy: Dadlau dros gysylltiadau economaidd ac ymchwil agosach â’r UE.
translation.en: Argue for closer economic and research ties with the EU.

translation.cy: Datblygu’r Ganolfan Ragoriaeth Rheilffordd Fydeang yn Nyffryn Dulais.
translation.en: Develop the Global Centre of Rail Excellence in the Dulais Valley.

translation.cy: Sefydlu bwrdd perfformiad trafnidiaeth newydd.
translation.en: Establish a new transport performance board.

translation.cy: Datblygu cynllun cenedlaethol sy’n cyfyngu rhent i lefelau lwfans tai lleol i deuluoedd a phobl ifanc sy’n ddigartref neu sydd mewn perygl o fod yn ddigartref.
translation.en: Develop a national scheme restricting rent to local housing allowance levels for families and young people who are homeless or who are at risk of homelessness.

translation.cy: Sicrhau bod landlordiaid Rhentu Doeth Cymru yn ymateb yn gyflym i gwynion am hiliaeth a throseddau casineb ac yn cynnig cymorth priodol.
translation.en: Ensure Rent Smart Wales landlords respond quickly to complaints of racism and hate crime and offer appropriate support.

translation.cy: Grymuso cymunedau i fod â mwy o ran mewn cynlluniau adfywio lleol.
translation.en: Empower communities to have a greater stake in local regeneration.

translation.cy: Buddsoddi yn y Grant Datblygu Disgyblion.
translation.en: Invest in the Pupil Development Grant.

translation.cy: Deddfu ar gyfer fframwaith newydd ar gyfer gwasanaethau ieuenctid yng Nghymru.
translation.en: Legislate for a new framework for youth services in Wales.

translation.cy: Archwilio sut i gryfhau cymunedau dysgu proffesiynol.
translation.en: Explore how to strengthen professional learning communities.

translation.cy: Ehangu’r Rhaglen Drochi i Ddisgyblion.
translation.en: Expand the Pupil Immersion Programme.

translation.cy: Newid y fframwaith perfformiad ar gyfer llywodraeth leol er mwyn galluogi gwell arloesi, tryloywder a pherchnogaeth leol.
translation.en: Change the performance framework for local government to better enable innovation, transparency, and local ownership.

translation.cy: Mynd i’r afael yn llawn ag argymhellion yr Archwiliad Henebion ac Enwau Strydoedd.
translation.en: Address fully the recommendations from the Monuments and Street Names Audit.

translation.cy: Strategaeth Amrywiaeth a Chynhwysiant ar gyfer Penodiadau Cyhoeddus yng Nghymru (2020-2023).
translation.en: Diversity and Inclusion Strategy for Public Appointments in Wales (2020 – 2023).

translation.cy: Cefnogi digwyddiadau Pride ledled Cymru drwy noddi Pride Cymru, sefydlu cronfa Pride a phenodi Cydlynydd Pride ar gyfer Cymru.
translation.en: Support Prides across Wales by sponsoring Pride Cymru, establishing a Wales-wide Pride Fund and appointing a Wales Pride Coordinator.

translation.cy: Herio Deddf Marchnad Fewnol y DU a’i hymosodiad ar ddatganoli a hyrwyddo hawliau’r Senedd i ddeddfu heb ymyrraeth mewn meysydd sydd wedi’u datganoli i Gymru.
translation.en: Challenge the UK Internal Market Act and its attack on devolution and champion the rights of the Senedd to legislate without interference in areas devolved to Wales.

translation.cy: Ymdrechu i atal Llywodraeth Geidwadol y DU rhag defnyddio’r Ddeddf Marchnad Fewnol i ariannu ymyriadau nad ydynt yn cael eu cefnogi gan bobl Cymru.
translation.en: Strive to prevent the UK Conservative government using the Internal Market Act to fund interventions not supported by the people of Wales.

translation.cy: Cydlywodraethu
translation.en: Shared Governance

translation.cy: Rhagair Prif Weinidog Cymru
translation.en: Foreword by the First Minister of Wales

translation.cy: Pennod 7:
translation.en: Chapter 7:

translation.cy: Mewn rhai ffyrdd pwysig mae’r Undeb wedi methu â chadw i fyny â’r ffaith bod deddfwrfeydd wedi cael eu creu yng Nghymru, yr Alban a Gogledd Iwerddon – a goblygiadau gwirioneddol a llawn hyn – yn rhannol oherwydd nad oes digon o sylw cyffredinol wedi’i roi i sut y dylai pob cenedl siarad a gweithredu gyda’i gilydd ar faterion sy’n effeithio ar bob rhan o’r DU.
translation.en: In some important ways the Union has failed to keep pace with the full and real implications of the creation of legislatures in Wales, Scotland and Northern Ireland, in part because insufficient overall attention has been given to how the nations should talk and act together on matters which affect all parts of the UK.

translation.cy: Nid ydym wedi gweld y berthynas adeiladol a chydweithredol sy’n gwbl hanfodol rhwng llywodraethau’r DU.
translation.en: We have not seen the constructive and collaborative relationship between the governments of the UK that is essential.

translation.cy: Os bydd yn sefyll yn ei hunfan, caiff y Deyrnas Unedig ei gadael ar ôl yn y pen draw wrth i deyrngarwch pobl gael ei rannu a’r ddadl o blaid ymwahanu eu denu.
translation.en: A United Kingdom which stands still will be overtaken by competing loyalties and the lure of separatism.

translation.cy: Nid oes gennym yr holl atebion o bell ffordd.
translation.en: We have by no means all the answers.

translation.cy: Pennod 1
translation.en: Chapter 1

translation.cy: Yn y ddogfen ‘Diwygio ein Hundeb’ wreiddiol, cyfeiriwyd at yr Adroddiad1 a gyhoeddwyd fis Gorffennaf 2018 gan Bwyllgor Gweinyddiaeth Gyhoeddus a Materion Cyfansoddiadol Tŷ’r Cyffredin, ‘Devolution and Exiting the EU: reconciling differences and building strong relationships’.
translation.en: In the original ‘Reforming our Union’ document, we cited the Report1 published in July 2018 by the House of Commons Public Administration and Constitutional Affairs Committee (PACAC) on ‘Devolution and Exiting the EU: reconciling differences and building strong relationships’.

translation.cy: Ers dechrau 2020, mae Llywodraeth y DU a’r Llywodraethau Datganoledig wedi bod yn canolbwyntio ar yr ymateb i bandemig COVID-19 – ac mae hynny’n gwbl briodol. Fodd bynnag, dwysáu’r angen am drafodaeth go iawn ynglŷn â dyfodol y DU a wnaed yn sgil y pandemig. Mae hyn yn bennaf am fod Covid wedi codi ymwybyddiaeth o ddatganoli ac o ehangder cyfrifoldebau’r llywodraethau a’r deddfwrfeydd datganoledig, a’r pwerau sydd ar gael iddynt.
translation.en: Since early 2020, the focus of the UK Government and the Devolved Governments has quite rightly been on the response to the COVID-19 pandemic, but the pandemic has only sharpened the need for a proper debate about the future of the UK, not least because Covid has served to raise awareness of devolution and of the extent of the responsibilities of – and the powers available to – the devolved governments and legislatures.

translation.cy: Ymddengys bod Llywodraeth y DU yn synhwyro bod tyndra rhwng y ddwy weledigaeth hon ar gyfer y DU, ac mae’n ceisio arddel y naill weledigaeth ar draul y llall.
translation.en: It seems that the UK Government perceives a tension between these two visions of the UK, and is seeking to assert one at the expense of the other;

translation.cy: Yn gynharach eleni, cyhoeddodd Llywodraeth y DU adolygiad yr Arglwydd Dunlop7 o allu Llywodraeth y DU i uno.
translation.en: And earlier this year, the UK Government published Lord Dunlop’s review7 of the UK Government’s union capability.

translation.cy: Mae ei adroddiad yn cynnwys argymhellion ar yr agenda cysylltiadau rhynglywodraethol a’r cyfansoddiad, sy’n gorgyffwrdd â’r gwaith sydd ar y gweill ar y Cydadolygiad o Gysylltiadau Rhynglywodraethol.
translation.en: His report includes recommendations on the constitutional and intergovernmental relations agenda, which overlaps with ongoing work on the joint Review of Intergovernmental Relations.

translation.cy: Ein man cychwyn wrth drafod y materion hyn o hyd yw’r ffaith ein bod yn cefnogi datganoli a’r DU hefyd. Rydym yn sefyll dros setliadau datganoli sydd wedi’u hymwreiddio mewn Teyrnas Unedig lwyddiannus.
translation.en: In discussing these matters, our starting point continues to be our support both of devolution and of the UK: we stand for entrenched devolution settlements within a successful United Kingdom.

translation.cy: Gan ddechrau gyda’r rhagdybiaeth o sybsidiaredd a sofraniaeth a rennir yn y DU, gallwn ganolbwyntio ar sut y gellir gwneud i’r Deyrnas Unedig weithio’n effeithiol, er mwyn uno’r gwahanol rannau yn eu hamcan cyffredin o lywodraethu’r DU.
translation.en: By starting from a presumption of subsidiarity and sovereignty shared within the UK, we can focus on how to make the Union work effectively, to join its constituent parts in a shared enterprise of governing the UK.

translation.cy: nid yw’n rhoi rhwydd hynt i Lywodraeth y DU ymestyn i mewn i faterion y mae’r Llywodraethau Datganoledig yn gyfrifol amdanynt, a’u dyblygu felly.
translation.en: it does not mean the UK Government reaching into and duplicating matters which are the responsibility of the Devolved Governments.

translation.cy: Rhennir y cynigion o dan y penawdau Egwyddorion Cyffredinol:
translation.en: The propositions are organised under the headings of General Principles;

translation.cy: Pwerau Gweithredol:
translation.en: Executive Powers:

translation.cy: Mae ein cynigion wedi’u cynllunio i gryfhau a gwella’r setliadau datganoli presennol, ac yn ein barn ni maent yn cynrychioli lleiafswm yr hyn y dylid ei roi yn ei le.
translation.en: Our proposals are designed to strengthen and improve the existing devolution settlements, and in our view they represent the minimum that should be put in place.

translation.cy: Dylai unrhyw gynigion i ddiddymu sefydliadau o’r fath fod yn amodol ar eu cydsyniad hwythau ac ar gydsyniad yr etholaeth berthnasol.
translation.en: any proposals for the abolition of such institutions should be subject to their consent and to the consent of the relevant electorate.

translation.cy: I’r un perwyl, dywedodd Mrs May, yn ei haraith ym mis Gorffennaf 2019, “For those of us who believe in the Union, devolution is the accepted and permanent constitutional expression of the unique multinational character of our Union”.
translation.en: In the same vein, Mrs May, in her speech in July 2019, observed that “For those of us who believe in the Union, devolution is the accepted and permanent constitutional expression of the unique multinational character of our Union”.

translation.cy: Ond dywedir yn y ddeddfwriaeth hefyd na ddylid diddymu’r gweinyddiaethau datganoledig oni wneir hynny ar sail penderfyniad pobl Cymru/yr Alban drwy bleidlais mewn refferendwm.
translation.en: However, the legislation further declares that the devolved institutions “are not to be abolished except on the basis of a decision of the people of Wales/Scotland voting in a referendum”.

translation.cy: Dylai cydymffurfio â’r ymrwymiad hwn ddiogelu Senedd Cymru (a’r deddfwrfeydd datganoledig eraill) rhag erydiad parhaus eu pwerau a’u cyfrifoldebau (er ein bod hefyd yn trafod o dan Gynnig 5 ddiystyriaeth gynyddol Llywodraeth y DU o ddarpariaethau Confensiwn Sewel).
translation.en: Compliance with this commitment should protect the Senedd (and the other devolved legislatures) from progressive erosion of their powers and responsibilities (although we also discuss under Proposition 5 the UK Government’s growing disregard for the provisions of the Sewel Convention).

translation.cy: Dylid seilio pwerau’r sefydliadau datganoledig ar gyfres gydlynus o gyfrifoldebau a neilltuir yn unol â’r egwyddor sybsidiaredd.
translation.en: The powers of the devolved institutions should be founded on a coherent set of responsibilities allocated in accordance with the subsidiarity principle.

translation.cy: Yn ein dogfen ‘Diwygio ein Hundeb’ wreiddiol, awgrymwyd bod y casgliad y dylid dod iddo, sef y dylai pob mater arall fod yn gyfrifoldeb neilltuedig y deddfwrfeydd datganoledig, neu ddod yn gyfrifoldeb neilltuedig iddynt, yn anghyson â’r athrawiaeth bresennol o sofraniaeth Senedd y DU.
translation.en: In the original ‘Reforming our Union’, we suggested that the apparent corollary, that all other matters should be or become the exclusive responsibility of the devolved legislatures, is in conflict with the current doctrine of parliamentary sovereignty.

translation.cy: Nid yw hwn yn ddull tryloyw, ac mae’n annemocrataidd, gan lyffetheirio pwerau Senedd Cymru, yn yr ystyr (a) ei fod yn golygu bod Llywodraeth y DU yn cadw rheolaeth dros faterion a gyflwynir fel arall fel rhai sydd wedi’u datganoli, a (b) nid yw Gweinidogion y DU yn atebol yn ddemocrataidd (yng Nghymru, o leiaf) am benderfyniadau ynghylch rhoi eu cydsyniad ai peidio.
translation.en: This is an opaque and undemocratic clog on the Senedd’s powers, in the sense that (a) it means that the UK Government retains control over matters which are otherwise presented as devolved, and (b) UK Ministers are not democratically accountable (at least, in Wales) for decisions as to whether or not they grant consent.

translation.cy: Y Deddfwrfeydd a
translation.en: Legislatures and

translation.cy: Dylai’r berthynas rhwng pedair deddfwrfa y Deyrnas Unedig barhau ar sail parch rhwng y naill a’r llall.
translation.en: The relations of the four legislatures of the United Kingdom should proceed on the basis of mutual respect.

translation.cy: Ar gychwyn ei Bwyllgor Cyfansoddiad, mae Tŷ’r Arglwyddi bellach wedi mabwysiadu gweithdrefn, pan fydd cydsyniad deddfwriaethol wedi’i wrthod, neu os nad yw wedi’i roi eto erbyn y trydydd darlleniad, y dylai Gweinidog ei dynnu i sylw’r Tŷ ar lafar cyn i’r trydydd darlleniad ddechrau.
translation.en: At the instigation of its Constitution Committee, the House of Lords has now adopted a procedure that when legislative consent has been refused, or not yet granted by the time of third reading, a Minister should orally draw it to the attention of the House before third reading commences.

translation.cy: Wrth inni gyhoeddi’r ddogfen hon, mae Pwyllgor Gweithdrefn Tŷ’r Cyffredin yn cynnal ymchwiliad17 i’r ffyrdd y mae arfer a gweithdrefn Tŷ’r Cyffredin yn ymgysylltu â chyfansoddiad tiriogaethol y Deyrnas Unedig, gan ystyried gwaith perthnasol a wnaed gan y Pwyllgor Gweinyddiaeth Gyhoeddus a Materion Cyfansoddiadol, gan Bwyllgor Cyswllt Tŷ’r Cyffredin, a chan y Fforwm Rhyngseneddol ar Brexit.
translation.en: As we publish this document, the House of Commons Procedure Committee is undertaking an inquiry17 into the ways in which the practice and procedure of the House of Commons engages with the United Kingdom’s territorial constitution, taking account of relevant work undertaken by PACAC, by the House of Commons Liaison Committee, and by the  Interparliamentary Forum on Brexit.

translation.cy: Cyfran o’r cronfeydd canolog a ddyrennir ar gyfer gwasanaethau cyhoeddus datganoledig yw’r arian hwn, ac nid ydyw ar gael i’w wario ar y gwasanaethau hynny felly.
translation.en: This money is  “top-sliced” from the allocation of central funds for devolved public services, and is therefore not available for expenditure on those services.

translation.cy: Byddai hyn yn rhoi sylfaen gadarnach i Senedd Cymru lunio trefniadau etholiadol newydd, pe bai’n dymuno gwneud hynny.
translation.en: This would provide the Senedd with a firmer foundation on which to construct new electoral arrangements, if it wanted to do so.

translation.cy: Mewn perthynas â Thŷ’r Arglwyddi, dylai unrhyw gynigion ar gyfer diwygio yn y dyfodol roi ystyriaeth lawn a phriodol i’r datblygiadau yng nghyfansoddiad tiriogaethol y DU sy’n destun y papur hwn.
translation.en: In relation to the House of Lords, any future proposals for reform should take full and proper account of the developments in the UK’s territorial constitution which is the subject of this paper.

translation.cy: Er hynny, yn y tair blynedd ers i’r Adolygiad gael ei gomisiynu, mae cysylltiadau rhynglywodraethol wedi dirywio.
translation.en: However, in the three years since the Review was commissioned, intergovernmental relations have deteriorated.

translation.cy: Materion y dylai Llywodraeth y DU arwain arnynt yn amlwg yw pennu mandad negodi y DU ac ymgymryd â’r negodiadau eu hunain, ond bydd y llywodraethau datganoledig yn dymuno cymryd rhan yn y penderfyniadau ar y ddau fater hyn gan mai hwy sy’n gyfrifol am weithredu’r rhwymedigaethau sy’n deillio o negodiadau, o leiaf yn y byd datganoledig.
translation.en: Settling the UK’s negotiating mandate and doing the negotiating is clearly a UK Government lead, but the devolved governments will wish to be involved in both of those matters because implementing the obligations, at least in the devolved sphere, resulting from negotiations is their responsibility.

translation.cy: Pryd bynnag y bydd trefniadau yn yr arfaeth ar gyfer creu corff neu asiantaeth gyhoeddus sydd â chyfrifoldebau gweithredol dros fwy nag un rhan o’r DU, neu pan addasir corff neu asiantaeth o’r fath at ddibenion eraill, rhaid i ddyluniad y sefydliad ystyried bob amser farn y llywodraethau datganoledig perthnasol, a hynny er mwyn i fuddiannau pob rhan o’r DU sydd o fewn cylch gwaith y corff neu asiantaeth gael eu hystyried yn briodol.
translation.en: Whenever creation, or repurposing, of a public body or agency with executive responsibilities for more than one part of the UK is in prospect, consideration must always be given in its institutional design to the views of the relevant devolved governments, to enable appropriate account to be taken of the interests of each of the parts of the UK within the agency’s remit.

translation.cy: Dylai hyn gynnwys trefniadau sy’n ymwneud â llywodraethiant y corff, a’i drefniadau cyllido, yn ogystal â’r modd y goruchwylir ei weithgareddau ac y creffir arnynt.
translation.en: This should include arrangements relating both to a body’s governance and funding, and to scrutiny and oversight of its activities.

translation.cy: O ddiddordeb arbennig y mae rôl y llywodraethau datganoledig o ran llywodraethu’r banc, y bwriedir iddo fod yn sefydliad y DU.
translation.en: Of particular interest is the role of the devolved governments in the governance of the bank, which is intended to be a UK institution.

translation.cy: Mae trefniadau o’r fath yn sicrhau bod safonau proffesiynol a chodau ymarfer cyffredin yn cael eu cynnal ar draws y tair llywodraeth, ac mae hyn yn hwyluso gweithio rhynglywodraethol o ddydd i ddydd.
translation.en: Such arrangements guarantee the maintenance of common professional standards and codes of conduct across the three governments, which facilitates intergovernmental working on a day-to-day basis.

translation.cy: O dan y system bresennol, yn gyffredinol, dyrennir cyllid i’r llywodraethau datganoledig drwy fformiwla Barnett, lle mae newidiadau mewn cyllid ar gyfer y llywodraethau datganoledig yn gyfran ar sail y boblogaeth o newidiadau mewn rhaglenni cymharol, gydag addasiadau ar gyfer refeniw o drethi datganoledig.
translation.en: In the current system funding is, in general, allocated to the devolved governments through the Barnett formula, where changes in funding for the devolved governments is a population share of changes in comparable programmes, with adjustments for revenues from devolved taxes.

translation.cy: Yn hytrach na chryfhau’r Undeb, ni fydd y dull hwn ond yn cynyddu rhaniadau ac anghydraddoldebau.
translation.en: Far from strengthening the Union this approach will only serve to increase divisions and inequalities.

translation.cy: Mae risg y bydd yn dyblygu ymdrechion, gan lesteirio  gwerth am arian ac atebolrwydd gan arwain at dirwedd gyflenwi anghydlynol ar gyfer rhaglenni a gwasanaethau.
translation.en: It risks duplicating efforts, impeding value for money and blurring accountability resulting in an incoherent delivery landscape for programmes and services.

translation.cy: Bydd cydbwysedd y cyllid ar gyfer pob gweinyddiaeth ddatganoledig, fel y cydbwysedd rhwng grant Llywodraeth y DU a’r refeniw a godir drwy drethi datganoledig a lleol, yn adlewyrchu eu hamgylchiadau penodol a’r tueddiadau gwleidyddol yn lleol.
translation.en: The balance of funding for each devolved administration as between UK Government grant and revenue raised through devolved and local taxation will reflect particular circumstances and local political preferences.

translation.cy: ni ddylai fod yn fater i Lywodraeth y DU na Senedd y DU asesu na dyfarnu ar rinweddau polisi datganoledig.
translation.en: it should not be a matter for the UK Government or the UK Parliament to assess or rule on the merits of devolved policy.

translation.cy: Mater i’r llywodraethau datganoledig yw pennu, yn unol â’r pwerau a’r adnoddau sydd ar gael iddynt, eu blaenoriaethau eu hunain ar gyfer trethiant a gwariant cyhoeddus sy’n gysylltiedig â’u cyfrifoldebau datganoledig, a rhoi eglurhad o’u penderfyniadau i’w deddfwrfeydd eu hunain.
translation.en: It is for the devolved governments to determine, within the powers and resources available to them, their own priorities for taxation and public expenditure relating to their devolved responsibilities, and to account for their decisions to their own legislatures.

translation.cy: Mae Llywodraeth Cymru yn credu bod angen mecanwaith clir, annibynnol y cytunwyd arno ar gyfer mynd i’r afael ag effeithiau ‘goferu’ ac y dylai dull eglur o ddatrys anghydfodau gael ei fynegi trwy’r ddogfen newydd ar gysylltiadau rhynglywodraethol.
translation.en: The Welsh Government believes a clear, agreed, independent mechanism for dealing with spillover effects and a clear approach to the resolution of disputes should be articulated through the new intergovernmental relations document.

translation.cy: Dylai’r sefydliadau datganoledig (a Llywodraeth a Senedd y DU mewn perthynas â Lloegr) fod yn gyfrifol am blismona a gweinyddu cyfiawnder yn eu tiriogaethau eu hunain.
translation.en: The devolved institutions (and the UK Government and Parliament in respect of England) should be responsible for policing and the administration of justice in their territories.

translation.cy: Ers i’r ddogfen hon gael ei chyhoeddi’n wreiddiol yn 2019, mae’r Comisiwn Annibynnol ar Gyfiawnder yng Nghymru (o dan gadeiryddiaeth yr Arglwydd Thomas o Gwmgïedd) hefyd wedi canfod nad yw buddiannau Cymru yn cael eu gwasanaethu gan y trefniadau presennol, ac yn dod i’r casgliad “... nad yw’r system bresennol yn diwallu anghenion pobl Cymru”.21 Dilynodd hyn yr ymchwiliad mwyaf erioed i weithrediad y system gyfiawnder yng Nghymru, gyda thros 200 o ymatebwyr.
translation.en: Since the original publication of this document in 2019, the independent Commission on Justice in Wales (chaired by Lord Thomas of Cwmgiedd) has also found that the interests of Wales are not served by the present arrangements, and that “the people of Wales are being let down by the system in its current state”.21 This followed the largest ever inquiry into the operation of the justice system in Wales, with over 200 respondents.

translation.cy: Cafodd unrhyw ddadl na allai’r system gyfiawnder weithredu’n effeithiol mewn amgylchedd lle’r oedd y gyfraith droseddol yn amrywio’n sylweddol rhwng Cymru a Lloegr ei thanseilio hefyd gan ein profiad o bandemig COVID-19.
translation.en: Any argument that the justice system could not operate effectively in an environment where the criminal law differed substantively between England and Wales was also undermined by the experience of the COVID-19 pandemic.

translation.cy: Pennod 7 Diwygio Cyfansoddiadol
translation.en: Chapter 7 Constitutional Reform

translation.cy: Dylid ystyried datblygiadau cyfansoddiadol yn y Deyrnas Unedig yn y dyfodol ar sail holistaidd ac ar sail egwyddor gyfansoddiadol, yn hytrach na thrwy ddiwygio setliadau cyfansoddiadol penodol mewn modd ad hoc.
translation.en: Future constitutional developments in the United Kingdom should be considered on a holistic basis and on the basis of constitutional principle, rather than by way of ad hoc reforms to particular constitutional settlements.

translation.cy: Rydym yn cyhoeddi’r ddogfen newydd hon yn awr oherwydd ein bod yn credu bod momentwm cynyddol ar gyfer y math o drafodaeth am ddyfodol yr Undeb yr ydym wedi bod yn ei argymell yn gyson.
translation.en: We publish this refreshed document now because we believe there is a growing momentum for the sort of discussion about the future of the Union we have been consistently advocating.

translation.cy: Ein barn ni o hyd yw bod angen ystyried diwygio cyfansoddiadol yn y dyfodol o safbwynt y DU gyfan, ond nid oes ymrwymiad eto gan Lywodraeth y DU ar gyfer y drafodaeth genedlaethol ledled y DU y mae’n amlwg bod ei hangen.
translation.en: It continues to be our view that future constitutional reform needs to be considered from a UK-wide perspective, but there is as yet no commitment from the UK Government for the national debate across the UK which is clearly needed.

translation.cy: Atodiad 1 Yr Ugain Cynnig
translation.en: Annex 1 The Twenty Propositions

translation.cy: Nid yw sofraniaeth Senedd y DU, yn ôl y ddealltwriaeth draddodiadol ohoni, yn cynnig sylfaen gadarn bellach ar gyfer y cyfansoddiad hwn sy’n esblygu.
translation.en: Parliamentary sovereignty as traditionally understood no longer provides a sound foundation for this evolving constitution.

translation.cy: Dylai Cymru, yr Alban a Gogledd Iwerddon oll barhau i gael eu cynrychioli yn Nhŷ’r Cyffredin.
translation.en: Each of Wales, Scotland and Northern Ireland should continue to be represented in the House of Commons.

translation.cy: Fodd bynnag, dylid seilio’r cytundebau sy’n sylfaen i’r berthynas gyllidol rhwng Llywodraeth y DU a’r llywodraethau datganoledig ar yr egwyddorion cyffredin o bartneriaeth, tryloywder, a chydnabyddiaeth o natur ryng-gysylltiedig y DU a thirwedd gyllidol y llywodraethau datganoledig.
translation.en: However, the agreements underpinning fiscal relationships between the UK Government and the devolved administrations should be based on common principles of partnership, transparency, and recognition of the interconnected nature of the UK and devolved administration fiscal landscape.

translation.cy: Amcanion llesiant
translation.en: Well-being objectives

translation.cy: Rydym yn disgrifio pob un ohonynt ac yn egluro sut rydym yn ei rhoi ar waith drwy'r cynigion a geir yn y Papur Gwyn hwn.
translation.en: We describe each one and explain how we are giving it effect through the proposals contained in this White Paper.

translation.cy: Rydym wedi ystyried Amcanion Llesiant Llywodraeth Cymru sydd i'w gweld yn Symud Cymru Ymlaen 2016-2021, ac rydym wedi nodi'r rhai sy'n berthnasol i'r Papur Gwyn.
translation.en: We have considered the Welsh Government’s Well-being Objectives set out in Taking Wales Forward 2016-2021, and have identified those relevant to the White Paper.

translation.cy: Rydym wedi dod i'r casgliad mai dull sy'n integreiddio'r ffactorau sy'n gyrru ffyniant ar gyfer amaethyddiaeth gyda chamau gweithredu i alluogi i'r amgylchedd gwledig gael ei wella yn yr hirdymor sy'n cynnig y ffordd orau ymlaen ar gyfer cymorth amaethyddol yn y dyfodol.
translation.en: We have concluded an approach integrating the drivers of prosperity for agriculture with actions to enable long-term improvement of the rural environment offers the best way forward for future agricultural support.

translation.cy: Yn ogystal â Deddf Llesiant Cenedlaethau'r Dyfodol (Cymru) 2015, mae Deddf yr Amgylchedd (Cymru) 2016 yn gosod dyletswyddau ar Weinidogion Cymru hefyd sydd wedi llywio ein gwaith pellach.
translation.en: In addition to the Well-being of Future Generations (Wales) Act 2015, the Environment (Wales) Act 2016 also places duties upon the Welsh Ministers which have informed our further work.

translation.cy: Mae egwyddor Rheoli Tir yn Gynaliadwy yn sail i'r holl gynigion yn y Papur Gwyn.
translation.en: The principle of Sustainable Land Management underpins all proposals in the White Paper.

translation.cy: Diffinnir hyn fel:
translation.en: This is defined as:

translation.cy: Gwella rheoleiddio a chymorth ar gyfer rheoli coetiroedd a choedwigaeth;
translation.en: Improve regulation and support for forestry and woodland management;

translation.cy: Trosglwyddo pwerau a gymerwyd i Weinidogion Cymru drwy Ddeddf Amaethyddiaeth y DU.
translation.en: Transfer powers taken for the Welsh Ministers through the UK Agriculture Act.

translation.cy: Wrth i ni ddatblygu ein syniadau ymhellach byddwn yn parhau i weithio gyda rhanddeiliaid a'r sector ehangach i lunio system sy'n gallu cynhyrchu bwyd cynaliadwy o ansawdd uchel sy'n diwallu anghenion defnyddwyr.
translation.en: As we develop our thinking further we will continue to work with stakeholders and the wider sector to design a system which can produce sustainable, high quality food that meets consumer needs.

translation.cy: Dull gweithredu
translation.en: Mechanism

translation.cy: Sut (naill ai'n gadarnhaol neu'n negyddol), ac i ba raddau (effaith sylweddol/cymedrol/bach), y bydd y cynnig yn effeithio ar bobl a chymunedau?
translation.en: How (either positively or negatively), and to what extent (significant/moderate/minimal impact), will the proposal affect people and communities?

translation.cy: Bydd cymorth yn galluogi ffermwyr i gael eu gwobrwyo am gynhyrchu bwyd yn gynaliadwy ac am eu cyfraniad at iechyd a llesiant ein cenedl.
translation.en: Support will enable farmers to be rewarded for the sustainable production of food and for their contribution to the health and wellbeing of our nation.

translation.cy: Rhagwelir y bydd cynigion y Papur Gwyn yn cael nifer o effeithiau ar iechyd y cyhoedd ac iechyd y gymuned ffermio.
translation.en: It is anticipated the White Paper proposals will have a number of health impacts on the general public and on the farming community.

translation.cy: Lleihau effeithiau negyddol y baich rheoleiddio a gweinyddol ar ffermwyr a rheolwyr tir drwy gasglu a rhannu data'n fwy effeithlon a thrwy ddarparu safonau clir y dylai pob ffermwr gydymffurfio â nhw ynghyd â chyngor a chanllawiau amrywiol i gynorthwyo dealltwriaeth;
translation.en: Reducing the negative impacts of regulatory and administrative burden on farmers and land managers through more efficient data collection and sharing and through providing clear standards to which all farmers should comply together with a range of advice and guidance to aid understanding;

translation.cy: Deiet ac Iechyd y Cyhoedd
translation.en: Diet and Public Health

translation.cy: Ar gyfer anifeiliaid sy'n cael eu ffermio, mae hyn yn golygu eu cadw mor iach â phosibl mewn systemau cynhyrchu iechyd uchel.
translation.en: For farmed animals, this means keeping them as healthy as possible in high health production systems.

translation.en: Peacock, J.,

translation.cy: Wrth i'n cynigion ddatblygu, byddwn yn ystyried sut y gallai Datblygiad Proffesiynol Parhaus ymgorffori diogelwch ar ffermydd.
translation.en: As our proposals develop, we will consider how Continued Professional Development could incorporate farm safety.

translation.cy: Sut olwg sydd ar fferm dda.
translation.en: What a good farm looks like.

translation.cy: Cefnogi cymunedau ffermio yn  ystod cyfnodau o ansicrwydd.
translation.en: Supporting farming communities at times of uncertainty.

translation.en: Pretty, J.,
