translation.cy: Dylai hyn helpu i gefnogi ffermydd i wneud gwaith cynllunio hirdymor ar gyfer eu busnesau.
translation.en: This should help support farms to undertake long-term planning for their businesses.

translation.cy: Rheoleiddio, gwaith gweinyddol a digideiddio
translation.en: Regulation, administration and digitalisation

translation.cy: Mae Adroddiad Hwyluso'r Drefn yn nodi baich gweinyddol fel achos straen i berchnogion/rheolwyr tir.
translation.en: The Working Smarter Report identifies administrative burden as a cause of stress for land owners/managers.

translation.cy: Mae ein cynigion ar gyfer gorfodi yn ceisio osgoi camau troseddol lle bo modd, ond gan gadw’r opsiwn hwn pan fetho popeth arall ar gyfer y troseddau mwyaf difrifol.
translation.en: Our proposals for enforcement seek to avoid criminalisation where possible, but retaining this as a last resort for the most serious offences.

translation.cy: Sefydliad Iechyd Gwledig a Phrifysgol Morgannwg (2003).

translation.cy: Bydd y sancsiynau newydd hyn yn canolbwyntio ar y canlyniad gan roi mwy o opsiynau ar gyfer ymateb yn gymesur i dramgwydd tra bod hefyd yn fwy effeithiol i’w gweinyddu.
translation.en: These new sanctions are intended to be more outcome-focussed, providing more options for a proportionate response to an offence whilst also being more efficient to administer.

translation.cy: O ganlyniad, mae’r sector amaethyddol ar reng flaen yr argyfwng hinsoddol ac ecolegol.
translation.en: 2.45 Consequently, the agriculture sector is on the front line of the climate and ecological emergency.

translation.cy: Rydym yn cynnig y dylai’r Bil gynnwys darpariaethau fydd yn sefydlu SLM fel prif egwyddor ein polisi amaeth, gan gynnwys cymorth yn y dyfodol.
translation.en: 2.48 We propose the Bill should contain provisions establishing SLM as the overarching principle for future agricultural policy, including future support.

translation.cy: Bydd y polisi hwn yn sicrhau bod canlyniadau economaidd, amgylcheddol a chymdeithasol arferion rheoli tir yn cael eu cynnal er lles tymor hir pobl Cymru.
translation.en: 2.53 This policy approach will ensure the economic, environmental and social outcomes from land management practice can be delivered for the long-term benefit of the people of Wales.

translation.cy: Rydym wedi dod i’r casgliad y byddwn gyda’n gilydd, trwy fabwysiadu a chynnal SLM fel nod ein polisi a’n cymorth amaethyddol yn y dyfodol, yn gallu ymateb i’r heriau hyn.
translation.en: 2.56 We have concluded that our adoption of SLM and its delivery as the goal of future agricultural policy and support will enable us collectively to respond to these challenges.

translation.cy: Ni fydd y ffrwd incwm newydd hwn yn dibynnu ar y farchnad a dylai wneud y fferm yn fwy abl i ddygymod â marchnadoedd a fydd yn y dyfodol o bosibl yn fwy anwadal.
translation.en: This new income stream will not be market dependent and should increase the farm’s ability to manage in a future, potentially more volatile, market environment.

translation.cy: Dylai’r CFfC wobrwyo ffermwyr yn briodol am gynhyrchu canlyniadau (pridd iachach, aer glân, dŵr glân, bioamrywiaeth gyfoethocach, camau i leihau twymo’r ddaear) ar lefel uwch na’r hyn y gofynnir amdani gan y rheoliadau, trwy ac yn sgil cynhyrchu bwyd mewn ffordd gynaliadwy.
translation.en: The SFS should reward farmers appropriately for the production of outcomes (healthier soils, clean air, clean water, improved biodiversity, actions to reduce global warming) at levels above those set by regulation, through and alongside the production of food in a sustainable way.

translation.cy: Yn ein barn, er budd pawb, dylai Llywodraeth Cymru roi cymhellion i ffermwyr gynhyrchu’r nwyddau hyn ar ran cymdeithas.
translation.en: 2.62 We believe it is in everyone’s interest for the Welsh Government to incentivise farmers to produce these goods on behalf of society.

translation.cy: Rydym yn cydnabod y bydd y blynyddoedd nesaf yn rhai anodd i ffermwyr.
translation.en: 2.65 We recognise the coming years will be challenging for farmers.

translation.cy: Rydym yn cynnig pennu targedau tymor hir ar gyfer pob canlyniad a datblygu dull monitro a gwerthuso fydd yn dangos faint y bydd pob canlyniad wedi’i gynhyrchu bob blwyddyn, gan ddatblygu mesurau procsi credadwy lle bo’u hangen.
translation.en: We propose establishing long term targets for each outcome and developing a monitoring and evaluation approach that will establish the amount of each outcome delivered each year, where necessary developing credible proxy measures in order to do so.

translation.cy: Byddem yn disgwyl i bob ffermwr sy’n gwneud cais i ymuno â’r cynllun gydymffurfio â’r gyfraith a bydd parhau i gydymffurfio’n hanfodol er mwyn medru cyfiawnhau ei dalu am y canlyniadau amgylcheddol.
translation.en: We would expect all farmers who apply for the scheme to comply with the law and continued compliance would be essential in order to justify continued payments for environmental outcomes.

translation.cy: Rhoi dyletswydd ar Weinidogion Cymru i wneud datganiad blynyddol i’r Senedd ar y gyllideb cymorth uniongyrchol i ffermwyr.
translation.en: 2.72 To place a duty on the Welsh Ministers to make an annual statement to the Senedd on the budget for direct agricultural support.

translation.cy: Rhoi dyletswydd ar Weinidogion Cymru i gyflwyno adroddiad bob blwyddyn i’r Senedd ar effaith yr hyn a wariwyd ar gymorth uniongyrchol i ffermwyr.
translation.en: 2.73 To place a duty on the Welsh Ministers to report annually to the Senedd on the impact of the total expenditure incurred in terms of direct farming support.

translation.cy: Byddwn yn integreiddio hyn yn ein cefnogaeth a’n polisïau yn y dyfodol.
translation.en: We will integrate this approach into any future support and policies.

translation.cy: Lle bo angen, darperir manylion pellach mewn is-ddeddfwriaeth a/neu ganllawiau a fydd gan fwyaf yn destun ymgynghori priodol.
translation.en: Where needed, further details on the proposed support will generally be provided in subordinate legislation and/or guidance which would be the subject of appropriate consultation.

translation.cy: Credwn y dylai cyngor gael ei weld fel buddsoddiad yng ngallu ffermwyr yn hytrach na chost i’r cynllun a byddwn yn parhau i ddatblygu a chydweithio â rhanddeiliaid ar ein cynigion ar gyfer y dyfodol.
translation.en: We believe advice should be seen as an investment in the capacity of farmers rather than a cost to the scheme and we will continue to develop and engage with stakeholders on our proposals for the future.

translation.cy: Yn Ffermio Cynaliadwy a’n Tir, gwnaethom nodi’n cynigion ar gyfer helpu’r diwydiant a’r gadwyn gyflenwi ehangach.
translation.en: 2.80 In Sustainable Farming and Our Land we set out our proposals to provide support to the wider industry and supply chain.

translation.cy: Sicrhau bod economïau a chymunedau gwledig tiriogaethau gwahanol yn cael eu datblygu’n gytbwys, gan gynnwys creu a chynnal swyddi.
translation.en: Achieving a balanced territorial development of rural economies and communities, including the creation and maintenance of employment.

translation.cy: O dan amodau’r Cytundeb Ymadael, cyfraith yr UE sy’n parhau i reoli’r rhaglenni tan y daw’r rhaglen neu’r ymrwymiad i ben.
translation.en: Under the terms of the Withdrawal Agreement, EU Law continues to govern those programmes until the programmes close or commitments end.

translation.cy: Yr Awdurdod Rheoli fydd yn rheoli hyn gan gydweithio’n glos â Taliadau Gwledig Cymru.
translation.en: Governance is provided through the Managing Authority, working closely with

translation.en: Encouraging greater market alignment by supporting farmers in understanding and producing what consumers and the supply chain want to buy;

translation.cy: Mae’r rhan fwyaf o’r gwaith monitro ac archwilio o dydd i dydd yn canolbwyntio ar ffermydd sy’n rhan o gynlluniau o gronfa PAC yr UE.
translation.en: 2.100 The majority of routine monitoring and inspection is largely focused on farms who are part of EU CAP funded schemes.

translation.cy: Mae’n bwysig bod gan rheoleiddwyr fynediad at amrywiaeth o ddata er mwyn gallu monitro cydymffurfiaeth yn effeithiol.
translation.en: 2.101 Access to a range of data is important to help regulators to monitor compliance effectively.

translation.cy: Rydym yn cynnig y dylai gwybodaeth gael ei chasglu’n ganolog a’i rhannu rhwng rheoleiddwyr, gan leihau nifer y dogfennau y bydd gofyn i ffermwyr eu llenwi.
translation.en: It would also enable regulators to more effectively refer non-compliance to the relevant body to take enforcement action. We propose information should be centrally collected and shared between regulators, therefore reducing the number of documents farmers need to complete.

translation.cy: Gellid cael y pŵer i wneud hyn o Ddeddf yr Economi Ddigidol 2017.
translation.en: The power to do this could be taken from the Digital Economy Act 2017.

translation.cy: Er enghraifft, pe bai rheoleiddwyr yn cael gwybod bod ffermwr o bosibl wedi tramgwyddo, gellid defnyddio’r delweddau dyddiol i weld a oes tramgwydd ac a oes angen ymweld â’r fferm.
translation.en: For example, if a regulator received a referral regarding potential non-compliance, daily imagery could be used to help establish whether non-compliance has occurred and whether an on farm visit is required.

translation.cy: Rhaid cydbwyso hynny â’r angen i fonitro lefelau cydymffurfio mewn sampl cymesur o ffermydd yng Nghymru.
translation.en: This would be balanced against the need to monitor compliance across a proportionate sample of farms in Wales.

translation.en: 2.134 We intend the proposed Sustainable Farming Scheme to provide payments to farmers who choose to deliver positive benefits from planting and managing woodland on their farms.

translation.en: They are also reviewed more regularly, giving tenants the opportunity to renegotiate their terms of contract if they feel it necessary e.g. to enable diversifications or to enter financial assistance schemes.

translation.en: 2.153 Common land in Wales amounts to some 175,000 hectares or 8.5% of the agricultural land area and has an important role in supporting agricultural production in Wales.

translation.en: 2.160 The effective management of common land will be further enhanced by expanding the functions and powers of Commons Councils to manage the common and improve their ability to contribute to the social, economic and environmental objectives of the sustainable land management policy framework.

translation.en: We would need a system of civil sanctions for non-compliance with current animal disease control and animal welfare cross-compliance standards (and whatever may replace them in the future), and other on-farm disease control measures to apply to all livestock keepers (as defined in the Bill), irrespective of whether they receive payments under the proposed Sustainable Farming Scheme.

translation.en: This will form part of our overall civil sanctions proposal described earlier.

translation.en: The Act provides the Welsh Ministers with powers to enable the continued operation of existing farming support beyond 2020 and to ensure the effective operation of the agricultural sector and agriculture markets in the UK following our departure from the EU.

translation.en: Removed those provisions which would have allowed for transition to new systems of agriculture support and made it clear that these would be brought forward through the Agriculture (Wales) Bill;

translation.en: The power to undertake such modification is what is proposed here.

translation.en: This also enables provision in respect of carcass classification by slaughterhouses in Wales.

translation.en: Through this provision, Welsh Ministers would have the power to set standards across a range of products. This would allow Welsh Ministers to maintain the high standards which Wales is recognised for.

translation.en: 4.2 	Our regulatory reform proposals are meant to provide increased clarity for all farmers and other stakeholders, as well as introducing a more proportionate approach to enforcement when compliance failures occur.

translation.cy: Bydd ein cynigion ar gyfer cynllun newydd i gymryd lle’r cynllun cymorth uniongyrchol presennol i ffermwyr yn cyflawni egwyddorion Rheoli Tir yn Gynaliadwy, er mwyn i genhedlaeth heddiw ac yfory o ffermwyr allu parhau i gynhyrchu bwyd a sicrhau’r canlyniadau amgylcheddol ehangach a chael eu gwobrwyo am wneud hynny.
translation.en: 4.3 	Our proposals for a new scheme to replace all current direct agricultural support would deliver SLM, enabling current and future generations of farmers to continue to produce food and wider environmental outcomes and be rewarded for doing so.

translation.cy: Rydym am annog arloesedd mewn ffermio a byddwn yn cydweithio ag ymarferwyr, academia a rhanddeiliaid i fynd â hyn yn ei flaen.
translation.en: We want to encourage innovation in agricultural practice and will work in partnership with practitioners, academia and other stakeholders to drive this forward.

translation.en: The Government of Wales Act 2006 (GoWA 2006) provides for the Assembly to make laws, known as ‘Acts of the Assembly’.

translation.cy: Gall y Ddeddf (neu ddarpariaethau ohoni) ddod i effaith (neu i rym) ar unwaith wrth gael Cydsyniad Brenhinol, neu gellid gadael i Weinidogion Cymru benderfynu drwy orchymyn pryd y dylai ddod i effaith.
translation.en: It (or provisions of it) may come into effect (or force) immediately on Royal Assent, or the time when it is to come into effect may be left to the Welsh Ministers to decide by order.

translation.cy: Gellir gweld y profion ar gyfer cymhwysedd deddfwriaethol y Cynulliad yn adran 108A o Ddeddf Llywodraeth Cymru 2006.

translation.en: This aim should be a feature of the thinking at each phase of the Bill’s development.

translation.cy: Mae’r rhaglen ddeddfwriaethol yn cynnwys cynigion deddfwriaethol a wneir gan Weinidogion a’r Cwnsler Cyffredinol.
translation.en: The legislative programme comprises of legislative proposals put forward by Ministers and the Counsel General.

translation.cy: Yn ogystal â’r gwaith a gynlluniwyd, mae’r rhaglen ddeddfwriaethol hefyd yn cynnwys trefniadau wrth gefn i roi amser i’r Llywodraeth ystyried Biliau Aelodau a deddfwriaeth Anllywodraethol arall.
translation.en: In addition to the planned work, the legislative programme also includes contingency to allow time for the Government consideration of Member Bills and other non-Government legislation.

translation.cy: Pan fo pwerau yn y Bil i wneud is-ddeddfwriaeth, bydd angen fel arfer i dîm y Bil baratoi dogfen yn Gymraeg ac yn Saesneg i esbonio i’r Cynulliad sut y disgwylir i’r pwerau gael eu defnyddio – datganiad o fwriad y polisi.
translation.en: Where there are powers in the Bill to make subordinate legislation, the Bill team will usually need to prepare a document in Welsh and English to explain to the Assembly how the powers are expected to be used – a statement of policy intent (SoPI).

translation.cy: Efallai y bydd angen blwyddyn neu ddwy ar gyfer rhai Biliau, ac efallai y bydd wyth i ddeuddeng mis yn fwy priodol i eraill.
translation.en: For some Bills a couple of years may be required, for others eight to twelve months may be more appropriate.

translation.cy: Ar gyfer Biliau’r Llywodraeth, y Gweinidog â chyfrifoldeb portffolio am bolisi’r Bil yw’r Gweinidog Arweiniol ar gyfer y Bil fel arfer, y cyfeirir ato weithiau hefyd fel y Gweinidog sy’n gyfrifol am y Bil.
translation.en: For Government Bills the Lead Minister for the Bill, sometimes also referred to as the Minister in charge of the Bill, is usually the Minister with portfolio responsibility for the policy of the Bill.

translation.cy: Cyngor cyfreithiol y Cwnsler Cyffredinol yw’r cyngor cyfreithiol terfynol ac awdurdodol yn y Llywodraeth.
translation.en: The Counsel General’s legal advice is the final and authoritative legal advice within the Government.

translation.cy: Mae Aelod Cyfrifol ar gyfer pob Bil a gyflwynir i’r Cynulliad (yn unol â Rheol Sefydlog 24).
translation.en: Any Bill introduced to the Assembly has a Member in charge of it (in accordance with Standing Order 24).

translation.cy: Gall maint a chyfansoddiad y tîm hwn newid ar gyfer gwahanol Filiau a hyd yn oed ar wahanol adegau wrth ddatblygu Bil.
translation.en: This team can change in size and make-up for different Bills and even at different points in the development of a Bill.

translation.en: The role can vary according to the Group’s requirements and the nature of the Bill, but is essentially one of project management.

translation.en: The Chief Economist’s team in Welsh Treasury provide specialist advice and guidance on the development of the Regulatory Impact Assessment (RIA) needed for each Bill.

translation.cy: Pan fo’n bosibl, dylai hyn fod cyn i’r Bil gael ei gynnwys yn y rhaglen ddeddfwriaethol.
translation.en: Where possible, this should be prior to inclusion of the Bill within the legislative programme.

translation.cy: Gwasanaethau Llyfrgell – mae’r Llyfrgell yn cynnig adnoddau defnyddiol i gefnogi datblygiad polisi, yn ogystal ag amrywiaeth o wasanaethau a allai fod o fudd i waith Bil.
translation.en: Library Services – The Library offers useful resources to support policy development, as well as a range of services which may benefit Bill work.

translation.cy: Mae’n canolbwyntio ar wella’r defnydd o dystiolaeth a dadansoddi i gefnogi’r broses o wneud penderfyniadau strategol.
translation.en: Its focus is on improving the use of evidence and analysis to support strategic decision making.

translation.cy: Mae hyn yn golygu bod angen i dimau Biliau gysylltu â’r Is-adran Cyllidebu Strategol i drafod goblygiadau ariannol Bil ar ddechrau’r broses, i sicrhau y gellir bodloni uchelgeisiau’r polisi yn unol â’r dyraniad o adnoddau.
translation.en: This means that Bill teams need to engage with Strategic Budgeting about the financial implications of a Bill early in the process, to ensure the policy ambitions can be delivered within the allocation of resources.

translation.cy: Yn y lle cyntaf, bydd Rheolwr y Bil yn dymuno ymgysylltu â Phennaeth Cyfathrebu a Marchnata’r Grŵp polisi, a all gynnig cyngor, cyfarwyddyd a chefnogaeth o ran sut i gyfathrebu ynglŷn â’r Bil.
translation.en: In the first instance the Bill Manager will wish to engage with the Head of Communications and Marketing for the policy Group, who can provide advice, guidance and support on the communications approach for the Bill.

translation.cy: Tîm y Bil sy’n gyfrifol am ddarparu Bil unigol a bydd y Bil hwn yn rhan o’r rhaglen ddeddfwriaethol ehangach ar gyfer y Llywodraeth.
translation.en: The Bill team are responsible for the delivery of an individual Bill; this Bill will form part of the wider legislative programme for the Government.

translation.cy: Mae rhan o’r tîm yn cefnogi gwaith Bwrdd y Rhaglen Ddeddfwriaethol a’i weithgorau trwy ddarparu cymorth ysgrifenyddiaeth, a thrwy fwrw ymlaen ag amrywiaeth o gamau gwella.
translation.en: Part of the team supports the work of the Legislative Programme Board and its associated working groups by providing secretariat support, and by taking forward a range of improvement actions.

translation.cy: Mae Materion Cyfansoddiadol a Chysylltiadau Rhynglywodraethol yn cynnwys dau dîm â pherthnasedd penodol i’r rheini sy’n gweithio ar ddeddfwriaeth:
translation.en: Constitutional Affairs and Inter-Government Relations (CAIGR) includes two teams of particular relevance to those working on legislation:

translation.cy: Mae’r Tîm Polisi Cyfiawnder ar gael i gynghori timau Biliau, o gam cynnar yn y broses o ddatblygu’r polisi neu’r ddeddfwriaeth, ar ystyriaethau mewn perthynas â chyfiawnder yn eu cynigion ac ymdrin ag effeithiau posibl cynigion ar y system gyfiawnder.
translation.en: The Justice Policy Team is available to advise Bill teams, from an early stage in the policy or legislation development process, on justice considerations in their proposals and handling the potential impacts of proposals on the justice system.

translation.cy: Er enghraifft, nid oes angen cael adnodd Swyddfa’r Cwnsleriaid Deddfwriaethol penodol ar gyfer Bil ar adeg dechrau datblygu’r polisi.
translation.en: For example, it is not necessary to have dedicated OLC resource for a Bill at the point of initial policy development.

translation.cy: Pennod 4 – Rheoli a llywodraethu Bil
translation.en: Chapter 4 – Bill management and governance

translation.cy: Rhoddir canllawiau ar wahân mewn Penodau diweddarach ar baratoi Bil, a mynd ag ef drwy’r Cynulliad.
translation.en: Separate guidance is given in later Chapters on preparing a Bill, and taking it through the Assembly.

translation.cy: Er mwyn ymgymryd â’r broses brofi hon yn effeithiol, bydd rhaid ymgysylltu ag arbenigwyr ar ddechrau’r broses – ym meysydd polisi, cyfraith a drafftio deddfwriaethol;
translation.en: The effective implementation of this testing process will involve early engagement with specialists – in the fields of policy, law, and legislative drafting.

translation.cy: Mewn amgylchiadau o’r fath, bydd swyddogion yn ceisio sicrhau bod Gweinidogion yn cael gwybod am oblygiadau’r penderfyniadau hyn.
translation.en: In these circumstances officials will seek to ensure Ministers are advised about the implications of these decisions.

translation.cy: Egwyddorion arweiniol ar gyfer cydweithio ar ddeddfwriaeth y llywodraeth
translation.en: Guiding principles for collaborative working on government legislation

translation.cy: I wneud hynny mae’n ofynnol cael:
translation.en: This requires:

translation.cy: Cydbwysedd rhwng cyfathrebu’n amserol ac yn drylwyr;
translation.en: Striking a balance between timely and in-depth communication;

translation.cy: Datrys anghydfodau – mae hyn yn galw am barodrwydd i fod yn bragmataidd, yn feddwl agored ac i fyfyrio ar sylwadau cydweithwyr.
translation.en: Resolving disputes – this requires a willingness to be pragmatic, open-minded and to reflect on the comments of colleagues.

translation.cy: Bydd yr holl swyddogion yn cefnogi diwylliant o ddysgu.
translation.en: All officials will work to support a learning culture.

translation.cy: Mae’n rhaid i dîm y Bil a’r bwrdd prosiect roi sylw i’r posibilrwydd y gallai materion trawsbynciol godi o’r broses o ddatblygu’r Bil.
translation.en: Attention must be given by the Bill team and the project board to the potential for cross-cutting matters arising from the Bill development process.

translation.cy: cofnod o wersi a ddysgwyd.
translation.en: a record of lessons learned.

translation.cy: Fel gydag unrhyw gynllun neu strategaeth, mae’n bwysig ei bod yn cael ei chadw’n gyfredol, ac yn gywir a’i bod yn cael ei dilyn.
translation.en: As with any plan or strategy, it is important that it is kept up to date, accurate and followed.

translation.cy: dyddiadau allweddol a gweithgarwch cyfathrebu a gynigir ar sail y rheini;
translation.en: key dates and communication activity proposed around those;

translation.cy: Dylid cynnal asesiad effaith wrth ddatblygu polisi.
translation.en: Impact assessment should be undertaken when developing policy.

translation.cy: Rhyddhau’r canfyddiadau
translation.en: Making the findings available

translation.cy: Diben Asesiadau Effaith Rheoleiddiol yw darparu’r amcangyfrifon gorau i Weinidogion Cymru, y Swyddog Cyfrifyddu a Chynulliad Cenedlaethol Cymru o effaith debygol Bil Cynulliad.
translation.en: The purpose of the Regulatory Impact Assessment (RIA) is to provide the Welsh Ministers, the Accounting Officer and the National Assembly for Wales with the best estimates of the likely impact of an Assembly Bill.

translation.cy: Mae’r Bennod hon yn cynnig canllawiau ar sut i baratoi’r Asesiad Effaith Rheoleiddiol, ac mae cyngor ar gael hefyd gan economegwyr Llywodraeth Cymru.
translation.en: This Chapter provides guidance on how to prepare the RIA, and advice is also available from Welsh Government economists.

translation.cy: “[Rhaid i'r Memorandwm Esboniadol]:
translation.en: “… [the Explanatory Memorandum] must:

translation.cy: Hyd yn oed mewn achosion lle nad oes newid net cyffredinol ond mae rhyw fath o ailddosbarthu (fel mewn achosion lle ceir cyfnewid neu ‘drosglwyddo’ o gostau a manteision), dylid asesu’r effeithiau trwy Asesiad Effaith Rheoleiddiol.
translation.en: Even in cases where there is no overall net change but some kind of redistribution (such as in cases where there is an exchange or 'transfer' of costs and benefits) the effects should be assessed through an RIA.

translation.cy: Bydd lefel y manylion sydd ei hangen ar opsiynau eraill yn dibynnu ar ba un a yw’r Asesiad Effaith Rheoleiddiol yn cael ei baratoi ar gyfer ymgynghori ar Fil neu ei gyflwyno (gweler Rheol Sefydlog 26.6(iii) a pharagraffau 6.19 – 6.27).
translation.en: The level of detail required on alternative options will depend upon whether the RIA is being prepared for consultation or the introduction of a Bill (see Standing Order 26.6(iii) and paragraphs 6.19 – 6.27).

translation.cy: Pennod 10 – Adolygiad ar ôl gweithredu:
translation.en: Chapter 10 – Post implementation review:

translation.cy: Yr Asesiad Effaith Rheoleiddiol fydd Rhan 2 y Memorandwm Esboniadol a gyhoeddir ar wefan y Cynulliad pan gaiff y Bil ei gyflwyno.
translation.en: The RIA will form Part 2 of the Explanatory Memorandum which is published on the Assembly website when the Bill is introduced.

translation.cy: Gall asesiadau effaith polisi (a drafodir ym Mhennod 5) wneud cyfraniad defnyddiol at nodi costau a manteision mewn Asesiad Effaith Rheoleiddiol, yn enwedig lle na ellir pennu gwerth ariannol i’r rhain.
translation.en: Policy impact assessments (covered in Chapter 5) can make a useful contribution to identifying costs and benefits within RIAs, particularly where these cannot be monetised.

translation.cy: Fel y nodir uchod, o hyn ymlaen bydd yr arfarniad o opsiynau eraill yn cael ei gyflwyno mewn Asesiad Effaith Rheoleiddiol ar y cam Ymgynghori/Bil Drafft.
translation.en: As set out above, the approach going forward will be for the appraisal of alternative options to be presented in a Consultation/Draft Bill stage RIA.

translation.cy: Roedd hyn yn cael ei alw yn opsiwn 'gwneud dim' yn y gorffennol.
translation.en: This was previously termed a ‘do nothing’ option.

translation.cy: Y Cyfnodau Cyflwyno a Diwygio
translation.en: Introduction and Amendment stages

translation.cy: esboniad pam y dewiswyd yr opsiwn a ffefrir;
translation.en: an explanation for the selection of the preferred option, and;

translation.cy: dylid ystyried dosbarthiad costau a manteision rhwng gwahanol ddiwydiannau, grwpiau a/neu sectorau;
translation.en: the distribution of costs and benefits between different industries, groups and/or sectors should be considered;

translation.cy: dylai'r Asesiad Effaith Rheoleiddiol, cyn belled ag y bo'n ymarferol, gynnwys ystyriaeth o unrhyw newidiadau diwylliannol sy'n ofynnol gan y ddeddfwriaeth ynghyd â'r prosesau sy'n ofynnol i roi newid ar waith.
translation.en: the RIA should, as far as is practicable, include consideration of any cultural change necessitated by the legislation and recognise the aspirations of the legislation as well as the processes required to implement change.

translation.cy: Fodd bynnag, mae’n debygol y bydd yn rhaid ei chasglu o nifer o ffynonellau, fel gan gydweithwyr yn y Llywodraeth (er enghraifft, bydd tîm Cyfathrebu’r Grŵp yn gallu rhoi gwybodaeth am weithgareddau cyfathrebu priodol a’u costau cysylltiedig), adroddiadau ymchwil, arfarniadau polisi, ystadegau a sefydliadau allanol, etc.
translation.en: However, it is likely that it will have to be gathered from a number of sources, such as Government colleagues (for example the Group Communications team will be able to advise on suitable communication activities and their associated costs), research reports, policy evaluations, statistics and external organisations, etc.

translation.cy: Dylai’r Asesiad Effaith Rheoleiddiol nodi’r amcangyfrif gorau o gost y ddeddfwriaeth yn ei chyfanrwydd ac mae hyn yn cynnwys unrhyw is-ddeddfwriaeth gysylltiedig.
translation.en: The RIA should set out a best estimate of the cost of the legislation as a whole and this includes any associated subordinate legislation.

translation.cy: Pan fo rhywfaint o ansicrwydd ynghylch cynnwys yr is-ddeddfwriaeth, dylid esbonio’r prif feysydd o ansicrwydd a’r sail ar gyfer yr amcangyfrifon o gostau.
translation.en: Where there is some uncertainty around the content of the subordinate legislation, the main areas of uncertainty and the basis of the cost estimates should be explained.

translation.cy: Dylai’r cyfnod arfarnu gynnwys oes ddisgwyliedig y polisi.
translation.en: This appraisal period should cover the expected life of the policy.

translation.cy: Mae'r term 'costau suddedig' yn cyfeirio at wariant neu daliadau sydd eisoes wedi'u hysgwyddo, ac fe ddylai costau o'r fath gael eu heithrio o'r arfarniad economaidd.
translation.en: The term ‘sunk costs’ refers to expenditure or payments that have already been incurred and such costs should be excluded from economic appraisal.

translation.cy: Wedi dweud hynny, mae'n debyg y bydd gan Aelodau'r Cynulliad rywfaint o ddiddordeb mewn costau sydd eisoes wedi'u hysgwyddo (er enghraifft cynnal cynllun peilot, datblygu system TG neu hyfforddi staff wrth ddisgwyl i Fil gael ei ddeddfu) felly argymhellir y dylid adrodd am y costau hynny mewn adran ar wahân o'r Asesiad Effaith Rheoleiddiol gydag esboniad ynghylch pam yr ysgwyddwyd y costau cyn i'r Bil gael ei basio.
translation.en: That said, Assembly Members are likely to have some interest in costs which have already been incurred (for example, if there has been a pilot scheme, if an IT system has been developed or if there has been staff training in anticipation of a Bill being enacted) and so it is recommended those costs are reported in a separate section of the RIA along with an explanation of why the costs have been incurred prior to the Bill being passed.

translation.cy: Ni ddylai costau’r dyfodol gynnwys chwyddiant prisiau cyffredinol.
translation.en: Future costs should not include general price inflation.

translation.cy: Costau pontio
translation.en: Transition costs

translation.cy: Wrth ystyried costau staff, dylid nodi ‘argostau’ yn ogystal â’r cyflog ei hun.
translation.en: When considering staff costs, ‘on costs’ as well as the salary itself should be captured.

translation.cy: cyrff erlyn;
translation.en: prosecuting bodies; and

translation.cy: Ceir tystiolaeth sy’n dangos ei bod yn well gan gymdeithas yn gyffredinol dderbyn nwyddau a gwasanaethau nawr yn hytrach na wedyn a gohirio gwariant tan flynyddoedd yn ddiweddarach.
translation.en: There is evidence showing that society generally prefers to receive goods and services now rather than later and to defer expenditure until later years.

translation.cy: Cododd Archwilydd Cyffredinol Cymru bryderon yn ystod y Pedwerydd Cynulliad bod ‘debydu’ manteision ag iddynt werth ariannol o gostau arian parod yn gamarweiniol o bosibl ac argymhellodd y dylid osgoi’r ymarfer.
translation.en: The Auditor General for Wales raised concerns during the Fourth Assembly that the ‘netting-off’ of monetised benefits from cash costs was potentially misleading and recommended that the practice be avoided.

translation.cy: Os bydd Asesiad o'r Gystadleuaeth yn cael ei gynnal, dylid ei gynnwys fel rhan o'r bennod hon.
translation.en: If a Competition Assessment is undertaken it should be included as part of this chapter.

translation.cy: Mae Llywodraeth Cymru yn cyhoeddi cynllun tystiolaeth bob blwyddyn a dylai timau Biliau drafod gydag ymchwilwyr cymdeithasol Gwasanaethau Gwybodaeth a Dadansoddi a ellir cynnwys yr adolygiad ar ôl gweithredu yn y cynllun hwnnw.
translation.en: The Welsh Government publishes an evidence plan each year and Bill teams should discuss with KAS social researchers whether the post-implementation review can be included in that plan.

translation.cy: Mae’r canllawiau yn y Bennod hon yn ymwneud â chyfnodau allweddol o waith wrth baratoi’r Bil i gael ei gyflwyno (yn hytrach nag agweddau eraill ar waith Bil).
translation.en: The guidance in this Chapter relates to key phases of work in preparing the Bill for introduction (rather than other aspects of Bill work).

translation.cy: Amlinelliad o’r cyfnodau ar gyfer datblygu Bil
translation.en: Outline of phases for developing a Bill

translation.cy: Fel arfer, maent hefyd yn cyflawni swyddogaeth swyddogion sy’n llunio cyfarwyddiadau i ddrafftwyr y Bil yn Swyddfa’r Cwnsleriaid Deddfwriaethol.
translation.en: Usually, they also perform the role of instructing officers to the drafters of the Bill in OLC.

translation.cy: Ni fydd Swyddfa’r Cwnsleriaid Deddfwriaethol fel arfer yn cymryd rhan ar ddechrau’r broses o ddatblygu’r polisi, ond wrth i’r polisi gael ei fireinio mwy, ac wrth i’r dadansoddiad cyfreithiol ddechrau cael ei lunio, mae eu mewnbwn yn debygol o gynyddu.
translation.en: OLC will not usually be involved in the very early stages of policy development, but as the policy becomes more refined, and as the legal analysis begins to be shaped, their input is likely to increase.

translation.cy: Ond byddant yn gallu cynnig rhywfaint o gefnogaeth yn ystod y cyfnodau cynnar at y dibenion a ganlyn -
translation.en: But they will be able to offer some support in the early stages for the following purposes –

translation.cy: Ar bob cam, mae angen rhoi ystyriaeth gymesur i:
translation.en: At each stage, proportionate consideration needs to be given to the:

translation.cy: pwy y mae’n rhaid eu heffeithio a phwy allai gael eu heffeithio, a phwy mae’n rhaid peidio â’u heffeithio;
translation.en: who must and who might be affected, and who must not;

translation.cy: Mae deddfwriaeth yn rhoi effaith i bolisi, gan fynegi ewyllys y ddeddfwrfa bod rhaid gwneud rhywbeth, neu y gellir neu na ellir gwneud rhywbeth.
translation.en: Legislation gives effect to a policy, expressing the will of the legislature that something must be done, may be done or may not be done.

translation.cy: Pa weithdrefnau Cynulliad ddylai fod yn gymwys?
translation.en: What Assembly procedures should apply?

translation.cy: polisi gorfodi – sut fydd dyletswyddau’n cael eu gorfodi (e.e. troseddau newydd, cosbau sifil, adolygiad barnwrol, creu awdurdodau gorfodi neu addasu swyddogaethau awdurdodau presennol)?
translation.en: enforcement policy – how are duties to be enforced (e.g. new crimes, civil penalties, judicial review, creation of enforcement authorities or adjustment of the functions of existing authorities)?

translation.cy: Tîm y Bil sy’n gyfrifol am gydgysylltu’r broses hon a sicrhau bod yr holl gyfarwyddiadau yn cael eu llunio yn unol â’r terfynau amser y cytunwyd arnynt.
translation.en: The Bill team is responsible for co-ordinating this process and ensuring that all of the instructions are produced according to the agreed deadlines.

translation.cy: Prif ddiben y cyfarwyddiadau hyn yw esbonio’r polisi, nodi sefyllfa bresennol y gyfraith ac esbonio pa newidiadau i’r gyfraith sydd eu hangen i roi effaith i’r polisi.
translation.en: The main purpose of these instructions is to explain the policy, set out the existing state of the law and explain what changes to the law are needed to give effect to the policy.

translation.cy: y cyfarwyddiadau i’r Cwnsler.
translation.en: the instructions to Counsel.

translation.cy: Cynnwys Grwpiau eraill
translation.en: Involving other Groups

translation.cy: Bydd Rheolwr y Bil a’r swyddog(ion) sy’n llunio cyfarwyddiadau yn cael eu hysbysu cyn gynted ag y bydd y Prif Gwnsler Deddfwriaethol wedi neilltuo’r Bil i un drafftiwr penodol neu fwy nag un ohonynt.
translation.en: The Bill Manager and instructing officer(s) will be informed as soon as the First Legislative Counsel has allocated the Bill to one or more drafters.

translation.cy: Bydd hyn yn rhoi syniad i’r drafftiwr sut y bydd unrhyw set benodol yn ffitio i mewn i’r Bil yn ei gyfanrwydd.
translation.en: This will give the drafter an idea of how any particular instalment will fit into the Bill as a whole.

translation.cy: Wrth ysgrifennu cyfarwyddiadau, mae’n bwysig cofio bod y drafftiwr yn rhan o dîm y Bil hefyd.
translation.en: When writing instructions it is important to remember that the drafter is part of the Bill team too.

translation.cy: Mae hyn yn golygu y dylai’r cyfarwyddiadau fod yn gwbl onest am unrhyw anawsterau y mae’r tîm yn ymwybodol ohonynt gyda’r hyn sy’n cael ei gynnig.
translation.en: This means that the instructions should be candid about any known difficulties with what is being proposed.

translation.cy: Dylai’r swyddog sy’n llunio cyfarwyddiadau hefyd deimlo’n rhydd i drafod y strwythur gorau ar gyfer y cyfarwyddiadau gyda Swyddfa’r Cwnsleriaid Deddfwriaethol.
translation.en: The instructing officer should also feel free to discuss how best to structure the instructions with OLC.

translation.cy: Prif ddiben y rhan hon o’r cyfarwyddiadau yw cynnig crynodeb byr i’r drafftiwr o’r polisi y mae’r Gweinidog yn dymuno ei ddilyn.
translation.en: The main purpose of this part of the instructions is to provide the drafter with a brief summary of the policy the Minister wishes to pursue.

translation.cy: Mae’r Llywodraeth yn dymuno iddi fod yn bosibl i bobl apelio i’r Tribiwnlys Haen Gyntaf yn erbyn penderfyniadau penodol a wneir gan Weinidogion Cymru yng nghyswllt y drefn drwyddedu.”
translation.en: The Government want it to be possible for people to appeal to the First-tier tribunal against certain decisions made by the Welsh Ministers in connection with the licensing regime.”

translation.cy: Mae angen cymryd gofal i osgoi syrthio i’r fagl o gynnwys deunydd yn y rhan hon o’r cyfarwyddiadau nad yw’n berthnasol o gwbl i’r cynigion dim ond er mwyn bod yn gynhwysfawr.
translation.en: Care needs to be taken to avoid the trap of including material in this part of the instructions which is of no relevance to the proposals just for the sake of being comprehensive.

translation.cy: Rhan 3 y Cyfarwyddiadau – Cynigion manwl
translation.en: Part 3 of the Instructions – Detailed proposals

translation.cy: y newidiadau i gyfraith y mae’r Grŵp eisiau eu gwneud er mwyn bodloni’r amcan hwnnw.
translation.en: the changes in law that the Group wants to make in order to achieve that objective.

translation.cy: Pan ddaw i ddisgrifio’r newidiadau i’r gyfraith y mae’r Grŵp eu heisiau, canolbwyntio ar sylwedd y newidiadau arfaethedig yw’r peth pwysig.
translation.en: When it comes to describing the changes in law that the Group wants, the key is to concentrate on the substance of the proposed changes.

translation.cy: Ond mae’n fan cychwyn da i’r swyddog sy’n llunio cyfarwyddiadau feddwl am yr hyn y byddai’n dymuno ei wybod pe gofynnir iddo ddrafftio darpariaethau i roi effaith i’r newid.
translation.en: But a good starting point is for the instructing officer to think about what he or she would want to know if asked to draft provisions to give effect to the change.

translation.cy: Dyletswyddau newydd – bydd angen i’r cyfarwyddiadau nodi’r amgylchiadau pan fydd y ddyletswydd yn codi, union natur y ddyletswydd ac ar ba berson y bydd y ddyletswydd yn cael ei gorfodi.
translation.en: New duties – the instructions will need to set out the circumstances in which the duty is to arise, the precise nature of the duty and the person on whom the duty is to be imposed.

translation.cy: Hyd yn oed pan na fydd angen mynegi’r dull gorfodi yn y Bil, dylid cyflwyno esboniad o’r dull gorfodi yn y cyfarwyddiadau er gwaethaf hynny, fel bod y drafftiwr yn deall yn glir beth a fwriedir.
translation.en: Even where the means of enforcement chosen will not need to be expressed in the Bill an explanation of the means of enforcement should still be set out in the instructions so that the drafter is clear about what is intended.

translation.cy: Os yw cyfarwyddiadau ar y Bil yn cael eu gwneud fesul dipyn, efallai y gellir rhoi sylw i rai o’r materion atodol a chysylltiedig mewn set gyffredinol o gyfarwyddiadau sy’n berthnasol i’r Bil cyfan fel nad oes angen rhoi sylw iddynt ar wahân ym mhob un o’r setiau o gyfarwyddiadau sy’n weddill.
translation.en: If the Bill is being instructed on in instalments, it may be that some of the supplemental and incidental matters can be addressed in a general instalment that applies to the whole Bill so that they do not need to be addressed separately in each of the remaining instalments.

translation.cy: cymhwyso i’r Goron;
translation.en: application to the Crown;

translation.cy: cychwyn;
translation.en: commencement; and

translation.cy: Os hoffech ganllawiau pellach ar gyfraith yr UE yn gyffredinol ac ar ei gweithrediad domestig, gweler y rhan ar Gyfraith Ewrop ar LION (Rhwydwaith Gwybodaeth Gyfreithiol Ar-lein), y gellir cael mynediad ato drwy Gwasanaethau Cyfreithiol.
translation.en: For further guidance about EU law generally and about its domestic implementation, see the European Law area on LION (Legal Information Online Network), which can be accessed via Legal Services.

translation.cy: Ond mae’n bwysig cofio hefyd os caiff y gwaith o ddrafftio diwygiadau canlyniadol a diddymiadau ei adael tan ar ôl Cydsyniad Brenhinol, ni fydd Swyddfa’r Cwnsleriaid Deddfwriaethol yn gyfrifol am baratoi’r drafft.
translation.en: But it is important to remember that if the drafting of consequential amendments and repeals is left until after Royal Assent, OLC will not be responsible for preparing the drafting.

translation.cy: Darpariaeth drosiannol yw darpariaeth sy’n ymdrin â sut y bydd achos sy’n dechrau o dan y gyfraith bresennol yn cael ei drin pan fydd y gyfraith newydd yn y Bil yn cael ei chychwyn.
translation.en: A transitional provision is a provision that deals with how a case that begins under the existing law is to be treated when the new law in the Bill is commenced.

translation.cy: Dylid hefyd cofio bod y darpariaethau trosiannol sydd eu hangen yn aml yn gymhleth iawn ac os caiff y gwaith drafftio ei ohirio tan ar ôl cael Cydsyniad Brenhinol, ni fydd Swyddfa’r Cwnsleriaid Deddfwriaethol yn gyfrifol am y gwaith drafftio hwnnw.
translation.en: It should also be borne in mind that the transitional provisions needed are often very complex and if the drafting is deferred until after Royal Assent OLC will not be responsible for the drafting.

translation.cy: Pan fo’n bosibl, dylai’r diwrnod pan fydd y darpariaethau y gofynnwyd amdanynt yn dod i rym gael ei bennu gan y Bil ei hun (yn hytrach na chan orchmynion a wneir o dan y Bil) – mae hyn yn rhoi mwy sicrwydd i’r rheini sy’n mynd i gael eu heffeithio gan y darpariaethau ac mae hefyd yn arbed trafferth i’r darllenwr o orfod chwilio am orchmynion.
translation.en: Where possible, the day when the requested provisions come into force should be determined by the Bill itself (rather than by orders made under the Bill) – this provides greater certainty to those who are going to be affected by the provisions and also saves putting the reader to the trouble of looking up orders.

translation.cy: Rhan 5 y Cyfarwyddiadau – materion trin y Cynulliad ac eraill
translation.en: Part 5 of the Instructions – Assembly and other handling matters

translation.cy: Er enghraifft, dylai nodi (i’r graddau eu bod yn hysbys i’r swyddog sy’n llunio cyfarwyddiadau):
translation.en: For example, it should set out (in so far as they are known to the instructing officer):

translation.cy: unrhyw angen brys i’r Bil gyrraedd Cydsyniad Brenhinol erbyn dyddiad penodol.
translation.en: any pressing need for the Bill to reach Royal Assent by a particular date.

translation.cy: Pan fydd Gweinidog portffolio arall yn gyfrifol am elfen o’r Bil, bydd angen iddo yntau hefyd awdurdodi’r polisi.
translation.en: Where an element of the Bill falls to a different portfolio Minister, they will also need to clear the policy.

translation.cy: Er mwyn osgoi unrhyw oedi diangen, mae’n bwysig bod cyfreithiwr a swyddog polisi yn gallu ateb y cwestiynau hyn yn gyflym.
translation.en: In order to avoid unnecessary delays, it is important that a lawyer and a policy official are able to answer these questions quickly.

translation.cy: Yn aml, bydd amrywiaeth o swyddogion y mae’n rhaid rhoi cyfle iddynt wneud sylwadau ar y darpariaethau drafft a rhoi atebion i gwestiynau’r drafftiwr.
translation.en: Often there will be a range of officials who need to be given an opportunity to comment on the draft provisions and provide answers to the drafter’s questions.

translation.cy: Os oes unrhyw amheuaeth ynghylch a yw’r drafft yn cyflawni’r polisi, dylid codi hyn yn yr ymateb i’r drafftiwr.
translation.en: If there is any doubt about whether the draft achieves the policy, this should be raised in the response to the drafter.

translation.cy: Yn yr un modd, os oes unrhyw bryderon ynghylch cyflwyniad y darpariaethau drafft, dylid esbonio’r rhesymau am y pryderon i’r drafftiwr.
translation.en: Similarly, if there are any presentational concerns about the draft provisions the reasons for the concerns should be explained to the drafter.

translation.cy: Bydd yr ystyriaethau hyn yn llywio cyngor Swyddfa’r Cwnsleriaid Deddfwriaethol i Weinidogion ar yr enw byr.
translation.en: These considerations will guide OLC’s advice to Ministers on the short title.
